281 void PlayerBase()
282 {
283 Init();
284 }
285
286 void Init()
287 {
288 //Print("PSOVIS: new player");
289 //PrintString( "isServer " + GetGame().IsServer().ToString() );
290 //PrintString( "isClient " + GetGame().IsClient().ToString() );
291 //PrintString( "isMultiplayer " + GetGame().IsMultiplayer().ToString() );
292 SetEventMask(EntityEvent.INIT|EntityEvent.POSTFRAME|EntityEvent.FRAME);
293 //m_Agents = new array<int>; //transmission agents
294 m_StoreLoadVersion = 0;
295 m_IsCraftingReady = false;
296 m_Recipes = new array<int>;
297 m_LastShavedSeconds = 0;
298 m_BloodType = 0;
299 m_HasBloodTypeVisible = false;
300 m_LifeSpanState = 0;
301 m_LifespanLevelLocal = -1;
302 m_CorpseState = 0;
303 m_CorpseStateLocal = 0;
304 m_HasBloodyHandsVisible = 0;
305 m_PlayerLoaded = false;
306 m_PlayerSelected = false;
307 m_ProcessUIWarning = false;
308 m_FlagRaisingTendency = true;
309 m_LiquidTendencyDrain = false;
310 m_UAParamMessage = new Param1<string>("");
311 m_UnconParam = new Param1<float>(0);
312 m_DeathDarkeningParam = new Param1<float>(0);
313 m_UAParam = new Param2<int,int>(0,0);
314 m_UAProgressParam = new Param2<float,float>(0,0);
315 m_QuickBarBase = new QuickBarBase(this);
316 m_QuickBarBonus = Math.Max(ConfigGetInt("quickBarBonus"), 0);
317 m_CargoLoad = 0;
318 m_VisibilityCoef = 1.0;
319 m_Hud = GetGame().GetMission().GetHud();
320 m_RecipePick = 0;
321 m_ActionQBControl = false;
322 m_QuickBarHold = false;
323 m_HideHairAnimated = true;
324 m_WorkingNVGHeadset = false;
325 m_LoweredNVGHeadset = false;
326 m_AreHandsLocked = false;
327 m_ItemsToDelete = new array<EntityAI>;
328 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.None;
329 m_EmptyGloves = new HiddenSelectionsData(ConfigGetString("emptyGloves"));
330 m_CanDisplayHitEffectPPE = true;
331
332 #ifdef DIAG_DEVELOPER
333 m_CanBeTargetedDebug = true;
334 //RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_CanBeTargetedDebug");
335 #endif
336
337 m_AnalyticsTimer = new Timer( CALL_CATEGORY_SYSTEM );
338
339 m_StaminaHandler = new StaminaHandler(this);//current stamina calculation
340 m_InjuryHandler = new InjuryAnimationHandler(this);
341 m_ShockHandler = new ShockHandler(this); //New shock handler
342 m_HCAnimHandler = new HeatComfortAnimHandler(this);
343 m_PlayerStats = new PlayerStats(this);//player stats
344 if ( GetGame().IsServer() )
345 {
346 m_PlayerStomach = new PlayerStomach(this);
347 m_NotifiersManager = new NotifiersManager(this); // player notifiers
348 m_AgentPool = new PlayerAgentPool(this); // agent pool manager
349 m_BleedingManagerServer = new BleedingSourcesManagerServer(this);
350 m_Environment = new Environment(this);//environment effects on player
351 m_ModifiersManager = new ModifiersManager(this); // player modifiers
352 m_PlayerSoundManagerServer = new PlayerSoundManagerServer(this);
353 m_VirtualHud = new VirtualHud(this);
354
355 m_AdminLog = PluginAdminLog.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginAdminLog) );
356 }
357
358 m_SymptomManager = new SymptomManager(this); // state manager
359 m_ModuleRecipesManager = PluginRecipesManager.Cast(GetPlugin(PluginRecipesManager));
360
361 m_TrasferValues = new TransferValues(this);
362 m_EmoteManager = new EmoteManager(this);
363 m_SoftSkillsManager = new SoftSkillsManager(this);//Soft Skills calculation
364
365 m_WeaponManager = new WeaponManager(this);
366 m_DebugMonitorValues = new DebugMonitorValues(this);
367 m_RGSManager = new RandomGeneratorSyncManager(this);
368
369 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
370 {
371 m_MeleeDebug = false;
372 m_UALastMessage = "";
373 m_UALastMessageTimer = new Timer;
374 m_InventoryActionHandler = new InventoryActionHandler(this);
375 m_BleedingManagerRemote = new BleedingSourcesManagerRemote(this);
376 m_PlayerSoundManagerClient = new PlayerSoundManagerClient(this);
377 m_StanceIndicator = new StanceIndicator(this);
378 m_ActionsInitialize = false;
379 ClientData.AddPlayerBase( this );
380
381 m_ProcessAddEffectWidgets = new array<int>;
382 m_ProcessRemoveEffectWidgets = new array<int>;
383 m_ActiveNVTypes = new array<int>;
384 m_ProcessAddGlassesEffects = new array<int>;
385 m_ProcessRemoveGlassesEffects = new array<int>;
386 }
387
388 m_ActionManager = NULL;
389 //m_PlayerLightManager = NULL;
390 //m_VehicleManager = new VehicleManager(this,m_ActionManager);
391
392 m_ConfigEmotesProfile = PluginConfigEmotesProfile.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginConfigEmotesProfile) );
393
394 if ( GetDayZGame().IsDebug() )
395 {
396 PluginConfigDebugProfileFixed m_ConfigDebugProfileFixed = PluginConfigDebugProfileFixed.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginConfigDebugProfileFixed) );
397 PluginConfigDebugProfile m_ConfigDebugProfile = PluginConfigDebugProfile.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginConfigDebugProfile) );
398 PluginDeveloper m_Developer = PluginDeveloper.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginDeveloper) );
399
400 PlayerBase player = this;
401
402 if ( m_ConfigDebugProfile )
403 {
404 string default_preset = m_ConfigDebugProfile.GetDefaultPreset();
405 if ( player && default_preset != "" )
406 {
407 TStringArray preset_array = new TStringArray;
408 m_ConfigDebugProfileFixed.GetPresetItems( default_preset, preset_array );
409
410 bool is_preset_fixed = true;
411 if ( preset_array.Count() == 0 )
412 {
413 m_ConfigDebugProfile.GetPresetItems( default_preset, preset_array );
414 is_preset_fixed = false;
415 }
416
417 if ( preset_array.Count() > 0 )
418 {
419 m_Developer.ClearInventory(player);
420
421 for (int i = 0; i < preset_array.Count(); i++)
422 {
423 float health = -1;
424 int quantity = -1;
425 if ( is_preset_fixed )
426 {
427 health = m_ConfigDebugProfileFixed.GetItemHealth( default_preset, i );
428 quantity = m_ConfigDebugProfileFixed.GetItemQuantity( default_preset, i );
429 }
430 else
431 {
432 health = m_ConfigDebugProfile.GetItemHealth( default_preset, i );
433 quantity = m_ConfigDebugProfile.GetItemQuantity( default_preset, i );
434 }
435 m_Developer.SpawnEntityInInventory(player, preset_array.Get(i), health, quantity );
436 }
437 }
438 }
439 }
440 }
441
442 m_MapNavigationBehaviour = new MapNavigationBehaviour(this);
443
444 m_ModulePlayerStatus = PluginPlayerStatus.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginPlayerStatus) );
445 m_ModuleLifespan = PluginLifespan.Cast( GetPlugin( PluginLifespan ) );
446
447 m_BleedingSourcesLow = new array<string>;
448 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("RightToeBase");
449 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("RightFoot");
450 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("LeftToeBase");
451 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("LeftFoot");
452 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("RightUpLegRoll");
453 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("RightUpLeg");
454 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("RightLegRoll");
455 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("RightLeg");
456 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("LeftUpLegRoll");
457 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("LeftUpLeg");
458 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("LeftLegRoll");
459 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("LeftLeg");
460
461 m_BleedingSourcesUp = new array<string>;
462 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("RightForeArmRoll");
463 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("LeftForeArmRoll");
464 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("RightForeArm");
465 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("RightArmRoll");
466 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("RightArm");
467 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("RightShoulder");
468 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("LeftForeArm");
469 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("LeftArmRoll");
470 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("LeftArm");
471 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("LeftShoulder");
472 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("Spine3");
473 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("Spine2");
474 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("Spine1");
475 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("Spine");
476 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("Pelvis");
477 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("Neck");
478
479 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_LifeSpanState", LifeSpanState.BEARD_NONE, LifeSpanState.COUNT);
480 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_BloodType", 0, 128);
481 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_ShockSimplified",0, SIMPLIFIED_SHOCK_CAP);
482 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_SoundEvent",0, EPlayerSoundEventID.ENUM_COUNT - 1);
483 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_SoundEventParam", 0, ((EPlayerSoundEventParam.ENUM_COUNT - 1) * 2) - 1);
484 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_StaminaState",0, eStaminaState.COUNT - 1);
485 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_BleedingBits");
486 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_Shakes", 0, SHAKE_LEVEL_MAX);
487 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_BreathVapour", 0, BREATH_VAPOUR_LEVEL_MAX);
488 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_HealthLevel", eInjuryHandlerLevels.PRISTINE, eInjuryHandlerLevels.RUINED);
489 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_MixedSoundStates", 0, eMixedSoundStates.COUNT - 1);
490 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_CorpseState",-PlayerConstants.CORPSE_STATE_DECAYED,PlayerConstants.CORPSE_STATE_DECAYED);//do note the negative min, negative sign denotes a special meaning
491 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_RefreshAnimStateIdx",0,3);
492 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_BrokenLegState", -eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT, eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT);
493 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_SyncedModifiers", 0, ((eModifierSyncIDs.LAST_INDEX - 1) * 2) - 1);
494 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_HasBloodyHandsVisible", 0, eBloodyHandsTypes.LAST_INDEX - 1);
495
496 RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_IsUnconscious");
497 RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_IsRestrained");
498 RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_IsInWater");
499
500 RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_HasBloodTypeVisible");
501 //RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_LiquidTendencyDrain");
502 RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_IsRestrainStarted");
503 RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_IsRestrainPrelocked");
504 //RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_CanPlayBrokenLegSound"); //Temporary
505 RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_HasHeatBuffer");
506
507 RegisterNetSyncVariableFloat("m_CurrentShock"); //Register shock synchronized variable
508
509 m_OriginalSlidePoseAngle = GetSlidePoseAngle();
510
512 m_DefaultHitPosition = SetDefaultHitPosition(GetDayZPlayerType().GetDefaultHitPositionComponent());
513
514 m_DecayedTexture = ConfigGetString("decayedTexture");
515 m_FliesIndex = -1;
516 GetGame().GetCallQueue(CALL_CATEGORY_SYSTEM).Call(this.OnPlayerLoaded);
517 }
518
519 void IncreaseAntibioticsCount()
520 {
521 m_AntibioticsActive++;
522 }
523
524 void DecreaseAntibioticsCount()
525 {
526 m_AntibioticsActive--;
527 if(m_AntibioticsActive < 0)
528 {
529 m_AntibioticsActive = 0;
530 Error("DecreaseAntibioticsCount called more times than IncreaseAntibioticsCount (should be equal) - check your code, forcing clamp to 0");
531 }
532 }
533
534 bool IsAntibioticsActive()
535 {
536 return (m_AntibioticsActive > 0);
537 }
538
539
540
542 ItemBase GetItemOnSlot(string slot_type)
543 {
544 int slot_id = InventorySlots.GetSlotIdFromString( slot_type );
545 EntityAI item_EAI = this.GetInventory().FindAttachment( slot_id );
546 ItemBase item_IB = ItemBase.Cast(item_EAI);
547
548 if (item_EAI && !item_IB)
549 {
550 string str = "Warning! GetItemOnSlot() >> found item on slot " + slot_type + " can't be cast to ItemBase! Found item is " + item_EAI.GetType() + " and the player is " + GetType() + "!";
551 Error(str);
552 return null;
553 }
554
555 return item_IB;
556 }
557
559 ItemBase GetItemOnHead()
560 {
561 return GetItemOnSlot("Headgear");
562 }
563
564 override int GetQuickBarBonus()
565 {
566 return m_QuickBarBonus;
567 }
568
569 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
570 // Inventory overrides
571 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
572 override bool CanDropEntity (notnull EntityAI item)
573 {
574 if( GetInventory().HasInventoryReservation( item, null ) )
575 {
576 return false;
577 }
578
579 if( IsRestrained() )
580 {
581 if( GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands() == item )
582 return false;
583 }
584
585 return true;
586 }
587
588 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
589 // PLAYER DAMAGE EVENT HANDLING
590 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
591
592 int GetBreathVapourLevel()
593 {
594 return m_BreathVapour;
595 }
596
597 // adds state to and syncs sound states variable which is used to generate sound client-side
598 void UnsetMixedSoundState(eMixedSoundStates state)
599 {
600 int bit_mask_remove = ~state;
601
602 eMixedSoundStates new_states = m_MixedSoundStates & bit_mask_remove;
603
604 if(new_states != m_MixedSoundStates)
605 {
606 m_MixedSoundStates = new_states;
607 SetSynchDirty();
608 }
609 }
610
611 // adds state to and syncs sound states variable which is used to generate sound client-side
612 void SetMixedSoundState(eMixedSoundStates state)
613 {
614 eMixedSoundStates new_states = m_MixedSoundStates | state;
615
616 if(new_states != m_MixedSoundStates)
617 {
618 m_MixedSoundStates = new_states;
619 SetSynchDirty();
620 }
621 }
622
623 override bool IsPlayer()
624 {
625 return true;
626 }
627
628 bool IsBleeding()
629 {
630 return (m_BleedingBits != 0 );
631 }
632
633 void SetBleedingBits(int bits)
634 {
635 if( m_BleedingBits != bits )
636 {
637 if( m_BleedingBits == 0 )
638 {
639 OnBleedingBegin();
640 }
641 else if( bits == 0 )
642 {
643 OnBleedingEnd();
644 }
645 }
646 m_BleedingBits = bits;
647 SetSynchDirty();
648 }
649
650 int GetBleedingBits()
651 {
652 return m_BleedingBits;
653 }
654
655 void IncreaseDiseaseCount()
656 {
657 m_DiseaseCount++;
658 }
659
660 void DecreaseDiseaseCount()
661 {
662 m_DiseaseCount--;
663 }
664
665 void IncreaseHealingsCount()
666 {
667 m_HealingsCount++;
668 }
669
670 void DecreaseHealingsCount()
671 {
672 m_HealingsCount--;
673 }
674
675
676 bool HasHealings()
677 {
678 return m_HealingsCount;//0 for no healings, 1+ for healings, gets truncated to 1
679 }
680
681 bool HasDisease()
682 {
683 return m_DiseaseCount;//0 for no disease, 1+ for disease, gets truncated to 1
684 }
685
686
687 EPulseType GetPulseType()
688 {
689 return m_PulseType;
690 }
691
692 void SetPulseType(EPulseType pulse_type)
693 {
694 m_PulseType = pulse_type;
695 }
696
697 void QueueAddEffectWidget(array<int> effects)
698 {
699 m_ProcessAddEffectWidgets.InsertArray(effects);
700 }
701
702 void QueueRemoveEffectWidget(array<int> effects)
703 {
704 m_ProcessRemoveEffectWidgets.InsertArray(effects);
705 }
706
707 void QueueAddGlassesEffect(int id)
708 {
709 m_ProcessAddGlassesEffects.Insert(id);
710 }
711
712 void QueueRemoveGlassesEffect(int id)
713 {
714 m_ProcessRemoveGlassesEffects.Insert(id);
715 }
716
717 DamageDealtEffect GetDamageDealtEffect()
718 {
719 return m_DamageDealtEffect;
720 }
721
722 override void SpawnDamageDealtEffect()
723 {
724 if (m_DamageDealtEffect)
725 {
726 delete m_DamageDealtEffect;
727 }
728
729 if (m_CanDisplayHitEffectPPE)
730 {
731 m_DamageDealtEffect = new DamageDealtEffect();
732 }
733 }
734
735 void SpawnDamageDealtEffect2(Param param1 = null, Param param2 = null)
736 {
737 if (m_EffectRadial)
738 {
739 delete m_EffectRadial;
740 }
741
742 m_EffectRadial = new EffectRadial(param1,param2);
743 }
744
745 FlashbangEffect GetFlashbangEffect()
746 {
747 return m_FlashbangEffect;
748 }
749
750 void SpawnFlashbangEffect(PlayerBase player, bool visual)
751 {
752 if (m_FlashbangEffect)
753 {
754 m_FlashbangEffect.Stop();
755 delete m_FlashbangEffect;
756 }
757
758 m_FlashbangEffect = new FlashbangEffect(player, visual);
759 }
760
761 ShockDealtEffect GetShockEffect()
762 {
763 return m_ShockDealtEffect;
764 }
765
766 void SpawnShockEffect(float intensity_max)
767 {
768 if (m_ShockDealtEffect)
769 {
770 delete m_ShockDealtEffect;
771 }
772
773 m_ShockDealtEffect = new ShockDealtEffect(intensity_max);
774 }
775
776 override void EEKilled( Object killer )
777 {
778 //Print(Object.GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " event EEKilled, player has died at STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp());
779
780 if ( m_AdminLog )
781 {
782 m_AdminLog.PlayerKilled( this, killer );
783 }
784
785 if (GetBleedingManagerServer())
786 delete GetBleedingManagerServer();
787
788 if (GetModifiersManager())
789 GetModifiersManager().DeactivateAllModifiers();
790
791 // kill character in database
792 if (GetHive())
793 {
794 GetHive().CharacterKill(this);
795 }
796
797 // disable voice communication
798 GetGame().EnableVoN(this, false);
799 if( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
800 ClientData.RemovePlayerBase( this );
801 GetSymptomManager().OnPlayerKilled();
802
803 if ( GetEconomyProfile() && !m_CorpseProcessing && m_CorpseState == 0 && GetGame().GetMission().InsertCorpse(this) )
804 {
805 m_CorpseProcessing = true;
806 //Print("EEKilled - processing corpse");
807 }
808
809 if ( GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsServer() )
810 {
811 if (GetGame().GetMission())
812 {
813 GetGame().GetMission().SyncRespawnModeInfo(GetIdentity());
814 }
815 }
816
817 super.EEKilled( killer );
818 }
819
820 override void EEHitBy(TotalDamageResult damageResult, int damageType, EntityAI source, int component, string dmgZone, string ammo, vector modelPos, float speedCoef)
821 {
822 super.EEHitBy(damageResult, damageType, source, component, dmgZone, ammo, modelPos, speedCoef);
823
824 if ( m_AdminLog )
825 {
826 m_AdminLog.PlayerHitBy( damageResult, damageType, this, source, component, dmgZone, ammo );
827 }
828
829 if ( damageResult != null && damageResult.GetDamage(dmgZone, "Shock") > 0)
830 {
831 m_LastShockHitTime = GetGame().GetTime();
832
833 if (!IsUnconscious())
834 {
835 if (GetGame().ConfigIsExisting("cfgAmmo " + ammo + " unconRefillModifier"))
836 {
837 m_UnconRefillModifier = GetGame().ConfigGetInt("cfgAmmo " + ammo + " unconRefillModifier");
838 }
839 else
840 {
841 m_UnconRefillModifier = 1;
842 }
843 }
844 }
845
847 if ( damageType == DT_EXPLOSION && ammo == "FlashGrenade_Ammo" )
848 {
849 GetStaminaHandler().DepleteStamina(EStaminaModifiers.OVERALL_DRAIN);
850 }
851
852 //new bleeding computation
853 //---------------------------------------
854 if ( damageResult != null && GetBleedingManagerServer() )
855 {
856 float dmg = damageResult.GetDamage(dmgZone, "Blood");
857 GetBleedingManagerServer().ProcessHit(dmg, source, component, dmgZone, ammo, modelPos);
858 }
859 //---------------------------------------
860
861 #ifdef DIAG_DEVELOPER
862 if (DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.MELEE_DEBUG))
863 Print("EEHitBy() | " + GetDisplayName() + " hit by " + source.GetDisplayName() + " to " + dmgZone);
864
865 PluginRemotePlayerDebugServer plugin_remote_server = PluginRemotePlayerDebugServer.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginRemotePlayerDebugServer) );
866 if (plugin_remote_server)
867 {
868 plugin_remote_server.OnDamageEvent(this, damageResult);
869 }
870 #endif
871
872 if ( GetGame().IsDebugMonitor() )
873 m_DebugMonitorValues.SetLastDamage(source.GetDisplayName());
874
875 if ( m_ActionManager )
876 m_ActionManager.Interrupt();
877
878 if ( ammo.ToType().IsInherited(Nonlethal_Base) )
879 {
880 //Print("PlayerBase | EEHitBy | nonlethal hit");
881 AddHealth("","Health",-ConvertNonlethalDamage(damageResult.GetDamage(dmgZone,"Shock")));
882 if (dmgZone != "Head")
883 AddHealth(dmgZone,"Health",-damageResult.GetDamage(dmgZone,"Shock")); //Also deal damage to zone health, no dmg reduction
884 }
885
886 if (GetGame().IsServer())
887 {
888 if ( GetHealth("RightLeg", "Health") <= 1 || GetHealth("LeftLeg", "Health") <= 1 || GetHealth("RightFoot", "Health") <= 1 || GetHealth("LeftFoot", "Health") <= 1 )
889 {
890 if ( GetModifiersManager().IsModifierActive( eModifiers.MDF_BROKEN_LEGS ) )//effectively resets the modifier
891 {
892 GetModifiersManager().DeactivateModifier( eModifiers.MDF_BROKEN_LEGS );
893 }
894 GetModifiersManager().ActivateModifier( eModifiers.MDF_BROKEN_LEGS );
895 }
896 }
897
898 //m_ShockHandler.SetShock(damageResult.GetDamage("", "Shock")); //TESTING
899 m_ShockHandler.CheckValue(true);
900
901 //analytics
902 GetGame().GetAnalyticsServer().OnEntityHit( source, this );
903 }
904
905 override void EEDelete(EntityAI parent)
906 {
907 SEffectManager.DestroyEffect( m_FliesEff );
908// ErrorEx("DbgFlies | StopSoundSet | exit 1 ",ErrorExSeverity.INFO );
909 StopSoundSet(m_SoundFliesEffect);
910 }
911
912 float ConvertNonlethalDamage(float damage)
913 {
914 float converted_dmg = damage * GameConstants.PROJECTILE_CONVERSION_PLAYERS;
915 return converted_dmg;
916 }
917
921 override void OnPlayerRecievedHit()
922 {
923#ifndef NO_GUI
924 SpawnDamageDealtEffect();
925 CachedObjectsParams.PARAM2_FLOAT_FLOAT.param1 = 32;
926 CachedObjectsParams.PARAM2_FLOAT_FLOAT.param2 = 0.3;
927 SpawnDamageDealtEffect2(CachedObjectsParams.PARAM2_FLOAT_FLOAT);
928 CloseMapEx(true);
929#endif
930 }
931
932 void OnPlayerReceiveFlashbangHitStart(bool visual)
933 {
934 SpawnFlashbangEffect(this, visual);
935 }
936
937 void OnPlayerReceiveFlashbangHitEnd() {}

941 super.EEHitByRemote(damageType, source, component, dmgZone, ammo, modelPos);
942
943 //Print("DayZPlayerImplement : EEHitByRemote");
944 }

978 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
979 void AddPossibleCoverFaceForShave()
980 {
981 m_FaceCoveredForShaveLayers++;
982 }
983
984 void RemovePossibleCoverFaceForShave()
985 {
986 m_FaceCoveredForShaveLayers--;
987 }
988 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
989 override void EEItemAttached(EntityAI item, string slot_name)
990 {
991 super.EEItemAttached(item, slot_name);
992 ItemBase itemIB = ItemBase.Cast(item);
993 SwitchItemSelectionTexture(item, slot_name);
994 Param1<PlayerBase> p = new Param1<PlayerBase>(this);
995 item.SwitchItemSelectionTextureEx(EItemManipulationContext.ATTACHING,p/*new Param1<PlayerBase>(this)*/);
996 m_QuickBarBase.updateSlotsCount();
997 CalculateVisibilityForAI();
998 UpdateShoulderProxyVisibility(item, slot_name);
999
1000 if (itemIB.IsCoverFaceForShave(slot_name))
1001 {
1002 AddPossibleCoverFaceForShave();
1003 }
1004 HideHairSelections(itemIB,true);
1005
1006 GetGame().GetAnalyticsClient().OnItemAttachedAtPlayer(item, slot_name);
1007 Clothing clothing = Clothing.Cast(item);
1008 if ( clothing )
1009 {
1010 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
1011 {
1012 if ( clothing.GetEffectWidgetTypes() )
1013 {
1014 QueueAddEffectWidget(clothing.GetEffectWidgetTypes());
1015 }
1016
1017 if ( clothing.GetGlassesEffectID() > -1 )
1018 {
1019 QueueAddGlassesEffect(clothing.GetGlassesEffectID());
1020 }
1021
1022 GetGame().GetCallQueue( CALL_CATEGORY_GUI ).CallLater( UpdateCorpseStateVisual, 200, false);//sometimes it takes a while to load in
1023 UpdateCorpseStateVisual();//....but if possible, we don't want a delay
1024 }
1025 else if ( GetGame().IsServer() )
1026 {
1027 if ( clothing.IsGasMask() )
1028 {
1029 GetModifiersManager().ActivateModifier(eModifiers.MDF_MASK);
1030 }
1031 }
1032
1033 clothing.UpdateNVGStatus(this,true);
1034 }
1035
1036 AdjustBandana(item,slot_name);
1037 }
1038
1039 override void EEItemDetached(EntityAI item, string slot_name)
1040 {
1041 super.EEItemDetached(item, slot_name);
1042 ItemBase item_base = ItemBase.Cast(item);
1043 SwitchItemSelectionTexture(item, slot_name);
1044 item.SwitchItemSelectionTextureEx(EItemManipulationContext.DETACHING);
1045 m_QuickBarBase.updateSlotsCount();
1046 CalculateVisibilityForAI();
1047
1048 if (item_base.IsCoverFaceForShave(slot_name))
1049 {
1050 RemovePossibleCoverFaceForShave();
1051 }
1052 HideHairSelections(item_base,false);
1053
1054 Clothing clothing = Clothing.Cast(item);
1055
1056 if ( clothing )
1057 {
1058 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
1059 {
1060 if ( clothing.GetEffectWidgetTypes() )
1061 {
1062 QueueRemoveEffectWidget(clothing.GetEffectWidgetTypes());
1063 }
1064
1065 if ( clothing.GetGlassesEffectID() > -1 )
1066 {
1067 QueueRemoveGlassesEffect(clothing.GetGlassesEffectID());
1068 }
1069 }
1070
1071 if ( GetGame().IsServer() )
1072 {
1073 if ( clothing.IsGasMask() )
1074 {
1075 GetModifiersManager().DeactivateModifier(eModifiers.MDF_MASK);
1076 }
1077 }
1078
1079 clothing.UpdateNVGStatus(this);
1080 GetGame().GetCallQueue( CALL_CATEGORY_GUI ).CallLater( UpdateCorpseStateVisual, 200, false);//sometimes it takes a while to load in
1081 UpdateCorpseStateVisual();//....but if possible, we don't want a delay
1082 }
1083 }
1084
1085 void SwitchItemTypeAttach(EntityAI item, string slot)
1086 {
1087 //Print("SwitchItemTypeAttach: " + item.GetType());
1088 if( !GetGame().IsServer() )
1089 return;
1090
1091 /*InventoryLocation invloc = new InventoryLocation;
1092
1093 item.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(invloc);
1094 //Print(invloc.DumpToString());
1095 if (item.ConfigIsExisting("ChangeIntoOnAttach") && invloc.GetType() != InventoryLocationType.UNKNOWN)
1096 {
1097 string str = item.ChangeIntoOnAttach(slot);
1098 if (str != "")
1099 {
1100 string typestr = item.GetType();
1101 MiscGameplayFunctions.TurnItemIntoItem(ItemBase.Cast( item ), str, this);
1102 }
1103 }*/
1104 }
1105
1106 void SwitchItemTypeDetach(EntityAI item, string slot)
1107 {
1108 //Print("SwitchItemTypeDetach: " + item.GetType());
1109 }
1110
1111 void UpdateShoulderProxyVisibility(EntityAI item, string slot_name)
1112 {
1113 string slot = slot_name;
1114 bool boo;
1115 boo = item.IsWeapon();
1116
1117 if ( slot == "Melee" )
1118 {
1119 SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(SIMPLE_SELECTION_MELEE_RIFLE,boo);
1120 SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(SIMPLE_SELECTION_MELEE_MELEE,!boo);
1121 }
1122 else if ( slot == "Shoulder" )
1123 {
1124 SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(SIMPLE_SELECTION_SHOULDER_RIFLE,boo);
1125 SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(SIMPLE_SELECTION_SHOULDER_MELEE,!boo);
1126 }
1127 }
1128
1129 override void SwitchItemSelectionTexture(EntityAI item, string slot_name)
1130 {
1131 super.SwitchItemSelectionTexture(item,slot_name);
1132
1133 //shirt + armband
1134 EntityAI armband = FindAttachmentBySlotName("Armband");
1135 if (slot_name == "Body" && armband)
1136 {
1137 Param1<PlayerBase> p = new Param1<PlayerBase>(this);
1138 armband.SwitchItemSelectionTextureEx(EItemManipulationContext.UPDATE,p);
1139 }
1140 }
1141
1142 void RemoveAllItems()
1143 {
1144 array<EntityAI> itemsArray = new array<EntityAI>;
1145 ItemBase item;
1146 GetInventory().EnumerateInventory(InventoryTraversalType.PREORDER, itemsArray);
1147
1148 for (int i = 0; i < itemsArray.Count(); i++)
1149 {
1150 Class.CastTo(item, itemsArray.Get(i));
1151 if (item && !item.IsInherited(SurvivorBase)) GetInventory().LocalDestroyEntity(item);
1152 }
1153 }
1154
1155 bool GetHitPPEEnabled()
1156 {
1157 return m_CanDisplayHitEffectPPE;
1158 }
1159
1160 void SetHitPPEEnabled(bool enabled)
1161 {
1162 m_CanDisplayHitEffectPPE = enabled;
1163 }
1164
1165 bool IsMale()
1166 {
1167 if (ConfigGetBool("woman") != 1)
1168 {
1169 return true;
1170 }
1171 return false;
1172 }
1173
1174 int GetVoiceType()
1175 {
1176 int voice_type = ConfigGetInt("voiceType");
1177
1178 if (voice_type == 0)
1179 {
1180 voice_type = 1;
1181 }
1182
1183 return voice_type;
1184 }

1187 {
1188 return m_PlayerSoundManagerServer;
1189 }

1191
1192 UndergroundHandlerClient GetUndergroundHandler()
1193 {
1194 if (!m_UndergroundHandler && IsAlive())
1195 {
1196 m_UndergroundHandler = new UndergroundHandlerClient(this);
1197 }
1198
1199 return m_UndergroundHandler;
1200 }
1201
1202 void KillUndergroundHandler()
1203 {
1204 m_UndergroundHandler = null;
1205 }

1210 {
1211 AddAction(ActionOpenDoors, InputActionMap);
1212 AddAction(ActionCloseDoors, InputActionMap);
1213 AddAction(ActionLockedDoors, InputActionMap);
1214 AddAction(ActionEnterLadder, InputActionMap);
1215 AddAction(ActionExitLadder, InputActionMap);
1216 //AddAction(ActionWorldCraft);//??
1217 //AddAction(ActionWorldCraftSwitch);//??
1218
1219 //-----------CheckIfCanMOveToTarget----------
1220 AddAction(ActionStartEngine, InputActionMap);
1221 AddAction(ActionStopEngine, InputActionMap);
1222 AddAction(ActionSwitchSeats, InputActionMap);
1223 AddAction(ActionOpenCarDoors,InputActionMap);
1224 AddAction(ActionCloseCarDoors,InputActionMap);
1225 //AddAction(ActionTakeMaterialToHandsSwitch);
1226 AddAction(ActionUncoverHeadSelf, InputActionMap);
1227 //AddAction(ActionAttach);
1228 AddAction(ActionDrinkPondContinuous, InputActionMap);
1229 AddAction(ActionIgniteFireplaceByAir, InputActionMap);
1230 AddAction(ActionMineBushByHand, InputActionMap);
1231
1232 AddAction(ActionUngagSelf, InputActionMap);
1233 AddAction(ActionWashHandsWaterOne, InputActionMap);
1234 AddAction(ActionGetOutTransport, InputActionMap);
1235
1236 AddAction(ActionUnrestrainTargetHands, InputActionMap);
1237
1238 //AddAction(ActionPickupChicken, InputActionMap);
1239 //AddAction(ActionSwitchLights);
1240 //AddAction(ActionTakeMaterialToHands);
1241
1242 /*

1244 AddAction(AT_FOLD_BASEBUILDING_OBJECT);// TODO -> target

1257
1258 void SetActions() // Backwards compatibility, not recommended to use
1259 {
1260 }
1261
1262 void SetActionsRemoteTarget( out TInputActionMap InputActionMap)
1263 {
1264 AddAction(ActionCPR, InputActionMap);
1265 AddAction(ActionUncoverHeadTarget, InputActionMap);
1266 AddAction(ActionUngagTarget, InputActionMap);
1267 //AddAction(ActionCheckPulse, InputActionMap);
1268 AddAction(ActionPullBodyFromTransport, InputActionMap);
1269 AddAction(ActionCheckPulseTarget, InputActionMap);
1270 //AddAction(AT_GIVE_ITEM);
1271 }
1272
1273 void SetActionsRemoteTarget() // Backwards compatibility, not recommended to use
1274 {
1275 }
1276
1277 void InitializeActions()
1278 {
1279 // Backwards compatibility
1280 if (IsControlledPlayer())
1281 {
1282 m_InputActionMap = new TInputActionMap;
1283 SetActions();
1284 }
1285 else
1286 {
1287 m_InputActionMap = new TInputActionMap;
1288 SetActionsRemoteTarget();
1289 }
1291
1292 m_InputActionMapControled = new TInputActionMap;
1293 SetActions(m_InputActionMapControled);
1294
1295 m_InputActionMapAsTarget = new TInputActionMap;
1296 SetActionsRemoteTarget(m_InputActionMapAsTarget);
1297 }
1298
1299 override void GetActions(typename action_input_type, out array<ActionBase_Basic> actions)
1300 {
1301 if (!m_ActionsInitialize)
1302 {
1303 m_ActionsInitialize = true;
1304 InitializeActions();
1305 }
1306
1307 // Backwards compatibility
1308 array<ActionBase_Basic> bcActions = m_InputActionMap.Get(action_input_type);
1309 if (!bcActions)
1310 {
1311 if (IsControlledPlayer())
1312 actions = m_InputActionMapControled.Get(action_input_type);
1313 else
1314 actions = m_InputActionMapAsTarget.Get(action_input_type);
1315 }
1316 else
1317 {
1318 if (!actions)
1319 actions = new array<ActionBase_Basic>();
1320
1321 if (IsControlledPlayer())
1322 actions.InsertAll(m_InputActionMapControled.Get(action_input_type));
1323 else
1324 actions.InsertAll(m_InputActionMapAsTarget.Get(action_input_type));
1325
1326 actions.InsertAll(bcActions);
1327 }
1328 }
1329
1330 void AddAction(typename actionName, out TInputActionMap InputActionMap )
1331 {
1332 ActionBase action = GetActionManager().GetAction(actionName);
1333
1334 typename ai = action.GetInputType();
1335 if (!ai)
1336 {
1337 m_ActionsInitialize = false;
1338 return;
1339 }
1340
1341 ref array<ActionBase_Basic> action_array = InputActionMap.Get( ai );
1342
1343 if (!action_array)
1344 {
1345 action_array = new array<ActionBase_Basic>;
1346 InputActionMap.Insert(ai, action_array);
1347 }
1348 action_array.Insert(action);
1349 }
1350
1351 void AddAction(typename actionName) // Backwards compatibility, not recommended to use
1352 {
1353 AddAction(actionName, m_InputActionMap);
1354 }
1355
1356 void RemoveAction(typename actionName, out TInputActionMap InputActionMap)
1357 {
1358 ActionBase action = GetActionManager().GetAction(actionName);
1359 typename ai = action.GetInputType();
1360 ref array<ActionBase_Basic> action_array = InputActionMap.Get( ai );
1361
1362 if (action_array)
1363 {
1364 for (int i = 0; i < action_array.Count(); i++)
1365 {
1366 if (action == action_array.Get(i))
1367 {
1368 action_array.Remove(i);
1369 }
1370 }
1371 action_array = new array<ActionBase_Basic>;
1372 InputActionMap.Insert(ai, action_array);
1373 }
1374 action_array.Insert(action);
1375 }
1376
1377 void RemoveAction(typename actionName) // Backwards compatibility, not recommended to use
1378 {
1379 RemoveAction(actionName, m_InputActionMap);
1380 }
1381
1382 int GetCurrentRecipe()
1383 {
1384 return m_RecipePick;
1385 }
1386
1387 void SetNextRecipe()
1388 {
1389 m_RecipePick++;
1390 }
1391
1392 void SetFirstRecipe()
1393 {
1394 m_RecipePick = 0;
1395 }

1402 return m_ActionManager;
1403 }

1406 {
1407 return m_EmoteManager;
1408 }

1414/* VehicleManager GetVehicleManager()
1415 {
1416 return m_VehicleManager;
1417 }*/
1418
1420 override void OnLadder(float delta_time, HumanMovementState pState)
1421 {
1422 ProcessHandDamage(delta_time, pState);
1423 }
1424
1425 void ProcessHandDamage(float delta_time, HumanMovementState pState)
1426 {
1427 if( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
1428 {
1429 if(pState.m_iMovement == DayZPlayerConstants.MOVEMENTIDX_SLIDE)
1430 {
1431 //Print("sliding down");
1432 EntityAI gloves = GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.GLOVES);
1433
1434 if( gloves && gloves.GetHealthLevel() < 4 )
1435 {
1436 gloves.AddHealth("","", PlayerConstants.GLOVES_DAMAGE_SLIDING_LADDER_PER_SEC * delta_time);
1437 return;
1438 }
1439
1440 if( Math.RandomFloat01() < PlayerConstants.CHANCE_TO_BLEED_SLIDING_LADDER_PER_SEC * delta_time)
1441 {
1442 if(Math.RandomFloat01() < 0.5)
1443 {
1444 if(GetBleedingManagerServer().AttemptAddBleedingSourceBySelection("LeftForeArmRoll"))
1445 {
1446 SendSoundEvent(EPlayerSoundEventID.INJURED_LIGHT);
1447 }
1448 }
1449 else
1450 {
1451 if(GetBleedingManagerServer().AttemptAddBleedingSourceBySelection("RightForeArmRoll"))
1452 {
1453 SendSoundEvent(EPlayerSoundEventID.INJURED_LIGHT);
1454 }
1455 }
1456 }
1457
1458 }
1459 }
1460 }
1461
1462 override void ProcessFeetDamageServer(int pUserInt)
1463 {
1464 //InventorySlots.HEADGEAR
1465 EntityAI shoes = GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.FEET);
1466
1467 string surface; int liquid;
1468 GetGame().SurfaceUnderObject(this, surface, liquid);
1469 float modifier_surface = Surface.GetParamFloat(surface, "footDamage");
1470
1471 if( shoes && shoes.GetHealthLevel() < 4 )
1472 {
1473 shoes.AddHealth("","", - 1 * modifier_surface * PlayerConstants.SHOES_MOVEMENT_DAMAGE_PER_STEP * (float)PlayerConstants.CHECK_EVERY_N_STEP);
1474
1475 /*
1476 Print("modifier_surface:"+modifier_surface);
1477 Print(shoes.GetHealth("",""));
1478 */
1479 return;
1480 }
1481
1482 float rnd = Math.RandomFloat01();
1483
1484 float modifier_movement = GetFeetDamageMoveModifier();
1485
1486
1487
1488 /*
1489 Print(surface);
1490 Print(Surface.GetParamFloat(surface, "footDamage"));
1491 */
1492
1493 float chance = modifier_movement * modifier_surface * PlayerConstants.BAREFOOT_MOVEMENT_BLEED_MODIFIER * (float)PlayerConstants.CHECK_EVERY_N_STEP;
1494 //Print(chance);
1495 //Print("chance:" +chance);
1496 if( rnd < chance )
1497 {
1498 if(pUserInt % 2 == 0)
1499 {
1500 if(GetBleedingManagerServer().AttemptAddBleedingSourceBySelection("RightFoot"))
1501 {
1502 //added
1503 //Print("right foot bleeding");
1504 SendSoundEvent(EPlayerSoundEventID.INJURED_LIGHT);
1505
1506 }
1507
1508 }
1509 else
1510 {
1511 if(GetBleedingManagerServer().AttemptAddBleedingSourceBySelection("LeftFoot"))
1512 {
1513 //added
1514 //Print("left foot bleeding");
1515 SendSoundEvent(EPlayerSoundEventID.INJURED_LIGHT);
1516
1517 }
1518 }
1519 }
1520 }
1521
1522 float GetFeetDamageMoveModifier()
1523 {
1524 float modifier;
1525 switch(m_MovementState.m_iMovement)
1526 {
1527 case DayZPlayerConstants.MOVEMENTIDX_SPRINT:
1528 modifier = 1;
1529 break
1530 case DayZPlayerConstants.MOVEMENTIDX_RUN:
1531 modifier = 0.5;
1532 break
1533 case DayZPlayerConstants.MOVEMENTIDX_WALK:
1534 modifier = 0;
1535 break
1536 }
1537 return modifier;
1538 }
1539
1540 void SetStamina( int value, int range )
1541 {
1542 if ( m_ModulePlayerStatus )
1543 m_ModulePlayerStatus.SetStamina( value, range );
1544 }
1545

1548 {
1549 if (m_StaminaHandler)
1550 {
1551 m_StaminaHandler.SetStaminaEnabled(value);
1552 }
1553 }
1554 #endif

1595
1596 bool CanBeRestrained()
1597 {
1598 if( IsInVehicle() || IsRaised() || IsSwimming() || IsClimbing() || IsClimbingLadder() || IsRestrained() || !GetWeaponManager() || GetWeaponManager().IsRunning() || !GetActionManager() || GetActionManager().GetRunningAction() != null || IsMapOpen() )
1599 {
1600 return false;
1601 }
1602 if( GetThrowing() && GetThrowing().IsThrowingModeEnabled() )
1603 {
1604 return false;
1605 }
1606 return true;
1607 }
1608
1609 void SetRestrainStarted(bool restrain_started)
1610 {
1611 m_IsRestrainStarted = restrain_started;
1612 SetSynchDirty();
1613 }
1614
1615 bool IsRestrainStarted()
1616 {
1617 return m_IsRestrainStarted;
1618 }
1619
1620 void SetRestrainPrelocked(bool restrain_prelock)
1621 {
1622 m_IsRestrainPrelocked = restrain_prelock;
1623 SetSynchDirty();
1624 }
1625
1626 bool IsRestrainPrelocked()
1627 {
1628 return m_IsRestrainPrelocked;
1629 }
1630
1631 void SetRestrained(bool is_restrained)
1632 {
1633 m_IsRestrained = is_restrained;
1634 SetSynchDirty();
1635 }
1636
1637 override bool IsRestrained()
1638 {
1639 return m_IsRestrained;
1640 }
1641
1642 override bool IsInventoryVisible()
1643 {
1644 return true;
1645 }
1646
1647 bool CanManipulateInventory()
1648 {
1649 if( IsControlledPlayer() )
1650 {
1651 return !IsRestrained() && !IsRestrainPrelocked();
1652 }
1653 return true;
1654 }

1669 }

1672 {
1673 return super.CanSwapItemInCargo(child_entity, new_entity);
1674 }
1675
1676 override bool CanReceiveItemIntoHands(EntityAI item_to_hands)
1677 {
1678 if ( IsInVehicle() )
1679 return false;
1680
1681 if ( !CanPickupHeavyItem(item_to_hands) )
1682 return false;
1683
1684 return super.CanReceiveItemIntoHands(item_to_hands);
1685 }
1686

1688 {
1689 return super.CanSaveItemInHands(item_in_hands);
1690 }
1691

1693 {
1694 return super.CanReleaseFromHands(handheld);
1695 }

1697 int GetCraftingRecipeID()
1698 {
1699 if( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
1700 {
1701 return GetCraftingManager().GetRecipeID();
1702 }
1703 else
1704 {
1705 return m_RecipeID;
1706 }
1707 }
1708
1709 void SetCraftingRecipeID(int recipeID)
1710 {
1711 if( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
1712 {
1713 GetCraftingManager().SetRecipeID(recipeID);
1714 }
1715 else
1716 {
1717 m_RecipeID = recipeID;
1718 }
1719 }

1766 // --------------------------------------------------
1767 // QuickBar
1768 //---------------------------------------------------
1769
1770 void RemoveQuickBarEntityShortcut(EntityAI entity)
1771 {
1772 int index = m_QuickBarBase.FindEntityIndex(entity);
1773 if(index != -1)
1774 m_QuickBarBase.SetEntityShortcut(entity,-1);
1775 }
1776 //---------------------------------------------------
1777 void SetEnableQuickBarEntityShortcut(EntityAI entity, bool value)
1778 {
1779 int index = m_QuickBarBase.FindEntityIndex(entity);
1780 if(index != -1)
1781 m_QuickBarBase.SetShotcutEnable(index,value);
1782
1783 }
1784 //---------------------------------------------------
1785 int FindQuickBarEntityIndex(EntityAI entity)
1786 {
1787 int index;
1788 index = m_QuickBarBase.FindEntityIndex(entity);
1789
1790 if(m_QuickBarBase.GetEntity(index) == NULL )
1791 return -1;
1792
1793 return index;
1794 }
1795 //---------------------------------------------------
1796
1797 int GetQuickBarSize()
1798 {
1799 return m_QuickBarBase.GetSize();
1800 }
1801 //---------------------------------------------------
1802 EntityAI GetQuickBarEntity(int index)
1803 {
1804 return m_QuickBarBase.GetEntity(index);
1805 }
1806 //---------------------------------------------------
1807 void UpdateQuickBarEntityVisibility(EntityAI entity)
1808 {
1809 int i = FindQuickBarEntityIndex(entity);
1810 if( i >= 0 )
1811 m_QuickBarBase.UpdateShotcutVisibility(i);
1812 }
1813 //---------------------------------------------------
1814 void SetQuickBarEntityShortcut(EntityAI entity, int index, bool force = false )
1815 {
1816 m_QuickBarBase.SetEntityShortcut(entity, index, force);
1817 }
1818 //---------------------------------------------------
1819 void OnQuickbarSetEntityRequest(ParamsReadContext ctx)
1820 {
1821 m_QuickBarBase.OnSetEntityRequest(ctx);
1822 }
1823 //---------------------------------------------------
1824
1825 // Applies splint on all limbs.
1826 void ApplySplint()
1827 {
1828 float add_health_coef = 0.33;
1829 // The idea is to slightly increase health of broken limb so the player is still limping. Using more splints will help but each time less. 100% recovery can be achieved only through long term healing.
1830 if (GetBrokenLegs() == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS)
1831 {
1832 AddHealth("LeftLeg", "Health", ( GetMaxHealth("LeftLeg", "Health") - GetHealth("LeftLeg", "Health") ) * add_health_coef );
1833 AddHealth("RightLeg", "Health", ( GetMaxHealth("RightLeg", "Health") - GetHealth("RightLeg", "Health") ) * add_health_coef );
1834 AddHealth("RightFoot", "Health", ( GetMaxHealth("RightFoot", "Health") - GetHealth("RightFoot", "Health") ) * add_health_coef );
1835 AddHealth("LeftFoot", "Health", ( GetMaxHealth("LeftFoot", "Health") - GetHealth("LeftFoot", "Health") ) * add_health_coef );
1836 }
1837 }
1838
1839 void ProcessDrowning(float dT)
1840 {
1841 GetStaminaHandler().DepleteStamina(EStaminaModifiers.DROWN,dT );
1842 PPERequester_Drowning req = PPERequester_Drowning.Cast(PPERequesterBank.GetRequester( PPERequesterBank.REQ_DROWNING ));
1843
1844 req.SetStamina01(GetStaminaHandler().GetStaminaNormalized());
1845
1846 }
1847
1848 void ProcessHoldBreath(float dT)
1849 {
1850 if ( IsTryingHoldBreath() && CanStartConsumingStamina(EStaminaConsumers.HOLD_BREATH) )
1851 {
1852 DepleteStamina(EStaminaModifiers.HOLD_BREATH,dT);
1853 if( !m_IsHoldingBreath )
1854 {
1855 OnHoldBreathStart();
1856 m_IsHoldingBreath = true;
1857 }
1858 }
1859 else if ( IsTryingHoldBreath() && m_IsHoldingBreath && CanConsumeStamina(EStaminaConsumers.HOLD_BREATH) )
1860 {
1861 DepleteStamina(EStaminaModifiers.HOLD_BREATH,dT);
1862 }
1863 else
1864 {
1865 if ( m_IsHoldingBreath ) OnHoldBreathEnd();
1866 m_IsHoldingBreath = false;
1867 }
1868 }
1869
1870 void OnHoldBreathStart()
1871 {
1872 //SendSoundEvent(SoundSetMap.GetSoundSetID("holdBreath_male_Char_SoundSet"));
1873 RequestSoundEventEx(EPlayerSoundEventID.HOLD_BREATH, true, EPlayerSoundEventParam.SKIP_CONTROLLED_PLAYER );
1874 }
1875
1876 void OnHoldBreathExhausted()
1877 {
1878 RequestSoundEventEx(EPlayerSoundEventID.EXHAUSTED_BREATH, true, EPlayerSoundEventParam.SKIP_CONTROLLED_PLAYER );
1879 }
1880
1881 void OnHoldBreathEnd()
1882 {
1883 //SendSoundEvent(SoundSetMap.GetSoundSetID("releaseBreath_male_Char_SoundSet"));
1884 RequestSoundEventEx(EPlayerSoundEventID.RELEASE_BREATH, true, EPlayerSoundEventParam.SKIP_CONTROLLED_PLAYER );
1885 }
1886
1887 override bool IsHoldingBreath()
1888 {
1889 return m_IsHoldingBreath;
1890 }
1891
1892 override bool IsRefresherSignalingViable()
1893 {
1894 return false;
1895 }
1896
1897 eMixedSoundStates GetMixedSoundStates()
1898 {
1899 return m_MixedSoundStates;
1900 }
1901
1902 AbstractWave SaySoundSet(string name)
1903 {
1904 if( m_SaySoundLastSetName != name )
1905 {
1906 m_SaySoundParams = new SoundParams(name);
1907 m_SaySoundBuilder = new SoundObjectBuilder(m_SaySoundParams);
1908
1909 m_SaySoundLastSetName = name;
1910 }
1911
1912 m_SaySoundObject = m_SaySoundBuilder.BuildSoundObject();
1913 m_SaySoundObject.SetPosition(GetPosition());
1914 return GetGame().GetSoundScene().Play3D(m_SaySoundObject, m_SaySoundBuilder);
1915 }
1916
1917 EntityAI FindCargoByBaseType(string searched_item)
1918 {
1919 EntityAI attachment;
1920 string item_name;
1921 int attcount = this.GetInventory().AttachmentCount();
1922
1923 for (int att = 0; att < attcount; att++)
1924 {
1925 attachment = GetInventory().GetAttachmentFromIndex(att);
1926 if ( attachment.IsItemBase() )
1927 {
1928 item_name = attachment.GetType();
1929 if ( GetGame().IsKindOf(item_name, searched_item) )
1930 {
1931 return attachment;
1932 }
1933 }
1934 }
1935 return NULL;
1936 }
1937
1938 void InitEditor()
1939 {
1940 if ( GetGame().IsDebug() )
1941 {
1942 if ( !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().GetPlayer() && GetGame().GetPlayer().GetID() == this.GetID() )
1943 {
1944 PluginSceneManager scene_editor = PluginSceneManager.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginSceneManager) );
1945 scene_editor.InitLoad();
1946 }
1947 }
1948 }
1949
1950 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1951 void OnPlayerLoaded()
1952 {
1953 InitEditor();
1954
1955 if ( GetGame().IsMultiplayer() || GetGame().IsServer() )
1956 {
1957 m_ModuleLifespan.SynchLifespanVisual( this, m_LifeSpanState, m_HasBloodyHandsVisible, m_HasBloodTypeVisible, m_BloodType );
1958 }
1959
1960 if (IsControlledPlayer())//true only on client for the controlled character
1961 {
1962 if (!m_VirtualHud)
1963 m_VirtualHud = new VirtualHud(this);
1964 if ( m_Hud )
1965 {
1966 m_Hud.UpdateBloodName();
1967 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_DeathDarkening).Stop();
1968 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_ShockHitReaction).Stop();
1969 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_UnconEffects).Stop(); //TODO - stop en mass...check if effects do not terminate (spawning inside of contaminated area)?!
1970 GetGame().GetUIManager().CloseAll();
1971 GetGame().GetMission().SetPlayerRespawning(false);
1972 GetGame().GetMission().OnPlayerRespawned(this);
1973
1974 m_Hud.ShowHudUI(true);
1975 m_Hud.ShowQuickbarUI(true);
1976 #ifdef PLATFORM_CONSOLE
1977 m_Hud.ShowQuickBar(GetGame().GetInput().IsEnabledMouseAndKeyboardEvenOnServer()); //temporary solution
1978 #else
1979 m_Hud.ShowQuickBar(g_Game.GetProfileOption(EDayZProfilesOptions.QUICKBAR));
1980 #endif
1981 }
1982 m_EffectWidgets = GetGame().GetMission().GetEffectWidgets();
1983 }
1984 if (!GetGame().IsDedicatedServer())
1985 {
1986 GetGame().GetCallQueue(CALL_CATEGORY_GUI).CallLater(UpdateCorpseStateVisual, 2000, false);//sometimes it takes a while to load in
1987 m_PlayerSoundEventHandler = new PlayerSoundEventHandler(this);
1988 }
1989 int slot_id = InventorySlots.GetSlotIdFromString("Head");
1990 m_CharactersHead = Head_Default.Cast(GetInventory().FindPlaceholderForSlot( slot_id ));
1991 CheckHairClippingOnCharacterLoad();
1992 UpdateHairSelectionVisibility();
1993 PreloadDecayTexture();
1994
1995 Weapon_Base wpn = Weapon_Base.Cast(GetItemInHands());
1996 if (wpn)
1997 wpn.ValidateAndRepair();
1998 /*
1999 PreloadDecayTexture();
2000 UpdateCorpseStateVisual();
2001 */
2002 m_PlayerLoaded = true;
2003
2004 //Print("PlayerBase | OnPlayerLoaded()");
2005
2006 }
2007
2008 void SetPlayerDisconnected(bool state)
2009 {
2010 m_PlayerDisconnectProcessed = state;
2011 }
2012
2013 bool IsPlayerDisconnected()
2014 {
2015 return m_PlayerDisconnectProcessed;
2016 }
2017
2018 // --------------------------------------------------
2019 // Advanced placement
2020 //---------------------------------------------------
2021
2022 //get hologram
2023 Hologram GetHologramServer()
2024 {
2025 return m_HologramServer;
2026 }
2027
2028 Hologram GetHologramLocal()
2029 {
2030 return m_HologramLocal;
2031 }
2032
2033 void PlacingStartServer(ItemBase item)
2034 {
2035 if (item)
2036 {
2037 m_HologramServer = new Hologram(this, GetLocalProjectionPosition(), item);
2038 GetHologramServer().SetProjectionPosition(GetLocalProjectionPosition());
2039 GetHologramServer().SetProjectionOrientation(GetLocalProjectionOrientation());
2040 GetHologramServer().GetProjectionEntity().OnPlacementStarted(this);
2041 GetHologramServer().CheckPowerSource();
2042 GetHologramServer().RefreshVisual();
2043 }
2044 }
2045
2046 void PlacingStartLocal(ItemBase item)
2047 {
2048 if (GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsServer())
2049 return;
2050
2051 if (item)
2052 {
2053 m_HologramLocal = new Hologram(this, GetLocalProjectionPosition(), item);
2054 GetHologramLocal().GetProjectionEntity().OnPlacementStarted(this);
2055 }
2056 }
2057
2058 void PlacingCancelServer()
2059 {
2060 EntityAI entity_in_hands = GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands();
2061
2062 if ( IsPlacingServer() )
2063 {
2064 GetHologramServer().GetParentEntity().OnPlacementCancelled( this );
2065
2066 delete m_HologramServer;
2067 return;
2068 }
2069 else if ( entity_in_hands && entity_in_hands.HasEnergyManager() )
2070 {
2071 if ( entity_in_hands.GetCompEM().IsPlugged() )
2072 {
2073 entity_in_hands.OnPlacementCancelled( this );
2074 }
2075 }
2076 }
2077
2078 //Called when item placement is canceled, will prevent quickbar usage until the item the player was placing is back in hands
2079 void LockHandsUntilItemHeld()
2080 {
2081 m_AreHandsLocked = true;
2082 }
2083
2084 void PlacingCancelLocal()
2085 {
2086 EntityAI entity_in_hands = GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands();
2087 if ( entity_in_hands && entity_in_hands.HasEnergyManager() )
2088 {
2089 if ( entity_in_hands.GetCompEM().IsPlugged() )
2090 {
2091 entity_in_hands.OnPlacementCancelled( this );
2092 }
2093 }
2094 delete m_HologramLocal;
2095 }
2096
2097 void PlacingCompleteServer()
2098 {
2099 delete m_HologramServer;
2100 }
2101
2102 void PlacingCompleteLocal()
2103 {
2104 delete m_HologramLocal;
2105 }
2106
2107 bool IsPlacingServer()
2108 {
2109 if ( m_HologramServer )
2110 {
2111 return true;
2112 }
2113 else
2114 {
2115 return false;
2116 }
2117 }
2118
2119 bool IsPlacingLocal()
2120 {
2121 if ( m_HologramLocal )
2122 {
2123 return true;
2124 }
2125
2126 return false;
2127 }
2128
2129 void SetDrowning(bool enable)
2130 {
2131 if (enable != m_IsDrowning)
2132 {
2133 if (enable)
2134 {
2135 OnDrowningStart();
2136 }
2137 else
2138 {
2139 OnDrowningEnd();
2140 }
2141 }
2142 m_IsDrowning = enable;
2143
2144 }
2145
2146 void OnDrowningStart()
2147 {
2148 #ifndef SERVER
2149 if (IsControlledPlayer())
2150 {
2151 PPERequester_Drowning req = PPERequester_Drowning.Cast(PPERequesterBank.GetRequester( PPERequesterBank.REQ_DROWNING ));
2152 req.Start();
2153 }
2154 #endif
2155 }
2156
2157 void OnDrowningEnd()
2158 {
2159 #ifndef SERVER
2160 if (IsControlledPlayer())
2161 {
2162 PPERequester_Drowning req = PPERequester_Drowning.Cast(PPERequesterBank.GetRequester( PPERequesterBank.REQ_DROWNING ));
2163 req.Stop();
2164 }
2165 #endif
2166 }
2167
2168 bool TogglePlacingServer( int userDataType, ParamsReadContext ctx )
2169 {
2170 if ( userDataType == INPUT_UDT_ADVANCED_PLACEMENT )
2171 {
2172 PlacingCancelServer();
2173 return true;
2174 }
2175
2176 return false;
2177 }
2178
2179 void RequestResetADSSync()
2180 {
2181 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT && GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
2182 {
2183 if (ScriptInputUserData.CanStoreInputUserData())
2184 {
2185 ScriptInputUserData ctx = new ScriptInputUserData;
2186 ctx.Write(INPUT_UDT_RESET_ADS);
2187 ctx.Send();
2188 }
2189 }
2190 else if (!GetGame().IsMultiplayer())
2191 {
2192 m_ResetADS = true;
2193 }
2194 }
2195
2197 bool ResetADSPlayerSync( int userDataType, ParamsReadContext ctx )
2198 {
2199 if ( userDataType == INPUT_UDT_RESET_ADS )
2200 {
2201 ScriptJunctureData pCtx = new ScriptJunctureData;
2202 SendSyncJuncture(DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_ADS_RESET,pCtx);
2203 return true;
2204 }
2205
2206 return false;
2207 }
2208
2209 void SetUnderground(EUndergroundPresence presence)
2210 {
2211 m_UndergroundPresence = presence;
2212 }
2213
2214 void TogglePlacingLocal(ItemBase item = null)
2215 {
2216 if ( IsPlacingLocal() )
2217 {
2218 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT && GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
2219 {
2220 if (ScriptInputUserData.CanStoreInputUserData())
2221 {
2222 ScriptInputUserData ctx = new ScriptInputUserData;
2223 ctx.Write(INPUT_UDT_ADVANCED_PLACEMENT);
2224 ctx.Send();
2225 }
2226 }
2227 PlacingCancelLocal();
2228 }
2229 else if (!item)
2230 {
2231 PlacingStartLocal( GetItemInHands() );
2232 }
2233 else
2234 {
2235 PlacingStartLocal(item);
2236 }
2237 }
2238

2240 {
2241 m_LocalProjectionPosition = local_position;
2242 }
2243
2244 void SetLocalProjectionOrientation( vector local_orientation )
2245 {
2246 m_LocalProjectionOrientation = local_orientation;
2247 }
2248
2249 vector GetLocalProjectionPosition()
2250 {
2251 return m_LocalProjectionPosition;
2252 }
2253
2254 vector GetLocalProjectionOrientation()
2255 {
2256 return m_LocalProjectionOrientation;
2257 }

2260 void AddToEnvironmentTemperature(float pTemperature) {};

2267 m_IsInWater = pState;
2268 SetSynchDirty();
2269 }
2270
2271 bool IsInWater()
2272 {
2273 return m_IsInWater;
2274 }
2275
2276 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
2277 void ~PlayerBase()
2278 {
2279 if ( GetGame() && ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() ) )
2280 {
2281 ClientData.RemovePlayerBase( this );
2282 SetContaminatedEffectEx(false);
2283 }
2284
2285 SEffectManager.DestroyEffect(m_FliesEff);
2286// ErrorEx("DbgFlies | StopSoundSet | exit 2 ",ErrorExSeverity.INFO );
2287 StopSoundSet(m_SoundFliesEffect);
2288 }
2289
2290 void OnCameraChanged(DayZPlayerCameraBase new_camera)
2291 {
2292 m_CameraSwayModifier = new_camera.GetWeaponSwayModifier();
2293 m_CurrentCamera = new_camera;
2294 }
2295
2296 DayZPlayerCamera GetCurrentPlayerCamera()
2297 {
2298 return m_CurrentCamera;
2299 }
2300
2301 bool IsCurrentCameraAimedAtGround()
2302 {
2303 if (!m_CurrentCamera)
2304 return false;
2305
2306 return m_CurrentCamera.GetCurrentPitch() < PlayerConstants.CAMERA_THRESHOLD_PITCH;
2307 }

2321 return m_SymptomManager;

2324 {

2326 {
2327 m_VirtualHud = new VirtualHud(this);

2329 return m_VirtualHud;

2481
2482 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2483 void OnScheduledTick(float deltaTime)
2484 {
2485 if ( !IsPlayerSelected() || !IsAlive() )
2486 return;
2487 if ( m_ModifiersManager )
2488 m_ModifiersManager.OnScheduledTick(deltaTime);
2489 if ( m_NotifiersManager )
2490 m_NotifiersManager.OnScheduledTick();
2491 if ( m_TrasferValues )
2492 m_TrasferValues.OnScheduledTick(deltaTime);
2493 if ( m_VirtualHud )
2494 m_VirtualHud.OnScheduledTick();
2495 if ( GetBleedingManagerServer() )
2496 GetBleedingManagerServer().OnTick(deltaTime);
2497 if ( m_Environment )
2498 m_Environment.Update(deltaTime);
2499
2500 // Check if electric device needs to be unplugged
2501 ItemBase heldItem = GetItemInHands();
2502 if ( heldItem && heldItem.HasEnergyManager() && heldItem.GetCompEM().IsPlugged() )
2503 {
2504 // Now we know we are working with an electric device which is plugged into a power source.
2505 EntityAI placed_entity = heldItem;
2506
2507 // Unplug the device when the player is too far from the power source.
2508 placed_entity.GetCompEM().UpdatePlugState();
2509 }
2510 }
2511
2512 void OnCommandHandlerTick(float delta_time, int pCurrentCommandID)
2513 {
2514 if ( !IsAlive() )
2515 {
2516 if ( !m_DeathSyncSent && m_KillerData )
2517 {
2518 SyncEvents.SendEntityKilled(this, m_KillerData.m_Killer, m_KillerData.m_MurderWeapon, m_KillerData.m_KillerHiTheBrain);
2519 //Print("Sending Death Sync, yay! Headshot by killer = " + m_KillerData.m_KillerHiTheBrain);
2520 //Print("And was he killed by headshot in general? = " + m_KilledByHeadshot);
2521 m_DeathSyncSent = true;
2522 }
2523 return;
2524 }
2525 if ( m_DebugMonitorValues )
2526 m_DebugMonitorValues.OnScheduledTick(delta_time);
2527 if ( GetSymptomManager() )
2528 GetSymptomManager().OnTick(delta_time, pCurrentCommandID, m_MovementState);//needs to stay in command handler tick as it's playing animations
2529 //if( GetBleedingManagerServer() ) GetBleedingManagerServer().OnTick(delta_time);
2530
2531 DayZPlayerInstanceType instType = GetInstanceType();
2532 if ( instType == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
2533 {
2534 if ( m_PlayerSoundEventHandler )
2535 m_PlayerSoundEventHandler.OnTick(delta_time);
2536
2537 if (m_ProcessRemoveEffectWidgets && m_ProcessRemoveEffectWidgets.Count() > 0)
2538 {
2539 m_EffectWidgets.RemoveActiveEffects(m_ProcessRemoveEffectWidgets);
2540 }
2541
2542 if (m_ProcessAddEffectWidgets && m_ProcessAddEffectWidgets.Count() > 0)
2543 {
2544 m_EffectWidgets.AddActiveEffects(m_ProcessAddEffectWidgets);
2545 }
2546
2547 HandleGlassesEffect();
2548
2549 if (m_ContaminatedAreaEffectEnabled)
2550 ContaminatedParticleAdjustment();
2551
2552 #ifdef DIAG_DEVELOPER
2553 if ( m_WeaponDebug )
2554 {
2555 m_WeaponDebug.OnCommandHandlerUpdate();
2556 }
2557 #endif
2558
2559 m_ProcessAddEffectWidgets.Clear(); //clears array for remotes as well
2560 m_ProcessRemoveEffectWidgets.Clear(); //clears array for remotes as well
2561 }
2562
2563 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.None;
2564
2565 if (CfgGameplayHandler.GetAllowStaminaAffectInertia())
2566 UpdateMovementInertia();
2567 }
2568
2570 void UpdateMovementInertia()
2571 {
2572 HumanCommandMove hcm = GetCommand_Move();
2573 if (hcm)
2574 {
2575 float staminaPercentage = GetStaminaHandler().GetSyncedStaminaNormalized();
2576 hcm.SetTurnSpanSprintModifier(2 - staminaPercentage);
2577 hcm.SetRunSprintFilterModifier((2 - staminaPercentage) * 0.5);
2578 hcm.SetDirectionSprintFilterModifier(2 - staminaPercentage);
2579 }
2580 }
2581
2582 bool m_ShowDbgUI = true;
2583 int m_DbgListSelection = 0;
2584 float m_DbgSliderValue = 0.0;
2585 ref array<string> m_DbgOptions = {"jedna", "dva", "tri"};
2586
2587 NotifiersManager GetNotifiersManager()
2588 {
2589 return m_NotifiersManager;
2590 }
2591 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2592 void OnTick()
2593 {
2594 float deltaT = (GetGame().GetTime() - m_LastTick) / 1000;
2595 if ( m_LastTick < 0 ) deltaT = 0;//first tick protection
2596 m_LastTick = GetGame().GetTime();
2597
2598 //PrintString("deltaT: " + deltaT);
2599 //PrintString("at time: " + m_LastTick);
2600 OnScheduledTick(deltaT);
2601
2602
2603 }
2604 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
2605 override void EEItemIntoHands(EntityAI item)
2606 {
2607 super.EEItemIntoHands( item );
2608
2609 if ( item )
2610 {
2611 Weapon_Base w;
2612 if ( Class.CastTo(w, item) )
2613 {
2614 w.ResetWeaponAnimState();
2615
2616 HumanCommandMove cm = GetCommand_Move();
2617 if ( cm )
2618 {
2619 cm.SetMeleeBlock( false );
2620 GetMeleeFightLogic().SetBlock( false );
2621 }
2622 }
2623
2625 if ( item.IsHeavyBehaviour() && IsRaised() )
2626 {
2627 HumanCommandMove cm2 = GetCommand_Move();
2628 if ( cm2 )
2629 {
2630 cm2.ForceStance(DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_ERECT);
2631 }
2632 }
2633 }
2634
2635 //SetOpticsPreload(true,item);
2636 }
2637
2638 override void EEItemOutOfHands(EntityAI item)
2639 {
2640 super.EEItemOutOfHands( item );
2641 if ( IsPlacingLocal() )
2642 {
2643 GetGame().GetCallQueue(CALL_CATEGORY_SYSTEM).Call(TogglePlacingLocal);
2644 }
2645
2646 if ( !IsAlive() )
2647 OnItemInHandsChanged();
2648
2649 //SetOpticsPreload(false,item);
2650 }
2651
2652 PlayerStomach GetStomach()
2653 {
2654 return m_PlayerStomach;
2655 }
2656
2657 override void CommandHandler(float pDt, int pCurrentCommandID, bool pCurrentCommandFinished)
2658 {
2659 // lower implement
2660 super.CommandHandler(pDt,pCurrentCommandID,pCurrentCommandFinished);
2661 //PrintString("pCurrentCommandID="+pCurrentCommandID.ToString());
2662 //PrintString(GetActionManager().GetRunningAction().ToString());
2663 m_dT = pDt;
2664
2665 CheckZeroSoundEvent();
2666 CheckSendSoundEvent();
2667
2668 ProcessADDModifier();
2669
2670 if(m_BrokenLegsJunctureReceived)//was there a change in broken legs state ?
2671 {
2672 m_BrokenLegsJunctureReceived = false;
2673 bool initial = m_BrokenLegState < 0;//negative values indicate initial activation
2674
2675 if ( GetBrokenLegs() == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS )
2676 {
2677 DropHeavyItem();
2678 if (initial)
2679 {
2680 BrokenLegForceProne();
2681 }
2682 }
2683 }
2684
2685 GetDayZPlayerInventory().HandleInventory(pDt);
2686
2687 if (m_IsFireWeaponRaised)
2688 {
2689 ProcessHoldBreath(pDt);
2690 }
2691
2692 ActionManagerBase mngr = GetActionManager();
2693 HumanInputController hic = GetInputController();
2694
2695 if (m_AreHandsLocked && GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands())
2696 {
2697 m_AreHandsLocked = false;
2698 }
2699
2700 // freelook camera memory for weapon raycast
2701 if (hic.CameraIsFreeLook() && m_DirectionToCursor == vector.Zero)
2702 {
2703 m_DirectionToCursor = GetGame().GetCurrentCameraDirection();
2704 }
2705 else if (!hic.CameraIsFreeLook() && m_DirectionToCursor != vector.Zero)
2706 {
2707 m_DirectionToCursor = vector.Zero;
2708 }
2709
2710 if ( m_WeaponManager )
2711 {
2712 m_WeaponManager.Update(pDt);
2713 }
2714 if ( m_EmoteManager && IsPlayerSelected() )
2715 {
2716 m_EmoteManager.Update(pDt);
2717 //Print("selected! " + IsPlayerSelected());
2718 }
2719 if ( m_RGSManager )
2720 {
2721 m_RGSManager.Update();
2722 }
2723/* if( m_VehicleManager )
2724 {
2725 m_VehicleManager.Update(pDt);
2726 }*/
2727 if ( m_StanceIndicator )
2728 {
2729 m_StanceIndicator.Update();
2730 }
2731 if ( m_StaminaHandler )
2732 {
2733 m_StaminaHandler.Update(pDt, pCurrentCommandID);
2734 }
2735 if ( m_InjuryHandler )
2736 {
2737 m_InjuryHandler.Update(pDt);
2738 }
2739 if ( m_HCAnimHandler )
2740 {
2741 m_HCAnimHandler.Update(pDt, m_MovementState);
2742 }
2743 if ( m_ShockHandler )
2744 {
2745 m_ShockHandler.Update(pDt);
2746 }
2747
2748 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
2749 {
2750 GetPlayerSoundManagerServer().Update();
2751 ShockRefill(pDt);
2752 FreezeCheck();
2753 }
2754
2755 GetHumanInventory().Update(pDt);
2756 if (m_IsDrowning)
2757 {
2758 ProcessDrowning(pDt);
2759 }
2760 UpdateDelete();
2761 //PrintString(pCurrentCommandID.ToString());
2762 //PrintString(m_IsUnconscious.ToString());
2763 //PrintString("currentCommand:" +pCurrentCommandID.ToString());
2764
2765 HandleDamageHit(pCurrentCommandID);
2766
2767 if (mngr && hic)
2768 {
2769 mngr.Update(pCurrentCommandID);
2770
2771 //PrintString(m_ShouldBeUnconscious.ToString());
2772 if (pCurrentCommandID == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_UNCONSCIOUS)
2773 {
2774 if ( !m_UnconsciousDebug )
2775 {
2776 OnUnconsciousUpdate(pDt, m_LastCommandBeforeUnconscious );
2777 if ( !m_IsUnconscious )
2778 {
2779 m_IsUnconscious = true;
2780 OnUnconsciousStart();
2781 }
2782 if ( !m_ShouldBeUnconscious && m_UnconsciousTime > 2 )//m_UnconsciousTime > x -> protection for a player being broken when attempting to wake him up too early into unconsciousness
2783 {
2784
2785 HumanCommandUnconscious hcu = GetCommand_Unconscious();
2786 if (hcu)
2787 {
2788 if (m_LastCommandBeforeUnconscious == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_VEHICLE)
2789 hcu.WakeUp();
2790 else
2791 hcu.WakeUp(DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE);
2792 }
2793 }
2794 }
2795 }
2796 else
2797 {
2798 if (m_ShouldBeUnconscious && pCurrentCommandID != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_UNCONSCIOUS && pCurrentCommandID != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_DEATH && pCurrentCommandID != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_FALL && pCurrentCommandID != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_MOD_DAMAGE && pCurrentCommandID != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_DAMAGE)
2799 {
2800 m_LastCommandBeforeUnconscious = pCurrentCommandID;
2801 HumanCommandVehicle vehicleCommand = GetCommand_Vehicle();
2802 if ( vehicleCommand )
2803 {
2804 if (vehicleCommand.ShouldBeKnockedOut())
2805 {
2806 m_TransportCache = null;
2807 vehicleCommand.KnockedOutVehicle();
2808 int damageHitAnim = 1;
2809 float damageHitDir = 0;
2810 StartCommand_Damage(damageHitAnim, m_DamageHitDir);
2811 TryHideItemInHands(false,true);
2812 }
2813 else
2814 {
2815 m_TransportCache = vehicleCommand.GetTransport();
2816 }
2817 }
2818 StartCommand_Unconscious(0);
2819 }
2820 if ( m_IsUnconscious /*&& pCurrentCommandID != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_DEATH*/)
2821 {
2822 m_IsUnconscious = false;
2823 OnUnconsciousStop(pCurrentCommandID);
2824 }
2825 }
2826
2827 // quickbar use
2828 int quickBarSlot = hic.IsQuickBarSlot();
2829 if ( quickBarSlot && IsAlive())
2830 {
2831 if (hic.IsQuickBarSingleUse())
2832 {
2833 OnQuickBarSingleUse(quickBarSlot);
2834 //Print("PlayerBase.c IsQuickBarSingleUse - slot: " + quickBarSlot.ToString());
2835 }
2836 if (hic.IsQuickBarContinuousUseStart() && ((!GetGame().IsDedicatedServer()) && !GetGame().GetUIManager().GetMenu()))
2837 {
2838 OnQuickBarContinuousUseStart(quickBarSlot);
2839 //Print("PlayerBase.c IsQuickBarContinuousUseStart - slot: " + quickBarSlot.ToString());
2840 }
2841 if (hic.IsQuickBarContinuousUseEnd() && ((!GetGame().IsDedicatedServer())))
2842 {
2843 OnQuickBarContinuousUseEnd(quickBarSlot);
2844 //Print("PlayerBase.c IsQuickBarContinuousUseEnd - slot: " + quickBarSlot.ToString());
2845 }
2846 }
2847
2848 /*if ((pCurrentCommandID == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_ACTION || pCurrentCommandID == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_MOVE || pCurrentCommandID == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_LADDER || pCurrentCommandID == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_SWIM ) )
2849 {
2850 mngr.Update(); // checks for suitable action and sets it
2851 }*/
2852 }
2853 if (m_StaminaHandler && hic)
2854 {
2856 if ( !CanConsumeStamina(EStaminaConsumers.SPRINT) || !CanSprint() )
2857 {
2858 hic.LimitsDisableSprint(true);
2859 }
2860 else
2861 {
2862 hic.LimitsDisableSprint(false);
2863 }
2864 }
2865
2866 //map closing - feel free to move to different "update" if it does not belong here
2867 if ( IsMapOpen() )
2868 {
2869 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
2870 {
2871 if ( !CfgGameplayHandler.GetUse3DMap() && !GetGame().GetUIManager().IsMenuOpen(MENU_MAP) )
2872 {
2873 CloseMapEx(false);
2874 }
2875 else if ( CfgGameplayHandler.GetUse3DMap() )
2876 {
2877 if ( IsMapCallbackCancelInput() )
2878 {
2879 CloseMapEx(true);
2880 }
2881 else if ( IsMapCallbackEndInput() )
2882 {
2883 CloseMapEx(false);
2884 }
2885 }
2886 }
2887 }
2888
2889
2890#ifdef BOT
2891 if (m_Bot)
2892 m_Bot.OnUpdate(pDt);
2893#endif
2894
2895 if (m_CheckMeleeItem && (!GetGame().IsDedicatedServer()))
2896 {
2897 CheckMeleeItemDamage(m_CheckMeleeItem);
2898 SetCheckMeleeItem();
2899 }
2900
2901 #ifdef DEVELOPER
2902 TryGetInVehicleDebug();
2903 #endif
2904
2905 OnCommandHandlerTick(pDt, pCurrentCommandID);
2906 }
2907
2908 #ifdef DEVELOPER
2909
2910 void SetGetInVehicleDebug(EntityAI ent)
2911 {
2912 m_GetInVehicleTransportDebug = Transport.Cast(ent);
2913 }
2914
2915 void TryGetInVehicleDebug()
2916 {
2917 if (m_GetInVehicleTransportDebug)
2918 {
2919 HumanCommandVehicle vehCommand = StartCommand_Vehicle(m_GetInVehicleTransportDebug, 0, 0);
2920 if (vehCommand)
2921 {
2922 vehCommand.SetVehicleType(m_GetInVehicleTransportDebug.GetAnimInstance());
2923 }
2924 m_GetInVehicleTransportDebug = null;
2925 }
2926 }
2927 #endif
2928
2929 //MAP handling
2931 void CloseMap()
2932 {
2933 CloseMapEx(false);
2934 }
2935
2936 void CloseMapEx(bool cancelled)
2937 {
2938 if (m_hac && !m_MapClosingSyncSent)
2939 {
2940 ScriptInputUserData ctx = new ScriptInputUserData;
2941 if ( ctx.CanStoreInputUserData() )
2942 {
2943 int command_ID = DayZPlayerConstants.CMD_ACTIONINT_END;
2944 if ( cancelled )
2945 {
2946 command_ID = DayZPlayerConstants.CMD_ACTIONINT_INTERRUPT;
2947 }
2948
2949 if ( GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsClient() )
2950 {
2951 ActionManagerClient mngr_client;
2952 CastTo(mngr_client, GetActionManager());
2953
2954 if ( cancelled )
2955 {
2956 mngr_client.RequestInterruptAction();
2957 }
2958 else
2959 {
2960 mngr_client.RequestEndAction();
2961 }
2962
2963 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputExcludes({"map"});
2964 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputRestriction(EInputRestrictors.MAP);
2965 }
2966 else if ( !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
2967 {
2968 m_hac.InternalCommand(command_ID);
2969 }
2970 SetMapClosingSyncSet(true);
2971 }
2972 }
2973
2974 if (!GetGame().IsDedicatedServer())
2975 {
2976 if (GetGame().GetUIManager().IsMenuOpen(MENU_MAP))
2977 {
2978 GetGame().GetUIManager().FindMenu(MENU_MAP).Close();
2979 if (m_Hud)
2980 {
2981 m_Hud.ShowHudPlayer(true);
2982 m_Hud.ShowQuickbarPlayer(true);
2983 }
2984
2985 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputExcludes({"map"});
2986 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputRestriction(EInputRestrictors.MAP);
2987 }
2988 }
2989 }
2990
2991 void SetMapOpen(bool state)
2992 {
2993 m_MapOpen = state;
2994 }
2995
2996 bool IsMapOpen()
2997 {
2998 return m_MapOpen;
2999 }
3000
3001 void SetMapClosingSyncSet(bool state)
3002 {
3003 m_MapClosingSyncSent = state;
3004 }
3005
3006 bool GetMapClosingSyncSent()
3007 {
3008 return m_MapClosingSyncSent;
3009 }
3010
3011 bool IsMapCallbackCancelInput()
3012 {
3013 if (IsRaised() || (GetUApi().GetInputByID(UAUIMenu).LocalPress() || GetUApi().GetInputByID(UAGear).LocalPress()))
3014 {
3015 return true;
3016 }
3017
3018 return false;
3019 }
3020
3021 bool IsMapCallbackEndInput()
3022 {
3023 if (GetUApi().GetInputByID(UADefaultAction).LocalPress())
3024 {
3025 return true;
3026 }
3027
3028 return false;
3029 }
3030
3031 MapNavigationBehaviour GetMapNavigationBehaviour()
3032 {
3033 return m_MapNavigationBehaviour;
3034 }
3035

3037 {
3038 if (GetMapNavigationBehaviour())
3039 {
3040 GetMapNavigationBehaviour().OnItemInPlayerPossession(item);
3041 }
3042 }

3047 {
3048 GetMapNavigationBehaviour().OnItemNotInPlayerPossession(item);
3049 }
3050 }
