3056
3057 /*
3058 void AirTemperatureCheck()
3059 {
3060 if( !m_Environment.IsTemperatureSet() )
3061 return;
3062 float air_temperature = m_Environment.GetTemperature();
3063 int level = 0;//default
3064 if( MiscGameplayFunctions.IsValueInRange( air_temperature, PlayerConstants.BREATH_VAPOUR_THRESHOLD_HIGH, PlayerConstants.BREATH_VAPOUR_THRESHOLD_LOW) )
3065 {
3066 float value = Math.InverseLerp( PlayerConstants.BREATH_VAPOUR_THRESHOLD_LOW, PlayerConstants.BREATH_VAPOUR_THRESHOLD_HIGH,air_temperature);
3067 value = Math.Clamp(value,0,1);
3068 level = Math.Round(Math.Lerp(1,BREATH_VAPOUR_LEVEL_MAX,value));
3069 }
3070 else if(air_temperature < PlayerConstants.BREATH_VAPOUR_THRESHOLD_HIGH)
3071 {
3072 level = BREATH_VAPOUR_LEVEL_MAX;
3073 }
3074 if( level != m_BreathVapour )
3075 {
3076 m_BreathVapour = level;
3077 SetSynchDirty();
3078 }
3079 }
3080 */
3081
3082 void SetShakesForced(int value)
3083 {
3084 m_ShakesForced = value;
3085 }
3086
3087 void FreezeCheck()
3088 {
3089 int level;
3090 if( m_ShakesForced > 0 )
3091 {
3092 level = m_ShakesForced;
3093 }
3094 else
3095 {
3096 float heat_comfort = GetStatHeatComfort().Get();
3097 if( heat_comfort <= PlayerConstants.THRESHOLD_HEAT_COMFORT_MINUS_WARNING )
3098 {
3099 float value = Math.InverseLerp( PlayerConstants.THRESHOLD_HEAT_COMFORT_MINUS_WARNING, PlayerConstants.THRESHOLD_HEAT_COMFORT_MINUS_CRITICAL,heat_comfort);
3100 level = Math.Lerp(1,7,value);
3101 level = Math.Clamp(value,1,7);
3102 /*
3103 value = Math.Clamp(value,0,1);
3104 level = Math.Round(value * SHAKE_LEVEL_MAX);//translate from normalized value to levels
3105 */
3106 }
3107 }
3108 if( level != m_Shakes )
3109 {
3110 m_Shakes = level;
3111 SetSynchDirty();
3112 }
3113 }
3114
3115 void OnUnconsciousStart()
3116 {
3117 CloseInventoryMenu();
3118 //if( GetInventory() ) GetInventory().LockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3119
3120 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
3121 {
3122 SetInventorySoftLock(true);
3123 if(m_LastCommandBeforeUnconscious != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_VEHICLE)
3124 {
3125 EntityAI entity_in_hands = GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands();
3126 if ( entity_in_hands && CanDropEntity(entity_in_hands) && !IsRestrained() )
3127 {
3128 DropItem(ItemBase.Cast(entity_in_hands));
3129 }
3130 }
3131 GetGame().GetSoundScene().SetSoundVolume(0,2);
3132 m_EffectWidgets.AddSuspendRequest(EffectWidgetSuspends.UNCON);
3133 }
3134
3135 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
3136 {
3137 SetSynchDirty();
3138
3139 // disable voice communication
3140 GetGame().EnableVoN(this, false);
3141
3142 if ( m_AdminLog )
3143 {
3144 m_AdminLog.UnconStart( this );
3145 }
3146
3147 // When we fall uncon we force out of block
3148 if ( GetMeleeFightLogic() )
3149 {
3150 GetMeleeFightLogic().SetBlock( false );
3151 }
3152 }
3153
3154 SetMasterAttenuation("UnconsciousAttenuation");
3155
3156 //PrintString("OnUnconsciousStart");
3157 }
3158
3159 void OnUnconsciousStop(int pCurrentCommandID)
3160 {
3161 m_UnconRefillModifier =1;
3162 SetSynchDirty();
3163 //if( GetInventory() ) GetInventory().UnlockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3164 m_UnconsciousTime = 0;
3165 m_UnconsciousVignetteTarget = 2;
3166 if( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
3167 {
3168 if ( pCurrentCommandID != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_DEATH )
3169 {
3170 GetGame().GetSoundScene().SetSoundVolume(g_Game.m_volume_sound,1);
3171 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_UnconEffects).Stop();
3172 GetGame().GetMission().GetHud().ShowHudUI( true );
3173 GetGame().GetMission().GetHud().ShowQuickbarUI(true);
3174 if ( GetGame().GetUIManager().IsDialogVisible() )
3175 {
3176 GetGame().GetUIManager().CloseDialog();
3177 }
3178 if ( GetGame().GetUIManager().IsMenuOpen(MENU_RESPAWN_DIALOGUE) )
3179 {
3180 GetGame().GetUIManager().FindMenu(MENU_RESPAWN_DIALOGUE).Close();
3181 }
3182 }
3183 SetInventorySoftLock(false);
3184 m_EffectWidgets.RemoveSuspendRequest(EffectWidgetSuspends.UNCON);
3185 }
3186 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER)
3187 {
3188 // enable voice communication
3189 if(IsAlive())
3190 GetGame().EnableVoN(this, true);
3191
3192 if ( m_AdminLog )
3193 {
3194 m_AdminLog.UnconStop( this );
3195 }
3196 }
3197
3198 SetMasterAttenuation("");
3199
3200 //PrintString("OnUnconsciousStop");
3201 }
3202
3203 void OnUnconsciousUpdate(float pDt, int last_command)
3204 {
3205 m_UnconsciousTime += pDt;
3206 if( GetGame().IsServer() )
3207 {
3208 int shock_simplified = SimplifyShock();
3209
3210 if( m_ShockSimplified != shock_simplified )
3211 {
3212 m_ShockSimplified = shock_simplified;
3213 SetSynchDirty();
3214 }
3215
3216 //PrintString(last_command.ToString());
3217 //PrintString(DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_SWIM.ToString());
3218
3219 if( m_UnconsciousTime > PlayerConstants.UNCONSCIOUS_IN_WATER_TIME_LIMIT_TO_DEATH && last_command == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_SWIM )
3220 {
3221 SetHealth("","",-100);
3222 }
3223 }
3224 if( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
3225 {
3226 GetGame().GetMission().GetHud().ShowHudUI( false );
3227 GetGame().GetMission().GetHud().ShowQuickbarUI(false);
3228 if(GetPulseType() == EPulseType.REGULAR)
3229 {
3230 float shock_simple_normalized = GetSimplifiedShockNormalized();
3231
3232 float sin = Math.Sin(m_UnconsciousTime * 0.3);
3233 float sin_normalized = (sin + 1) / 2;
3234 if(sin_normalized < 0.05)
3235 {
3236 m_UnconsciousVignetteTarget = (1 - shock_simple_normalized / 3) * 2/*vignette max*/;
3237 }
3238 float vignette = Math.Lerp(2,m_UnconsciousVignetteTarget, sin_normalized);
3239 //PrintString(m_UnconsciousVignetteTarget.ToString());
3240 m_UnconParam.param1 = vignette;
3241 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_UnconEffects).Start(m_UnconParam);
3242 }
3243 }
3244 }
3245
3246 int SimplifyShock()
3247 {
3248 int shock = Math.Lerp( 0, SIMPLIFIED_SHOCK_CAP, GetHealth("","Shock") / GetMaxHealth("","Shock") );
3249 shock = Math.Clamp(shock, 0, SIMPLIFIED_SHOCK_CAP);
3250 return shock;
3251 }
3252
3253 float GetSimplifiedShockNormalized()
3254 {
3255 return (m_ShockSimplified / SIMPLIFIED_SHOCK_CAP);
3256 }
3257
3258 override bool IsUnconscious()
3259 {
3260 return m_IsUnconscious;
3261 }
3262
3263 override bool CanBeTargetedByAI(EntityAI ai)
3264 {
3265 #ifdef DIAG_DEVELOPER
3266 if (!m_CanBeTargetedDebug)
3267 {
3268 return false;
3269 }
3270 #endif
3271
3272 return super.CanBeTargetedByAI( ai ) && !IsUnconscious() && !IsInVehicle();
3273 }
3274
3275 void GiveShock(float shock)
3276 {
3277 AddHealth("","Shock",shock);
3278 }
3279
3280
3281 void OnRestrainStart()
3282 {
3283 CloseInventoryMenu();
3284 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputExcludes({"inventory"},true);
3285 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputRestriction(EInputRestrictors.INVENTORY);
3286 }
3287
3288 void ShockRefill(float pDt)
3289 {
3290 //functionality moved to ShockMdfr::OnTick
3291 }
3292
3293 //BrokenLegs
3294 // -----------------------
3295
3296 eBrokenLegs GetBrokenLegs()
3297 {
3298 return Math.AbsInt(m_BrokenLegState);//negative value denotes first time activation
3299 }
3300
3301 //Server side
3302 void SetBrokenLegs(int stateId)
3303 {
3304 m_BrokenLegState = stateId;
3305
3306 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SendBrokenLegsEx(this, stateId);
3307 eBrokenLegs state = GetBrokenLegs();//m_BrokenLegState can go bellow 0, cannot be used directly
3308
3309 if ( state == eBrokenLegs.NO_BROKEN_LEGS )
3310 {
3311 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS;
3312 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT;
3313 }
3314 else if ( state == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS )
3315 {
3316 SetLegHealth();
3317 }
3318 else if (state == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT)
3319 {
3320 // handle splint here
3321 }
3322 SetSynchDirty();
3323 }
3324
3325 //Update of state
3326 void UpdateBrokenLegs(int stateId)
3327 {
3328 eBrokenLegs state = GetBrokenLegs();
3329 //Raise broken legs flag and force to prone
3330 if (state != eBrokenLegs.NO_BROKEN_LEGS)
3331 {
3332 if ( state == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT )
3333 {
3334 if ( m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx != DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE )
3335 {
3336 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.PRONE_ANIM_OVERRIDE;
3337 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS;
3338 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask | eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT;
3339 }
3340 m_InjuryHandler.CheckValue(false);
3341
3342 }
3343 else if ( state == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS )
3344 {
3345
3346 if ( m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx != DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE )
3347 {
3348 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.PRONE_ANIM_OVERRIDE;
3349 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT;
3350 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask | eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS;
3351 }
3352
3353 BrokenLegWalkShock();
3354 m_InjuryHandler.CheckValue(false);
3355
3356 }
3357 }
3358 else if (state == eBrokenLegs.NO_BROKEN_LEGS)
3359 {
3360 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS;
3361 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT;
3362 }
3363
3364 }
3365
3366 void BreakLegSound()
3367 {
3368 PlaySoundSet(m_BrokenLegSound, SOUND_BREAK_LEG, 0.1, 0.1);
3369 }
3370 void BrokenLegForceProne(bool forceOverride = false)
3371 {
3372 if (!IsInWater() && !IsSwimming() && !IsClimbingLadder() && !IsInVehicle() && !IsClimbing() && DayZPlayerUtils.PlayerCanChangeStance(this, DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE))
3373 {
3374 if (m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx != DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE && m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx != DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_RAISEDPRONE)
3375 {
3376 EntityAI attachment;
3377 Class.CastTo(attachment, GetItemOnSlot("Splint_Right"));
3378 if ( attachment && attachment.GetType() == "Splint_Applied" )
3379 {
3380 attachment.Delete();
3381 }
3382
3383 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_INITIAL_SHOCK);
3384 m_ShockHandler.CheckValue(true);
3385
3386
3387 if ( m_ShockHandler.GetCurrentShock() >= 25 ) //Prevent conflict with unconsciousness by not forcing prone when going uncon (25 shock or less left)
3388 {
3389
3390 //calcels user action
3391 HumanCommandActionCallback cmd = GetCommand_Action();
3392 if(cmd)
3393 {
3394 cmd.Cancel();
3395 }
3396
3397 StopHandEvent();
3398 //Get command move and verify not null
3399 HumanCommandMove hcm = StartCommand_Move();//not sure why this is here
3400 hcm = GetCommand_Move();
3401 if (hcm)
3402 {
3403 hcm.ForceStance(DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE);
3404 }
3405 }
3406 }
3407 }
3408 }
3409
3410 //Used to inflict shock when player is walking (only inflicted on Update timer)
3411 void BrokenLegWalkShock()
3412 {
3413 //No need to pursue here if player is prone as the following logic is not applied
3414 if ( m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx != DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE && m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx != DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_RAISEDPRONE )
3415 {
3416 float avgLegHealth = GetHealth("RightLeg","") + GetHealth("LeftLeg","") + GetHealth("RightFoot","") + GetHealth("LeftFoot","");
3417 avgLegHealth *= 0.25; //divide by 4 to make the average leg health;
3418
3419 if (IsSwimming())
3420 {
3421 //swimming other than forward is not detectable in script other than through velocity check
3422 vector v;
3423 PhysicsGetVelocity(v);
3424
3425 if(v.LengthSq() > 0)
3426 {
3427 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_SHOCK_SWIM);
3428 }
3429 }
3430 else if (m_MovementState.m_iMovement != 0)
3431 {
3432 if ( IsClimbingLadder() )
3433 {
3434 MovingShock(avgLegHealth, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_HIGH_SHOCK_WALK, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_MID_SHOCK_WALK, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_LOW_SHOCK_WALK);
3435 }
3436 else if( m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_ERECT || m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_RAISEDERECT)
3437 {
3438 if ( m_MovementState.m_iMovement > 1)//only jog and faster
3439 {
3440 MovingShock(avgLegHealth, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_HIGH_SHOCK_WALK, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_MID_SHOCK_WALK, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_LOW_SHOCK_WALK);
3441 }
3442 }
3443 else if( m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_CROUCH || m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_RAISEDCROUCH)
3444 {
3445 //any speed other than idle
3446 MovingShock(avgLegHealth, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_HIGH_SHOCK_WALK * PlayerConstants.BROKEN_CROUCH_MODIFIER, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_MID_SHOCK_WALK * PlayerConstants.BROKEN_CROUCH_MODIFIER, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_LOW_SHOCK_WALK * PlayerConstants.BROKEN_CROUCH_MODIFIER);
3447 }
3448 }
3449 else
3450 {
3451 //Here apply shock if player is standing or crouched and STANDING STILL
3452 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_STAND_SHOCK);
3453 }
3454
3455 m_ShockHandler.CheckValue(true);
3456 }
3457 }
3458
3459 //Always use the same thresholds but allow passing of different shock values
3460 void MovingShock(float legHealth, float highShock, float midShock, float lowShock)
3461 {
3462 if (legHealth <= PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_LOW_HEALTH_THRESHOLD)
3463 {
3464 //Inflict "high shock"
3465 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(highShock);
3466 }
3467 else if (legHealth >= PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_HIGH_HEALTH_THRESHOLD)
3468 {
3469 //Inflict "low shock"
3470 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(lowShock);
3471 }
3472 else
3473 {
3474 //If neither high nore low, inflict "mid shock"
3475 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(midShock);
3476 }
3477 }
3478
3479 void DealShock(float dmg)
3480 {
3481 Param1<float> damage = new Param1<float>(0);
3482 damage.param1 = dmg;
3483 GetGame().RPCSingleParam(this, ERPCs.RPC_SHOCK, damage, true, GetIdentity());
3484 }
3485
3486 //Prevent player from picking up heavy items when legs are broken
3487 override bool CanPickupHeavyItem(notnull EntityAI item)
3488 {
3489 if (item.IsHeavyBehaviour() && (GetBrokenLegs() == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS || GetBrokenLegs() == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT))
3490 return false;
3491
3492 return super.CanPickupHeavyItem(item);
3493 }
3494
3495 //Set all leg zones' health to 0 in order to limit emergent behaviour and prevent confusion as to how broken legs really work
3496 void SetLegHealth()
3497 {
3498 SetHealth("RightLeg", "", 0);
3499 SetHealth("RightFoot", "", 0);
3500 SetHealth("LeftLeg", "", 0);
3501 SetHealth("LeftFoot", "", 0);
3502 }
3503
3504 void DropHeavyItem()
3505 {
3506 ItemBase itemInHands = GetItemInHands();
3507 if ( itemInHands && itemInHands.IsHeavyBehaviour() )
3508 DropItem(itemInHands);
3509 }
3510
3511 bool IsWearingSplint()
3512 {
3513 EntityAI attachment;
3514 Class.CastTo(attachment, GetItemOnSlot("Splint_Right"));
3515 if ( attachment && attachment.GetType() == "Splint_Applied" )
3516 {
3517 return true;
3518 }
3519 return false;
3520 }
3521
3522 // -----------------------
3523
3524
3525 override void OnCommandSwimStart()
3526 {
3527 ItemBase itemInHands = GetItemInHands();
3528 if (itemInHands)
3529 {
3530 if (itemInHands.IsHeavyBehaviour())
3531 {
3532 TryHideItemInHands(false);
3533 DropHeavyItem();
3534 }
3535 else
3536 {
3537 TryHideItemInHands(true);
3538 }
3539 itemInHands.OnItemInHandsPlayerSwimStart(this);
3540 }
3541 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.CommandSwim;
3542
3543 if ( GetInventory() )
3544 GetInventory().LockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3545
3546 CloseInventoryMenu();
3547 GetDayZGame().GetBacklit().OnSwimmingStart();
3548
3549 AbortWeaponEvent();
3550 GetWeaponManager().DelayedRefreshAnimationState(10);
3551 RequestHandAnimationStateRefresh();
3552 }
3553
3554 override void OnCommandSwimFinish()
3555 {
3556 TryHideItemInHands(false, true);
3557
3558 if ( GetInventory() )
3559 GetInventory().UnlockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3560
3561 GetDayZGame().GetBacklit().OnSwimmingStop();
3562
3563 GetWeaponManager().RefreshAnimationState();
3564 }
3565
3566 override void OnCommandLadderStart()
3567 {
3568 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.CommandLadder;
3569 TryHideItemInHands(true);
3570
3571 if ( GetInventory() )
3572 GetInventory().LockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3573
3574 CloseInventoryMenu();
3575 }
3576
3577 override void OnCommandLadderFinish()
3578 {
3579 TryHideItemInHands(false, true);
3580
3581 if ( GetInventory() )
3582 GetInventory().UnlockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3583 }
3584
3585 override void OnCommandFallStart()
3586 {
3587 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.CommandFall;
3588
3589 if ( GetInventory() )
3590 GetInventory().LockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3591
3592 CloseInventoryMenu();
3593
3594 AbortWeaponEvent();
3595 GetWeaponManager().DelayedRefreshAnimationState(10);
3596 RequestHandAnimationStateRefresh();
3597 }
3598
3599 override void OnCommandFallFinish()
3600 {
3601 if ( GetInventory() )
3602 GetInventory().UnlockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3603
3604 GetWeaponManager().RefreshAnimationState();
3605 }
3606
3607 override void OnCommandClimbStart()
3608 {
3609 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.CommandClimb;
3610
3611 if ( GetInventory() )
3612 GetInventory().LockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3613
3614 CloseInventoryMenu();
3615
3616 AbortWeaponEvent();
3617 GetWeaponManager().DelayedRefreshAnimationState(10);
3618 RequestHandAnimationStateRefresh();
3619 }
3620
3621 override void OnCommandClimbFinish()
3622 {
3623 if ( GetInventory() )
3624 GetInventory().UnlockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3625
3626 GetWeaponManager().RefreshAnimationState();
3627 }
3628
3629 override void OnCommandVehicleStart()
3630 {
3631 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.CommandVehicle;
3632
3633 if ( GetInventory() )
3634 GetInventory().LockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3635
3636 ItemBase itemInHand = GetItemInHands();
3637 EntityAI itemOnHead = FindAttachmentBySlotName("Headgear");
3638
3639 if ( itemInHand && itemInHand.GetCompEM() )
3640 itemInHand.GetCompEM().SwitchOff();
3641
3642 TryHideItemInHands(true);
3643
3644 if ( itemOnHead && itemOnHead.GetCompEM() )
3645 itemOnHead.GetCompEM().SwitchOff();
3646
3647 HumanCommandVehicle hcv = GetCommand_Vehicle();
3648 if ( hcv && hcv.GetVehicleSeat() == DayZPlayerConstants.VEHICLESEAT_DRIVER )
3649 OnVehicleSeatDriverEnter();
3650 }
3651
3652 override void OnCommandVehicleFinish()
3653 {
3654 if ( GetInventory() )
3655 GetInventory().UnlockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3656
3657 TryHideItemInHands(false, true);
3658
3659 if ( m_IsVehicleSeatDriver )
3660 OnVehicleSeatDriverLeft();
3661 }
3662
3663 override void OnCommandMelee2Start()
3664 {
3665 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.CommandMelee2;
3666 m_IsFighting = true;
3667
3668 AbortWeaponEvent();
3669 GetWeaponManager().DelayedRefreshAnimationState(10);
3670 RequestHandAnimationStateRefresh();
3671 }
3672
3673 override void OnCommandMelee2Finish()
3674 {
3675 RunFightBlendTimer();
3676
3677 GetWeaponManager().RefreshAnimationState();
3678
3679 }
3680
3681 override void OnCommandDeathStart()
3682 {
3683 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.CommandDeath;
3684 AbortWeaponEvent();
3685 GetWeaponManager().DelayedRefreshAnimationState(10);
3686 RequestHandAnimationStateRefresh();
3687 }
3688
3689 override void OnJumpStart()
3690 {
3691 m_ActionManager.OnJumpStart();
3692
3693 AbortWeaponEvent();
3694 GetWeaponManager().DelayedRefreshAnimationState(10);
3695 RequestHandAnimationStateRefresh();
3696 CloseMapEx(true);
3697 }
3698
3699 override void OnJumpEnd(int pLandType = 0)
3700 {
3701 if(m_PresenceNotifier)
3702 {
3703 switch(pLandType)
3704 {
3705 case HumanCommandFall.LANDTYPE_NONE:
3706 case HumanCommandFall.LANDTYPE_LIGHT:
3707 m_PresenceNotifier.ProcessEvent(EPresenceNotifierNoiseEventType.LAND_LIGHT);
3708 break;
3709 case HumanCommandFall.LANDTYPE_MEDIUM:
3710 case HumanCommandFall.LANDTYPE_HEAVY:
3711 m_PresenceNotifier.ProcessEvent(EPresenceNotifierNoiseEventType.LAND_HEAVY);
3712 break;
3713 }
3714 }
3715
3716 GetWeaponManager().RefreshAnimationState();
3717 }
3718
3719 bool IsStance(int stance, int stanceMask)
3720 {
3721 return ((1 << stance) & stanceMask) != 0;
3722 }
3723
3724 override void OnStanceChange(int previousStance, int newStance)
3725 {
3726
3727 int prone = DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_PRONE | DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_RAISEDPRONE;
3728 int notProne = DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_ERECT | DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_CROUCH | DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_RAISEDERECT | DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_RAISEDCROUCH;
3729
3730 if ( ( IsStance(previousStance, prone) && IsStance(newStance, notProne) ) || ( IsStance(previousStance, notProne) && IsStance(newStance, prone) ) )
3731 {
3732 AbortWeaponEvent();
3733 GetWeaponManager().RefreshAnimationState();
3734 }
3735
3736 if ( GetGame().IsServer() )
3737 {
3738 /*
3739 if (newStance == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE)
3740 {
3741 //Print("Update anim");
3742
3743 if (m_BrokenLegState == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS)
3744 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS;
3745 else if (m_BrokenLegState == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT)
3746 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT;
3747
3748 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask | eInjuryOverrides.PRONE_ANIM_OVERRIDE;
3749 ForceUpdateInjuredState();
3750 }
3751 else if (previousStance == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE || previousStance == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_RAISEDPRONE)
3752 {
3753 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.PRONE_ANIM_OVERRIDE;
3754 //Print("Update anim 2");
3755 if (m_BrokenLegState == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS)
3756 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask | eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS;
3757 else if (m_BrokenLegState == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT)
3758 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask | eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT;
3759
3760 ForceUpdateInjuredState();
3761 }
3762 */
3763 }
3764 }
3765
3766 override bool CanChangeStance(int previousStance, int newStance)
3767 {
3768 return !IsRolling() && !GetThrowing().IsThrowingAnimationPlaying();
3769 }
3770
3771 override void OnCommandMoveStart()
3772 {
3773 if ( GetGame().IsServer() )
3774 {
3775 //In case player changes stance through a different command, we refresh the anim overrides
3776 int prone = DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_PRONE | DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_RAISEDPRONE;
3777 if ( !IsPlayerInStance( prone ) )
3778 {
3779 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.PRONE_ANIM_OVERRIDE;
3780 ForceUpdateInjuredState();
3781 }
3782 }
3783 }
3784
3785 override bool CanRoll()
3786 {
3787 if (!CanConsumeStamina(EStaminaConsumers.ROLL))
3788 return false;
3789
3790 if (IsInFBEmoteState() || m_EmoteManager.m_MenuEmote)
3791 {
3792 return false;
3793 }
3794
3795 return IsPlayerInStance(DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_PRONE | DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_RAISEDPRONE) && GetCommand_Move() && !GetCommand_Move().IsOnBack();
3796 }
3797
3798 override void OnRollStart(bool isToTheRight)
3799 {
3800 DepleteStamina(EStaminaModifiers.ROLL);
3801
3802 if (GetBrokenLegs() == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS)
3803 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_ROLL_SHOCK);
3804 }
3805
3806 override void OnRollFinish()
3807 {
3808 }
3809
3810 void OnJumpOutVehicleFinish(float carSpeed)
3811 {
3812 string surfaceType;
3813 int liquidType;
3814 GetGame().SurfaceUnderObject(this, surfaceType, liquidType);
3815 }
3816
3817 void OnVehicleSwitchSeat( int seatIndex )
3818 {
3819 if ( seatIndex == DayZPlayerConstants.VEHICLESEAT_DRIVER )
3820 {
3821 OnVehicleSeatDriverEnter();
3822 }
3823 else
3824 {
3825 OnVehicleSeatDriverLeft();
3826 }
3827 }
3828
3829 void OnVehicleSeatDriverEnter()
3830 {
3831 m_IsVehicleSeatDriver = true;
3832 if (m_Hud)
3833 m_Hud.ShowVehicleInfo();
3834 }
3835
3836 void OnVehicleSeatDriverLeft()
3837 {
3838 m_IsVehicleSeatDriver = false;
3839 if (m_Hud)
3840 m_Hud.HideVehicleInfo();
3841 }
3842
3843 override void OnThrowingModeChange(bool change_to_enabled)
3844 {
3845 if (change_to_enabled)
3846 {
3847 PlacingCancelLocal();
3848 PlacingCancelServer();
3849 }
3850 }
3851
3852 override void EOnFrame(IEntity other, float timeSlice)
3853 {
3854 if (GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT)
3855 {
3856#ifndef NO_GUI
3857 m_Hud.Update(timeSlice);
3858 m_Hud.ToggleHeatBufferPlusSign(m_HasHeatBuffer);
3859
3860 if (IsControlledPlayer() && m_EffectWidgets && m_EffectWidgets.IsAnyEffectRunning())
3861 {
3862 m_EffectWidgets.Update(timeSlice);
3863 }
3864#endif
3865 if (m_UndergroundHandler)
3866 m_UndergroundHandler.Tick(timeSlice);
3867 }
3868 }
3869
3870 override void EOnPostFrame(IEntity other, int extra)
3871 {
3872 float delta_time = (GetGame().GetTime() - m_LastPostFrameTickTime) / 1000;
3873 m_LastPostFrameTickTime = GetGame().GetTime();
3874 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
3875 {
3876 if ( GetDamageDealtEffect() )
3877 {
3878 if (IsAlive())
3879 GetDamageDealtEffect().Update(delta_time);
3880 else
3881 delete GetDamageDealtEffect();
3882 }
3883
3884 if (m_EffectRadial)
3885 {
3886 if(IsAlive())
3887 {
3888 m_EffectRadial.Update(delta_time);
3889 }
3890 else
3891 m_EffectRadial = null;
3892 }
3893
3894
3895 if (GetFlashbangEffect())
3896 {
3897 if (IsAlive())
3898 {
3899 GetFlashbangEffect().Update(delta_time);
3900 }
3901 else
3902 {
3903 delete GetFlashbangEffect();
3904 }
3905 }
3906
3907 if ( GetShockEffect() )
3908 {
3909 if (IsAlive())
3910 GetShockEffect().Update(delta_time);
3911 else
3912 delete GetShockEffect();
3913 }
3914
3915 m_InventoryActionHandler.OnUpdate();
3916 }
3917
3918#ifdef DIAG_DEVELOPER
3919 DiagOnPostFrame(other, extra);
3920#endif
3921 }
3922
3923#ifdef DIAG_DEVELOPER
3924 protected void DiagOnPostFrame(IEntity other, int extra)
3925 {
3926 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
3927 {
3928 if (m_WeaponDebug)
3929 {
3930 m_WeaponDebug.OnPostFrameUpdate();
3931 }
3932
3933 if ( GetBleedingManagerRemote() )
3934 {
3935 GetBleedingManagerRemote().OnUpdate();
3936 }
3937
3938 if (m_MeleeCombat)
3939 {
3940 if (DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.MELEE_DEBUG))
3941 {
3942 m_MeleeDebug = true;
3943 m_MeleeCombat.Debug(GetItemInHands(), m_MeleeCombat.GetHitType());
3944 }
3945 else if (!DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.MELEE_DEBUG) && m_MeleeDebug)
3946 {
3947 m_MeleeDebug = false;
3948 m_MeleeCombat.Debug(GetItemInHands(), m_MeleeCombat.GetHitType());
3949 }
3950 }
3951
3952 if (DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.SOUNDS_ITEM_IMPACT_SOUNDS))
3953 InventoryItem.DrawImpacts();
3954
3955 if (GetPluginManager())
3956 {
3957 PluginDrawCheckerboard drawCheckerboard = PluginDrawCheckerboard.Cast(GetPluginManager().GetPluginByType(PluginDrawCheckerboard));
3958 if (drawCheckerboard && !drawCheckerboard.IsActive())
3959 {
3960 drawCheckerboard.ShowWidgets(DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.MISC_DRAW_CHECKERBOARD));
3961 }
3962 }
3963
3964 if (m_PresenceNotifier)
3965 {
3966 m_PresenceNotifier.EnableDebug(DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.MISC_PRESENCE_NOTIFIER_DBG));
3967 }
3968
3969 if (DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.TRIGGER_PLAYER_DEBUG))
3970 {
3971 vector minmax[2];
3972 GetCollisionBox(minmax);
3973
3974 int color = COLOR_RED_A;
3975 if (m_IsInsideTrigger)
3976 color = COLOR_GREEN_A;
3977
3978 Shape dbgShape = Debug.DrawBoxEx(minmax[0], minmax[1], color, ShapeFlags.TRANSP|ShapeFlags.NOZWRITE|ShapeFlags.ONCE);
3979
3980 vector mat[4];
3981 GetTransform( mat );
3982 dbgShape.CreateMatrix( mat );
3983 dbgShape.SetMatrix( mat );
3984 }
3985 }
3986
3987 if (m_Environment && m_Environment.m_Debug)
3988 {
3989 #ifdef SERVER
3990 EnvDebugData envDebugData = m_Environment.GetEnvDebugData();
3991 GetGame().RPCSingleParam(this, ERPCs.DIAG_MISC_ENVIRONMENT_DEBUG_DATA, envDebugData, false, GetIdentity());
3992 #else
3993 bool enableEnvDebug = DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.MISC_ENVIRONMENT_DEBUG);
3994 if (enableEnvDebug)
3995 {
3996 m_Environment.ShowEnvDebugPlayerInfo(enableEnvDebug);
3997 }
3998 #endif
3999 }
4000 }
4001
4002 override void OnEnterTrigger(ScriptedEntity trigger)
4003 {
4004 super.OnEnterTrigger(trigger);
4005 ++m_IsInsideTrigger;
4006 }
4007
4008 override void OnLeaveTrigger(ScriptedEntity trigger)
4009 {
4010 super.OnLeaveTrigger(trigger);
4011 --m_IsInsideTrigger;
4012 }
4013#endif
4014
4015 void StaminaHUDNotifier( bool show )
4016 {
4017 if (m_Hud)
4018 m_Hud.SetStaminaBarVisibility( show );
4019 }
4020
4021 override void DepleteStamina(EStaminaModifiers modifier, float dT = -1)
4022 {
4023 if ( GetStaminaHandler() )
4024 GetStaminaHandler().DepleteStamina(modifier,dT);
4025 }
4026
4027 override bool CanConsumeStamina(EStaminaConsumers consumer)
4028 {
4029 if (!GetStaminaHandler()) return false;
4030
4031 bool val = (GetStaminaHandler().HasEnoughStaminaFor(consumer) /*&& !IsOverloaded()*/ && !IsRestrained() && !IsInFBEmoteState());
4032
4033 if (!val)
4034 StaminaHUDNotifier( false );
4035
4036 return val;
4037 }
4038
4039 override bool CanStartConsumingStamina(EStaminaConsumers consumer)
4040 {
4041 if (!GetStaminaHandler()) return false;
4042
4043 bool val = (GetStaminaHandler().HasEnoughStaminaToStart(consumer) && !IsRestrained() && !IsInFBEmoteState());
4044
4045 if (!val)
4046 StaminaHUDNotifier( false );
4047
4048 return val;
4049 }
4050
4052 bool HasStaminaRemaining()
4053 {
4054 if (!GetStaminaHandler())
4055 return false;
4056
4057 return GetStaminaHandler().GetStamina() > 0;
4058 }
4059
4060 override bool CanClimb( int climbType, SHumanCommandClimbResult climbRes )
4061 {
4062 if (GetBrokenLegs() == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS)
4063 {
4064 return false;
4065 }
4066
4067 if ( climbType == 1 && !CanConsumeStamina(EStaminaConsumers.VAULT) )
4068 return false;
4069
4070 if ( climbType == 2 && ( !CanConsumeStamina(EStaminaConsumers.CLIMB) || GetBrokenLegs() != eBrokenLegs.NO_BROKEN_LEGS ) )
4071 return false;
4072
4073 if ( climbType > 0 && m_InjuryHandler && m_InjuryHandler.GetInjuryAnimValue() >= InjuryAnimValues.LVL3)
4074 return false;
4075
4076 return super.CanClimb( climbType,climbRes );
4077 }
4078
4079 override bool CanJump()
4080 {
4081 if (GetBrokenLegs() != eBrokenLegs.NO_BROKEN_LEGS)
4082 {
4083 return false;
4084 }
4085
4086 if (!CanConsumeStamina(EStaminaConsumers.JUMP))
4087 return false;
4088
4090 if ( m_InjuryHandler && m_InjuryHandler.GetInjuryAnimValue() >= InjuryAnimValues.LVL3 )
4091 return false;
4092
4093 if (IsInFBEmoteState() || m_EmoteManager.m_MenuEmote)
4094 {
4095 return false;
4096 }
4097
4098 return super.CanJump();
4099 }
4100
4101 bool IsJumpInProgress()
4102 {
4103 return m_JumpClimb.m_bIsJumpInProgress;
4104 }
4105
4106 bool IsTargetInActiveRefresherRange(EntityAI target)
4107 {
4108 array<vector> temp = new array<vector>;
4109 temp = GetGame().GetMission().GetActiveRefresherLocations();
4110 int count = temp.Count();
4111 if (count > 0)
4112 {
4113 vector pos = target.GetPosition();
4114 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
4115 {
4116 if ( vector.Distance(pos,temp.Get(i)) < GameConstants.REFRESHER_RADIUS )
4117 return true;
4118 }
4119
4120 return false;
4121 }
4122 else
4123 {
4124 return false;
4125 }
4126 }
4127
4128 void RequestHandAnimationStateRefresh()
4129 {
4130 if ( (GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsServer()) )
4131 {
4132 m_RefreshAnimStateIdx++;
4133 if (m_RefreshAnimStateIdx > 3)
4134 m_RefreshAnimStateIdx = 0;
4135 SetSynchDirty();
4136 }
4137 }
4138
4139 void RefreshHandAnimationState(int delay = 0)
4140 {
4141 if (delay == 0)
4142 {
4143 GetItemAccessor().OnItemInHandsChanged(true);
4144 GetItemAccessor().ResetWeaponInHands();
4145 }
4146 else
4147 {
4148 GetGame().GetCallQueue(CALL_CATEGORY_GUI).CallLater(RefreshHandAnimationState,delay,false,0);
4149 }
4150 }
4151
4152 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
4153 // USER ACTIONS
4154 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
4155
4156 bool IsFacingTarget( Object target )
4157 {
4158 vector pdir = GetDirection();
4159 vector ptv = target.GetPosition() - GetPosition();
4160 pdir.Normalize();
4161 ptv.Normalize();
4162
4163 if (Math.AbsFloat(pdir[0]-ptv[0]) < 0.5 && Math.AbsFloat(pdir[2]-ptv[2]) < 0.5 )
4164 {
4165 return true;
4166 }
4167 return false;
4168 }
4169
4170 //---------------------------------------------------------
4171 void OnQuickBarSingleUse(int slotClicked)
4172 {
4173 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER )
4174 return;
4175
4176 if ( m_AreHandsLocked )
4177 return; //Player is in the short window of time after interrupting placement of an item and before getting it back in hands
4178
4179 if ( GetInventory().IsInventoryLocked() || IsEmotePlaying() )
4180 return;
4181
4182 if ( GetThrowing().IsThrowingModeEnabled() || GetThrowing().IsThrowingAnimationPlaying() )
4183 return;
4184
4185 if ( IsRaised() || GetCommand_Melee() || IsSwimming() || IsClimbingLadder() || IsClimbing() || IsRestrained() || IsRestrainPrelocked() )
4186 return;
4187
4188 if ( GetDayZPlayerInventory().IsProcessing() || IsItemsToDelete() )
4189 return;
4190
4191 if ( GetActionManager().GetRunningAction() != null )
4192 return;
4193
4194 if ( GetWeaponManager() && GetWeaponManager().IsRunning() )
4195 return;
4196
4197 if ( !ScriptInputUserData.CanStoreInputUserData() )
4198 return;
4199
4200 //TODO MW change locking method
4201 //if( GetDayZPlayerInventory().HasLockedHands() )
4202 // return;
4203
4204 EntityAI quickBarEntity = GetQuickBarEntity(slotClicked - 1);//GetEntityInQuickBar(slotClicked - 1);
4205
4206 if ( !quickBarEntity )
4207 return;
4208
4209 Magazine mag;
4210 Weapon_Base wpn;
4211
4212 if ( Class.CastTo(mag, quickBarEntity) && Class.CastTo(wpn, mag.GetHierarchyParent()) )
4213 return;
4214
4215 EntityAI inHandEntity = GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands();
4216
4217 if ( !GetDayZPlayerInventory().IsIdle() )
4218 return; // player is already performing some animation
4219
4220 InventoryLocation handInventoryLocation = new InventoryLocation;
4221 handInventoryLocation.SetHands(this,quickBarEntity);
4222 if ( this.GetInventory().HasInventoryReservation(quickBarEntity, handInventoryLocation ) )
4223 return;
4224
4225 if ( inHandEntity == quickBarEntity )
4226 {
4227 if ( GetHumanInventory().CanRemoveEntityInHands() )
4228 {
4229 syncDebugPrint("[QB] Stash - PredictiveMoveItemFromHandsToInventory HND=" + Object.GetDebugName(inHandEntity));
4230 PredictiveMoveItemFromHandsToInventory();
4231 }
4232 }
4233 else
4234 {
4235 InventoryLocation invLocQBItem = new InventoryLocation;
4236 quickBarEntity.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(invLocQBItem);
4237 if ( GetInventory().HasInventoryReservation(quickBarEntity,invLocQBItem) )
4238 return;
4239
4240 if ( inHandEntity )
4241 {
4242 InventoryLocation Reserved_Item_il = new InventoryLocation;
4243
4244 InventoryLocation inHandEntityFSwapDst = new InventoryLocation;
4245 inHandEntity.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(inHandEntityFSwapDst);
4246
4247 int index = GetHumanInventory().FindUserReservedLocationIndex(inHandEntity);
4248 if ( index >= 0 )
4249 GetHumanInventory().GetUserReservedLocation( index, Reserved_Item_il);
4250
4251 if ( Reserved_Item_il )
4252 inHandEntityFSwapDst.CopyLocationFrom(Reserved_Item_il, true);
4253
4254 if ( index < 0 && GameInventory.CanSwapEntitiesEx( quickBarEntity, inHandEntity ) )
4255 {
4256 syncDebugPrint("[QB] PredictiveSwapEntities QB=" + Object.GetDebugName(quickBarEntity) + " HND=" + Object.GetDebugName(inHandEntity));
4257 PredictiveSwapEntities( quickBarEntity, inHandEntity );
4258 }
4259 else if ( GameInventory.CanForceSwapEntitiesEx( quickBarEntity, handInventoryLocation, inHandEntity, inHandEntityFSwapDst ) )
4260 {
4261 syncDebugPrint("[QB] Swap - PredictiveForceSwapEntities HND=" + Object.GetDebugName(inHandEntity) + " QB=" + Object.GetDebugName(quickBarEntity) + " fswap_dst=" + InventoryLocation.DumpToStringNullSafe(inHandEntityFSwapDst));
4262 PredictiveForceSwapEntities( quickBarEntity, inHandEntity, inHandEntityFSwapDst );
4263 }
4264 }
4265 else
4266 {
4267 if ( GetInventory().HasInventoryReservation(quickBarEntity,handInventoryLocation) )
4268 return;
4269
4270 if ( GetInventory().CanAddEntityIntoHands(quickBarEntity) )
4271 {
4272 syncDebugPrint("[QB] Stash - PredictiveTakeEntityToHands QB=" + Object.GetDebugName(quickBarEntity));
4273 PredictiveTakeEntityToHands( quickBarEntity );
4274 }
4275 }
4276 }
4277 }
4278 //---------------------------------------------------------
4279 void OnQuickBarContinuousUseStart(int slotClicked)
4280 {
4281 if ( GetInventory().IsInventoryLocked() )
4282 return;
4283
4284 if ( IsSwimming() || IsClimbingLadder() || GetCommand_Melee() || IsClimbing() || IsRestrained() || IsRestrainPrelocked() )
4285 return;
4286
4287 ItemBase quickBarItem = ItemBase.Cast(GetQuickBarEntity(slotClicked - 1));
4288
4289 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT)
4290 {
4291 ItemBase itemInHands = ItemBase.Cast(GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands());
4292
4293 if ( itemInHands != quickBarItem )
4294 {
4295 ActionManagerClient amc = ActionManagerClient.Cast(GetActionManager());
4296
4297 if ( amc.CanPerformActionFromQuickbar(itemInHands, quickBarItem) )
4298 {
4299 amc.PerformActionFromQuickbar(itemInHands, quickBarItem);
4300 }
4301 else
4302 {
4303 if ( IsRaised() || GetCommand_Melee() )
4304 return;
4305
4306 amc.ForceTarget(quickBarItem);
4307 m_QuickBarFT = true;
4308 }
4309 }
4310 }
4311 m_QuickBarHold = true;
4312 }
4313 //---------------------------------------------------------
4314 void OnQuickBarContinuousUseEnd(int slotClicked)
4315 {
4316 if ( m_QuickBarHold )
4317 {
4318 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
4319 {
4320 ActionManagerClient am = ActionManagerClient.Cast(GetActionManager());
4321
4322 if (m_ActionQBControl)
4323 {
4324 ActionBase action = am.GetRunningAction();
4325 if (action)
4326 {
4327 if (!action.GetInput().IsActive())
4328 {
4329 am.EndActionInput();
4330 }
4331
4332 }
4333 }
4334
4335 if (m_QuickBarFT)
4336 {
4337 am.ClearForceTarget();
4338 m_QuickBarFT = false;
4339 }
4340 }
4341 }
4342 m_QuickBarHold = false;
4343 }
4344 void SetActionEndInput(ActionBase action)
4345 {
4346 m_ActionQBControl = !action.GetInput().IsActive();
4347 }
4348
4349 bool IsQBControl()
4350 {
4351 return m_ActionQBControl;
4352 }
4353 void ResetActionEndInput()
4354 {
4355 m_ActionQBControl = false;
4356 }
4357
4358 //---------------------------------------------------------
4359 // RADIAL QUICKBAR AND RELOAD ACTIONS
4360 //---------------------------------------------------------
4361 //the same functionality as normal quick bar slot key press
4362 void RadialQuickBarSingleUse( int slotClicked )
4363 {
4364 OnQuickBarSingleUse( slotClicked );
4365 }
4366
4367 //removed the need for holding down quick bar slot key
4368 void RadialQuickBarCombine( int slotClicked )
4369 {
4370 EntityAI quickBarEntity = GetQuickBarEntity( slotClicked - 1 );
4371 EntityAI entity_in_hands = GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands();
4372
4373 ReloadWeapon( entity_in_hands, quickBarEntity );
4374 }
4375
4376 //removed the need for holding down quick bar slot key
4377 void QuickReloadWeapon( EntityAI weapon )
4378 {
4379 EntityAI magazine = GetMagazineToReload( weapon );
4380 ReloadWeapon( weapon, magazine );
4381 }
4382
4383 //Reload weapon with given magazine
4384 void ReloadWeapon( EntityAI weapon, EntityAI magazine )
4385 {
4386 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
4387 {
4388 ActionManagerClient mngr_client;
4389 CastTo(mngr_client, GetActionManager());
4390
4391 if (mngr_client && FirearmActionLoadMultiBulletRadial.Cast(mngr_client.GetRunningAction()))
4392 {
4393 mngr_client.Interrupt();
4394 }
4395 else if ( GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands()!= magazine )
4396 {
4397 Weapon_Base wpn;
4398 Magazine mag;
4399 Class.CastTo( wpn, weapon );
4400 Class.CastTo( mag, magazine );
4401 if ( GetWeaponManager().CanUnjam(wpn) )
4402 {
4403 GetWeaponManager().Unjam();
4404 }
4405 else if ( GetWeaponManager().CanAttachMagazine( wpn, mag ) )
4406 {
4407 GetWeaponManager().AttachMagazine( mag );
4408 }
4409 else if ( GetWeaponManager().CanSwapMagazine( wpn, mag ) )
4410 {
4411 GetWeaponManager().SwapMagazine( mag );
4412 }
4413 else if ( GetWeaponManager().CanLoadBullet( wpn, mag ) )
4414 {
4415 //GetWeaponManager().LoadMultiBullet( mag );
4416
4417 ActionTarget atrg = new ActionTarget(mag, this, -1, vector.Zero, -1.0);
4418 if ( mngr_client && !mngr_client.GetRunningAction() && mngr_client.GetAction(FirearmActionLoadMultiBulletRadial).Can(this, atrg, wpn) )
4419 mngr_client.PerformActionStart(mngr_client.GetAction(FirearmActionLoadMultiBulletRadial), atrg, wpn);
4420 }
4421 }
4422 }
4423 }
4424
4425 //returns compatible magazine from player inventory with highest ammo count
4426 EntityAI GetMagazineToReload( EntityAI weapon )
4427 {
4428 Weapon_Base weapon_base = Weapon_Base.Cast( weapon );
4429 WeaponManager weapon_manager = GetWeaponManager();
4430 EntityAI magazine_to_reload;
4431
4432 EntityAI ammo_magazine; //magazine
4433 int last_ammo_magazine_count;
4434 int ammo_magazine_count;
4435
4436 EntityAI ammo_pile; //ammo pile
4437 int last_ammo_pile_count;
4438 int ammo_pile_count;
4439
4440 //Get all magazines in (player) inventory
4441 for ( int att_i = 0; att_i < GetInventory().AttachmentCount(); ++att_i )
4442 {
4443 EntityAI attachment = GetInventory().GetAttachmentFromIndex( att_i );
4444 ref CargoBase attachment_cargo = attachment.GetInventory().GetCargo();
4445
4446 if ( attachment_cargo )
4447 {
4448 for ( int cgo_i = 0; cgo_i < attachment_cargo.GetItemCount(); ++cgo_i )
4449 {
4450 EntityAI cargo_item = attachment_cargo.GetItem( cgo_i );
4451
4452 //check for proper magazine
4453 if ( cargo_item.IsMagazine() )
4454 {
4455 Magazine magazine = Magazine.Cast( cargo_item );
4456 ammo_pile_count = magazine.GetAmmoCount();
4457
4458 //magazines (get magazine with max ammo count)
4459 if ( weapon_manager.CanAttachMagazine( weapon_base, magazine ) || weapon_manager.CanSwapMagazine( weapon_base, magazine ) )
4460 {
4461 if ( ammo_pile_count > 0 )
4462 {
4463 if ( last_ammo_magazine_count == 0 )
4464 {
4465 ammo_magazine = magazine;
4466 last_ammo_magazine_count = ammo_pile_count;
4467 }
4468 else
4469 {
4470 if ( last_ammo_magazine_count < ammo_pile_count )
4471 {
4472 ammo_magazine = magazine;
4473 last_ammo_magazine_count = ammo_pile_count;
4474 }
4475 }
4476 }
4477 }
4478 //bullets (get ammo pile with min ammo count)
4479 else if ( weapon_manager.CanLoadBullet( weapon_base, magazine ) )
4480 {
4481 if ( ammo_pile_count > 0 )
4482 {
4483 if ( last_ammo_pile_count == 0 )
4484 {
4485 ammo_pile = magazine;
4486 last_ammo_pile_count = ammo_pile_count;
4487 }
4488 else
4489 {
4490 if ( last_ammo_pile_count > ammo_pile_count )
4491 {
4492 ammo_pile = magazine;
4493 last_ammo_pile_count = ammo_pile_count;
4494 }
4495 }
4496 }
4497 }
4498 }
4499 }
4500 }
4501 }
4502
4503 //prioritize magazine
4504 if ( ammo_magazine )
4505 {
4506 return ammo_magazine;
4507 }
4508
4509 return ammo_pile;
4510 }
4511 //---------------------------------------------------------
4512

4516 {
4517 if( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
4518 {
4519 GetGame().GetMission().AddDummyPlayerToScheduler( this );
4520 }
4521 }

4561 return GetWeightEx() >= OVERLOAD_LIMIT;

4580
4581 bool IsItemInInventory(EntityAI entity)
4582 {

4584 }
4585
4586 override bool NeedInventoryJunctureFromServer(notnull EntityAI item, EntityAI currParent, EntityAI newParent)
4587 {
4588 if (GetGame().IsMultiplayer())
4589 {
4590 DayZPlayerInstanceType t = GetInstanceType();
4591 switch (t)
4592 {
4593 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_AI_SINGLEPLAYER:
4594 return false;
4595 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT:
4596 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER:
4597 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_AI_SERVER:
4598 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_AI_REMOTE:
4599 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_REMOTE:
4600 return true; // Might help mitigate "megabugged" (desync)
4601
4602 syncDebugPrint("[syncinv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " NeedInventoryJunctureFromServer item=" + Object.GetDebugName(item) + " currPar=" + currParent + " newPar=" + newParent);
4603
4604 bool i_owned = GetHumanInventory().HasEntityInInventory(item);
4605
4606 bool cp_owned = false;
4607 if (currParent)
4608 cp_owned = GetHumanInventory().HasEntityInInventory(currParent);
4609
4610 bool np_owned = false;
4611 if (newParent)
4612 np_owned = GetHumanInventory().HasEntityInInventory(newParent);
4613
4614 bool all_owned = i_owned && cp_owned && (np_owned || (newParent == null));
4615 syncDebugPrint("[syncinv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " NeedInventoryJunctureFromServer=" + !all_owned + " i_pwn=" + i_owned + " cp_pwn=" + cp_owned + " np_pwn=" + np_owned);
4616
4617 return !all_owned;
4618 default:
4619 Error("[syncinv] unsupported instance type t=" + t);
4620 break;
4621 }
4622 }
4623 return false;
4624 }
4625
4626
4627 override protected float GetWeightSpecialized(bool forceRecalc = false)
4628 {
4629 float totalWeight = super.GetWeightSpecialized(forceRecalc);
4630
4631 ItemBase itemHands = GetItemInHands();
4632 if (itemHands) // adds weight of item carried in hands
4633 {
4634 totalWeight += itemHands.GetWeightEx(forceRecalc);
4635 }
4636 #ifdef DEVELOPER
4637 if (WeightDebug.m_VerbosityFlags & WeightDebugType.RECALC_FORCED)
4638 {
4639 float itemInHandsWeight = totalWeight - super.GetWeightSpecialized(forceRecalc);
4640 WeightDebugData dta = WeightDebug.GetWeightDebug(this);
4641 dta.SetCalcDetails("TMan: " + (super.GetWeightSpecialized(forceRecalc)+ itemInHandsWeight) +"(contents weight[includes item in hands])");
4642 }
4643 #endif
4644 return totalWeight;
4645 }
4646
4647 void CalculateVisibilityForAI()
4648 {
4649 const int VISIBILITY_SLOTS_COUNT = 10;
4650
4651 int attcount = GetInventory().AttachmentCount();
4652 float sumVisibility = 0;
4653 float countVisibility = 0;
4654 float visibilityMean = 0;
4655
4656 if (attcount > 0)
4657 {
4658 for (int att = 0; att < attcount; att++)
4659 {
4660 EntityAI attachment = GetInventory().GetAttachmentFromIndex(att);
4661 if ( attachment.IsClothing() )
4662 {
4663 ClothingBase clothing;
4664 Class.CastTo(clothing, attachment);
4665 sumVisibility += clothing.GetItemVisibility();
4666 countVisibility++;
4667 }
4668 }
4669
4670 visibilityMean = (sumVisibility + (VISIBILITY_SLOTS_COUNT - countVisibility)) / VISIBILITY_SLOTS_COUNT;
4671 SetVisibilityCoef(visibilityMean);
4672 }
4673 else
4674 {
4675 visibilityMean = 1;
4676 SetVisibilityCoef(visibilityMean);
4677 }
4678 }
4679
4680 void SetVisibilityCoef(float pVisibility)
4681 {
4682 m_VisibilityCoef = pVisibility;
4683 }
4684
4685 float GetVisibilityCoef()
4686 {
4687 return m_VisibilityCoef;
4688 }

4691 int GetShakeLevel()
4692 {
4693 return m_Shakes;
4694 }

4697 EStatLevels GetStatLevelHealth()
4698 {
4699 float health = GetHealth("","");
4700 return GetStatLevel(health, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_HIGH);
4701 }
4702
4703 EStatLevels GetStatLevelToxicity()
4704 {
4705 float toxicity = GetStatToxicity().Get();
4706 return GetStatLevel(toxicity, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_HIGH);
4707 }
4708
4709 EStatLevels GetStatLevelBlood()
4710 {
4711 float blood = GetHealth("","Blood");
4712 return GetStatLevel(blood, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_HIGH);
4713 }

4718 return GetStatLevel(energy, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_HIGH);
4719 }
4720
4721 EStatLevels GetStatLevelWater()
4722 {
4723 float water = GetStatWater().Get();
4724 return GetStatLevel(water, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_HIGH);
4725 }
4726
4728 /*
4729 EStatLevels GetImmunityLevel()
4730 {
4731 float immunity = GetImmunity();
4732
4733 EStatLevels level;
4734 if( immunity > PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_HIGH )
4735 {
4736 level = EStatLevels.GREAT;
4737 }
4738 else if( immunity > PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_NORMAL )
4739 {
4740 level = EStatLevels.HIGH;
4741 }
4742 else if( immunity > PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_LOW )
4743 {
4744 level = EStatLevels.MEDIUM;
4745 }
4746 else if( immunity > PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_CRITICAL )
4747 {
4748 level = EStatLevels.LOW;
4749 }
4750 else
4751 {
4752 level = EStatLevels.CRITICAL;
4753 }
4754
4755 if( m_ImmunityBoosted && level != EStatLevels.GREAT )
4756 {
4757 level--;
4758 }
4759 return level;
4760 }
4761 */
4762
4763 EStatLevels GetImmunityLevel()
4764 {
4765 float immunity = GetImmunity();
4766 if(m_ImmunityBoosted)
4767 return EStatLevels.GREAT;
4768 return GetStatLevel(immunity, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_LOW, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_HIGH);
4769 }
4770
4771 //-------------------------------------
4772 float GetBordersImmunity()
4773 {
4774 float immunity = GetImmunity();
4775 float immmunity_max = 1;
4776 return GetStatLevelBorders(immunity, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_LOW, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_HIGH, immmunity_max);
4777 }
4778
4779
4780 float GetStatBordersHealth()
4781 {
4782 float health = GetHealth("","");
4783 float health_max = GetMaxHealth("","");
4784 return GetStatLevelBorders(health, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_HIGH, health_max);
4785 }
4786
4787 float GetStatBordersToxicity()
4788 {
4789 float toxicity = GetStatToxicity().Get();
4790 float toxicity_max = GetStatToxicity().GetMax();
4791 return GetStatLevelBorders(toxicity, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_HIGH, toxicity_max);
4792 }
4793
4794 float GetStatBordersBlood()
4795 {
4796 float blood = GetHealth("","Blood");
4797 float blood_max = GetMaxHealth("","Blood");
4798 return GetStatLevelBorders(blood, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_HIGH, blood_max);
4799 }
4800
4801 float GetStatBordersEnergy()
4802 {
4803 float energy = GetStatEnergy().Get();
4804 float energy_max = GetStatEnergy().GetMax();
4805 return GetStatLevelBorders(energy, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_HIGH, energy_max);
4806 }
4807
4808 float GetStatBordersWater()
4809 {
4810 float water = GetStatWater().Get();
4811 float water_max = GetStatWater().GetMax();
4812 return GetStatLevelBorders(water, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_HIGH, water_max);
4813 }
4814
4815 //------------------------------------
4816
4817 float GetStatLevelBorders(float stat_value, float critical, float low, float normal, float high, float max)
4818 {
4819 if(stat_value <= critical)
4820 {
4821 return Math.InverseLerp(0, critical, stat_value);
4822 }
4823 if(stat_value <= low)
4824 {
4825 return Math.InverseLerp(critical, low, stat_value);
4826 }
4827 if(stat_value <= normal)
4828 {
4829 return Math.InverseLerp(low, normal, stat_value);
4830 }
4831 if(stat_value <= high)
4832 {
4833 return Math.InverseLerp(normal, high, stat_value);
4834 }
4835 return Math.InverseLerp(high, max, stat_value);
4836 }
4837
4838 EStatLevels GetStatLevel(float stat_value, float critical, float low, float normal, float high)
4839 {
4840 if(stat_value <= critical)
4841 {
4842 return EStatLevels.CRITICAL;
4843 }
4844 if(stat_value <= low)
4845 {
4846 return EStatLevels.LOW;
4847 }
4848 if(stat_value <= normal)
4849 {
4850 return EStatLevels.MEDIUM;
4851 }
4852 if(stat_value <= high)
4853 {
4854 return EStatLevels.HIGH;
4855 }
4856 return EStatLevels.GREAT;
4857 }
4858
4859 void SetImmunityBoosted(bool boosted)
4860 {
4861 m_ImmunityBoosted = boosted;
4862 }
4863
4864
4865
4867 float GetImmunity()
4868 {
4869 float immunity;
4870 if( GetPlayerStats() )
4871 {
4872 float max_health = GetMaxHealth("GlobalHealth", "Health") + 0.01;//addition to prevent divisioin by zero in case of some messup
4873 float max_blood = GetMaxHealth("GlobalHealth", "Blood") + 0.01;//addition to prevent divisioin by zero in case of some messup
4874 float energy_normalized = GetStatEnergy().Get() / PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_MAX;
4875 float water_normalized = GetStatWater().Get() / PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_MAX;
4876 float health_normalized = GetHealth("GlobalHealth", "Health") / max_health;
4877 float blood_normalized = GetHealth("GlobalHealth", "Blood") / max_blood;
4878 immunity = energy_normalized + water_normalized + health_normalized + blood_normalized;
4879 immunity = immunity / 4;//avg
4880 immunity = Math.Clamp(immunity,0,1);
4881 }
4882 return immunity;
4883 }
4884
4885 bool IsSprinting()
4886 {
4887 return m_MovementState.m_iMovement == DayZPlayerConstants.MOVEMENT_SPRINT);
4888 }
4889
4890 bool CanSprint()
4891 {
4892 ItemBase item = GetItemInHands();
4893 if ( IsRaised() || (item && item.IsHeavyBehaviour()) )
4894 {
4895 return false;
4896 }
4897
4898 if (GetBrokenLegs() != eBrokenLegs.NO_BROKEN_LEGS)
4899 {
4900 return false;
4901 }
4902
4903 return true;
4904 }
4905
4906 bool IsInProne()
4907 {
4908 return m_MovementState.IsInProne();
4909 }
4910
4911 bool IsInRasedProne()
4912 {
4913 return m_MovementState.IsInRaisedProne();
4914 }
4915
4916 bool IsLeaning()
4917 {
4918 return m_MovementState.IsLeaning();
4919 }
4920
4921 bool IsRolling()
4922 {
4923 return GetCommand_Move() && GetCommand_Move().IsInRoll());
4924 }

4928 {

4930 return m_MovementState.IsRaised();
4931 }
4932 */
4933
4934 bool IsSwimming()
4935 {
4936 return m_MovementState.m_CommandTypeId == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_SWIM;
4937 }
4938
4939 bool IsClimbingLadder()
4940 {
4941 return m_MovementState.m_CommandTypeId == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_LADDER;
4942 }
4943
4944 bool IsClimbing()
4945 {
4946 return m_MovementState.m_CommandTypeId == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_CLIMB;
4947 }
4948
4949 bool IsFalling()
4950 {
4951 return m_MovementState.m_CommandTypeId == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_FALL;
4952 }
4953
4954 bool IsInVehicle()
4955 {
4956 return m_MovementState.m_CommandTypeId == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_VEHICLE || (GetParent() != null && GetParent().IsInherited(Transport));
4957 }

4967 {

4969 }
4970 else
