4989
4990 void RunFightBlendTimer()
4991 {
4992 if (!m_FightEndBlendTimer)
4993 m_FightEndBlendTimer = new Timer();
4994 if (!m_FightEndBlendTimer.IsRunning())
4995 {
4996 m_FightEndBlendTimer.Run(PlayerConstants.MELEE2_MOVEMENT_BLEND_DELAY,this,"EndFighting");
4997 }
4998 }
4999
5000 void EndFighting()
5001 {
5002 m_IsFighting = false;
5003 }
5004
5005 bool CheckMeleeItemDamage(ItemBase item)
5006 {
5007 //on-hit drop of melee weapons
5008 //bayonets & buttstocks
5009 if (item && item.GetHierarchyParent() && item.GetHierarchyParent().IsWeapon() && item.IsRuined()/*&& item.FindAttachmentBySlotName()*/)
5010 {
5011 PlayAttachmentDropSound();
5012 return DropItem(item);
5013 }
5014 //handheld items themselves
5015 if (item && item == GetItemInHands() && item.IsRuined())
5016 {
5017 return PredictiveDropEntity(item);
5018 }
5019 return false;
5020 }
5021
5022 void PlayAttachmentDropSound()
5023 {
5024 //TODO
5025 }
5026
5027 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5028 override void RPC(int rpc_type, array<ref Param> params, bool guaranteed, PlayerIdentity recipient = NULL)
5029 {
5030 super.RPC(rpc_type, params, guaranteed, recipient);
5031 }
5032
5033 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5034 override void OnRPC(PlayerIdentity sender, int rpc_type, ParamsReadContext ctx)
5035 {
5036 super.OnRPC(sender, rpc_type, ctx);
5037
5038 switch (rpc_type)
5039 {
5040 #ifndef SERVER
5041
5042 case ERPCs.RPC_SYNC_DISPLAY_STATUS:
5043 if ( GetVirtualHud() )
5044 {
5045 GetVirtualHud().OnRPC(ctx);
5046 }
5047 break;
5048
5049 case ERPCs.RPC_PLAYER_SYMPTOM_ON:
5050 if ( GetSymptomManager() )
5051 {
5052 GetSymptomManager().OnRPC(ERPCs.RPC_PLAYER_SYMPTOM_ON, ctx);
5053 }
5054 break;
5055
5056 case ERPCs.RPC_PLAYER_SYMPTOM_OFF:
5057 if ( GetSymptomManager() )
5058 {
5059 GetSymptomManager().OnRPC(ERPCs.RPC_PLAYER_SYMPTOM_OFF, ctx);
5060 }
5061 break;
5062
5063 case ERPCs.RPC_DAMAGE_VALUE_SYNC:
5064 if ( m_TrasferValues )
5065 m_TrasferValues.OnRPC(ctx);
5066 break;
5067
5068 case ERPCs.RPC_USER_ACTION_MESSAGE:
5069 if ( !GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
5070 {
5071 break;
5072 }
5073 if ( ctx.Read(m_UAParamMessage) )
5074 {
5075 string actiontext = m_UAParamMessage.param1;
5076 MessageAction(actiontext);
5077 }
5078 break;
5079
5080 case ERPCs.RPC_SOFT_SKILLS_SPECIALTY_SYNC:
5081 ref Param1<float> p_synch = new Param1<float>(0);
5082 ctx.Read( p_synch );
5083 float specialty_level = p_synch.param1;
5084 GetSoftSkillsManager().SetSpecialtyLevel( specialty_level );
5085 break;
5086
5087 case ERPCs.RPC_SOFT_SKILLS_STATS_SYNC:
5088 ref Param5<float, float, float, float, bool> p_debug_synch = new Param5<float, float ,float, float, bool>(0, 0, 0, 0, false);
5089 ctx.Read( p_debug_synch );
5090 float general_bonus_before = p_debug_synch.param1;
5091 float general_bonus_after = p_debug_synch.param2;
5092 float last_UA_value = p_debug_synch.param3;
5093 float cooldown_value = p_debug_synch.param4;
5094 float cooldown_active = p_debug_synch.param5;
5095 GetSoftSkillsManager().SetGeneralBonusBefore( general_bonus_before );
5096 GetSoftSkillsManager().SetGeneralBonusAfter( general_bonus_after );
5097 GetSoftSkillsManager().SetLastUAValue( last_UA_value );
5098 GetSoftSkillsManager().SetCoolDownValue( cooldown_value );
5099 GetSoftSkillsManager().SetCoolDown( cooldown_active );
5100 break;
5101
5102 case ERPCs.RPC_WARNING_ITEMDROP:
5103 {
5104 if ( GetGame().IsClient() && GetGame().GetUIManager() && !GetGame().GetUIManager().FindMenu(MENU_WARNING_ITEMDROP) )
5105 {
5106 GetGame().GetCallQueue(CALL_CATEGORY_GAMEPLAY).Call(GetGame().GetUIManager().EnterScriptedMenu,MENU_WARNING_ITEMDROP,null);
5107 GetGame().GetMission().AddActiveInputExcludes({"menu"});
5108 }
5109 break;
5110 }
5111
5112 case ERPCs.RPC_WARNING_TELEPORT:
5113 {
5114 if ( GetGame().IsClient() && GetGame().GetUIManager() && !GetGame().GetUIManager().FindMenu(MENU_WARNING_TELEPORT) )
5115 {
5116 GetGame().GetCallQueue(CALL_CATEGORY_GAMEPLAY).Call(GetGame().GetUIManager().EnterScriptedMenu,MENU_WARNING_TELEPORT,null);
5117 GetGame().GetMission().AddActiveInputExcludes({"menu"});
5118 }
5119 break;
5120 }
5121 case ERPCs.RPC_INIT_SET_QUICKBAR:
5122 ref Param1<int> count = new Param1<int>(0);
5123 if ( ctx.Read( count ) );
5124 {
5125 for ( int i = 0; i < count.param1 ; i++ )
5126 {
5127 m_QuickBarBase.OnSetEntityRPC(ctx);
5128 }
5129 }
5130 break;
5131
5132 case ERPCs.RPC_SYNC_THERMOMETER:
5133 {
5134 float value;
5135 if ( ctx.Read( value ) )
5136 m_Hud.SetTemperature( value.ToString() + "#degrees_celsius" );
5137 break;
5138 }
5139
5140
5141 case ERPCs.RPC_CHECK_PULSE:
5142 ctx.Read(CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_INT);
5143 EPulseType pulse;
5144 if ( (CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_INT.param1 & ActionCheckPulse.TARGET_IRREGULAR_PULSE_BIT) == 0 )
5145 {
5146 pulse = EPulseType.REGULAR;
5147 }
5148 else
5149 {
5150 pulse = EPulseType.IRREGULAR;
5151 }
5152
5153 int blood_level = ~ActionCheckPulse.TARGET_IRREGULAR_PULSE_BIT & CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_INT.param1;
5154 if (m_CheckPulseLastTarget)
5155 {
5156 m_CheckPulseLastTarget.SetLastUAMessage(ActionCheckPulse.GetPulseMessage(pulse, blood_level));
5157 }
5158 break;
5159
5161 //woodcutting
5162 case PlantType.TREE_HARD:
5163 SoundHardTreeFallingPlay();
5164 break;
5165
5166 case PlantType.TREE_SOFT:
5167 SoundSoftTreeFallingPlay();
5168 break;
5169
5170 case PlantType.BUSH_HARD:
5171 SoundHardBushFallingPlay();
5172 break;
5173
5174 case PlantType.BUSH_SOFT:
5175 SoundSoftBushFallingPlay();
5176 break;
5177
5178 case ERPCs.RPC_DEBUG_MONITOR_FLT:
5179 if ( m_DebugMonitorValues )
5180 {
5181 m_DebugMonitorValues.OnRPCFloat(ctx);
5182 }
5183 break;
5184
5185 case ERPCs.RPC_DEBUG_MONITOR_STR:
5186 if ( m_DebugMonitorValues )
5187 {
5188 m_DebugMonitorValues.OnRPCString(ctx);
5189 }
5190 break;
5191 #endif
5192
5193
5194 /*
5195 case ERPCs.RPC_CRAFTING_INVENTORY_INSTANT:
5196 ref Param3<int, ItemBase, ItemBase> craftParam = new Param3<int, ItemBase, ItemBase>(-1, NULL, NULL);
5197 if (ctx.Read( craftParam ) )
5198 {
5199 m_ModuleRecipesManager.PerformRecipeServer(craftParam.param1, craftParam.param2, craftParam.param3, this);
5200 }
5201 break;
5202 */
5203
5204
5205
5206 #ifdef DIAG_DEVELOPER
5207 case ERPCs.DEV_RPC_AGENT_RESET:
5208 {
5209 bool val;
5210 if ( ctx.Read( val ) )
5211 m_AgentPool.RemoveAllAgents();
5212 break;
5213 }
5214
5215 case ERPCs.DEV_PLAYER_DEBUG_REQUEST:
5216 {
5217 PluginRemotePlayerDebugServer plugin_remote_server = PluginRemotePlayerDebugServer.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginRemotePlayerDebugServer) );
5218 plugin_remote_server.OnRPC(ctx, this);
5219 break;
5220 }
5221
5222 case ERPCs.DEV_PLAYER_DEBUG_DATA:
5223 {
5224 PluginRemotePlayerDebugClient plugin_remote_client = PluginRemotePlayerDebugClient.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginRemotePlayerDebugClient) );
5225 PluginDeveloper plugin_dev = PluginDeveloper.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginDeveloper) );
5226 if ( plugin_dev.m_ScriptConsole )
5227 plugin_dev.m_ScriptConsole.OnRPCEx(rpc_type, ctx);
5228 else
5229 plugin_remote_client.OnRPC(ctx);
5230 break;
5231 }
5232
5233 case ERPCs.DEV_AGENT_GROW:
5234 {
5235 m_AgentPool.RemoteGrowRequestDebug(ctx);
5236 break;
5237 }
5238
5239 case ERPCs.RPC_ITEM_DIAG_CLOSE:
5240 {
5241 PluginItemDiagnostic mid = PluginItemDiagnostic.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginItemDiagnostic) );
5242 mid.StopWatchRequest(this);
5243 break;
5244 }
5245
5247 case ERPCs.DEV_REQUEST_UTS_DEBUG:
5248 {
5249 PluginUniversalTemperatureSourceServer plugin_uts_server = PluginUniversalTemperatureSourceServer.Cast(GetPlugin(PluginUniversalTemperatureSourceServer));
5250 plugin_uts_server.OnRPC(ctx, this);
5251 break;
5252 }
5253
5254 case ERPCs.DEV_UTS_DEBUG_DATA:
5255 {
5256 PluginUniversalTemperatureSourceClient plugin_uts_client = PluginUniversalTemperatureSourceClient.Cast(GetPlugin(PluginUniversalTemperatureSourceClient));
5257 plugin_uts_client.OnRPC(ctx);
5258 break;
5259 }
5261 #endif
5262
5263 #ifdef DEVELOPER
5264 case ERPCs.DEV_RPC_SERVER_SCRIPT:
5265 {
5266 //PluginItemDiagnostic plugin = PluginItemDiagnostic.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginItemDiagnostic) );
5267 //SetDebugDeveloper_item(plugin.GetWatchedItem(this));//!! needs to be inside DEVELOPER ifdef
5268
5269 if ( ctx.Read(CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_STRING))
5270 {
5271 _player = this;
5272 string code = CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_STRING.param1;
5273 bool success = GetGame().ExecuteEnforceScript("void scConsMain() \n{\n" + code + "\n}\n", "scConsMain");
5274 CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_BOOL.param1 = success;
5275 RPCSingleParam(ERPCs.DEV_RPC_SERVER_SCRIPT_RESULT, CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_BOOL,true, GetIdentity());
5276 }
5277 break;
5278 }
5279
5280 case ERPCs.DEV_RPC_SERVER_SCRIPT_RESULT:
5281 {
5282 PluginDeveloper dev = PluginDeveloper.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginDeveloper) );
5283 if ( dev.m_ScriptConsole )
5284 dev.m_ScriptConsole.OnRPCEx(rpc_type, ctx);
5285 break;
5286 }
5287
5288 case ERPCs.DEV_SET_DEV_ITEM:
5289 {
5290 Param1<EntityAI> ent = new Param1<EntityAI>(null);
5291 if (ctx.Read(ent) && ent.param1)
5292 {
5293 PluginItemDiagnostic mid2 = PluginItemDiagnostic.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginItemDiagnostic) );
5294 mid2.RegisterDebugItem( ent.param1, this);
5295 }
5296 //SetDebugDeveloper_item(this);
5297 break;
5298 }
5299
5300 case ERPCs.RPC_ITEM_DIAG:
5301 {
5302 Param1<EntityAI> p1 = new Param1<EntityAI>(null);
5303 if (ctx.Read(p1))
5304 {
5305 PluginItemDiagnostic plgn = PluginItemDiagnostic.Cast( GetPlugin( PluginItemDiagnostic ) );
5306 plgn.OnRPC( p1.param1, ctx );
5307 }
5308 break;
5309 }
5310 #endif
5311 }
5312
5313 #ifdef DIAG_DEVELOPER
5314 PluginDeveloper module_rc = PluginDeveloper.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginDeveloper) );
5315 if ( module_rc )
5316 module_rc.OnRPC(this, rpc_type, ctx);
5317
5318 PluginDeveloperSync module_rcs = PluginDeveloperSync.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginDeveloperSync) );
5319 if ( module_rcs )
5320 module_rcs.OnRPC(this, rpc_type, ctx);
5321
5322 #ifdef SERVER
5323 PluginDiagMenu plugin_diag_menu = PluginDiagMenu.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginDiagMenuServer) );
5324 #else
5325 PluginDiagMenu plugin_diag_menu = PluginDiagMenu.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginDiagMenuClient) );
5326 #endif
5327
5328 if ( plugin_diag_menu )
5329 plugin_diag_menu.OnRPC(this, rpc_type, ctx);
5330 #endif
5331 }
5332
5333 override void OnGameplayDataHandlerSync()
5334 {
5335 super.OnGameplayDataHandlerSync();
5336
5337 UpdateLighting();
5338 //Print("setting respawn to " + CfgGameplayHandler.GetDisableRespawnDialog());
5339 GetGame().GetMission().SetRespawnModeClient(CfgGameplayHandler.GetDisableRespawnDialog());//TODO: maybe move to mission/game ?
5340 SetHitPPEEnabled(CfgGameplayHandler.GetHitIndicationPPEEnabled());
5341 }
5342
5343 void UpdateLighting()
5344 {
5345 Mission mission = GetGame().GetMission();
5346 if ( mission )
5347 {
5348 WorldLighting wLighting = mission.GetWorldLighting();
5349 if ( wLighting )
5350 wLighting.SetGlobalLighting( CfgGameplayHandler.GetLightingConfig());
5351 }
5352 }
5353
5354 void SetContaminatedEffectEx(bool enable, int ppeIdx = -1, int aroundId = ParticleList.CONTAMINATED_AREA_GAS_AROUND, int tinyId = ParticleList.CONTAMINATED_AREA_GAS_TINY, string soundset = "", bool partDynaUpdate = false, int newBirthRate = 0 )
5355 {
5356 if ( enable ) // enable
5357 {
5358 // We assume that if this is set to true the PPE is already active
5359 if ( m_ContaminatedAreaEffectEnabled == enable )
5360 return;
5361
5362 if ( aroundId !=0 )
5363 {
5364 if (!m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer)
5365 {
5366 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer = ParticleManager.GetInstance().PlayInWorld( aroundId, GetPosition());
5367 }
5368 // First entry in an area with dynamic tweaks to particles
5369 if ( partDynaUpdate )
5370 {
5371 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.SetParameter( 0, EmitorParam.BIRTH_RATE, newBirthRate );
5372 }
5373 }
5374
5375 if ( !m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny && tinyId !=0 )
5376 {
5377 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny = ParticleManager.GetInstance().PlayInWorld( tinyId, GetPosition() );
5378 }
5379
5380 if ( ppeIdx != -1 )
5381 {
5382 PPERequesterBase ppeRequester;
5383 if ( Class.CastTo( ppeRequester, PPERequesterBank.GetRequester( ppeIdx ) ) )
5384 ppeRequester.Start();
5385 }
5386
5387 // We start playing the ambient sound
5388 if (!m_AmbientContamination && soundset != "")
5389 PlaySoundSetLoop( m_AmbientContamination, soundset, 0.1, 0.1 );
5390
5391 m_ContaminatedAreaEffectEnabled = enable;
5392 }
5393 else // disable
5394 {
5395 if ( m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer )
5396 {
5397 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.Stop();
5398 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer = null;
5399 }
5400
5401 if (m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny)
5402 {
5403 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny.Stop();
5404 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny = null;
5405 }
5406 if (ppeIdx != -1)
5407 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester( ppeIdx ).Stop(new Param1<bool>(true)); //fade out
5408
5409 // We stop the ambient sound
5410 if ( m_AmbientContamination )
5411 StopSoundSet( m_AmbientContamination );
5412
5413 // We make sure to reset the state
5414 m_ContaminatedAreaEffectEnabled = enable;
5415 }
5416 }
5417
5418 void SetContaminatedEffect(bool enable, int ppeIdx = -1, int aroundId = ParticleList.CONTAMINATED_AREA_GAS_AROUND, int tinyId = ParticleList.CONTAMINATED_AREA_GAS_TINY, bool partDynaUpdate = false, int newBirthRate = 0 )
5419 {
5420 SetContaminatedEffectEx(enable, ppeIdx, aroundId, tinyId, "", partDynaUpdate, newBirthRate);
5421 }
5422
5423 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5424 void UpdateCorpseState()
5425 {
5426 UpdateCorpseStateVisual();
5427 if(m_CorpseState > 0)
5428 SetDecayEffects(Math.AbsInt(m_CorpseState));
5429 else if(m_CorpseState < 0)
5430 SetDecayEffects();//no params means remove the effects
5431 m_CorpseStateLocal = m_CorpseState;
5432 }
5433
5434 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5435 override void EEHealthLevelChanged(int oldLevel, int newLevel, string zone)
5436 {
5437 super.EEHealthLevelChanged(oldLevel, newLevel, zone);
5438 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
5439 {
5440 if (newLevel == GameConstants.STATE_RUINED)
5441 {
5442 ClearLastUAMessage();
5443 }
5444 if (m_CorpseState != 0)
5445 {
5446 GetGame().GetCallQueue( CALL_CATEGORY_GUI ).CallLater( UpdateCorpseState, 0, false);
5447 }
5448 }
5449 }
5450
5451
5452 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5453 override void OnVariablesSynchronized()
5454 {
5455 super.OnVariablesSynchronized();
5456 if ( m_ModuleLifespan )
5457 {
5458 m_ModuleLifespan.SynchLifespanVisual( this, m_LifeSpanState, m_HasBloodyHandsVisible, m_HasBloodTypeVisible, m_BloodType );
5459
5460 if (m_LifespanLevelLocal != m_LifeSpanState) //client solution, lifespan level changed
5461 {
5462 m_LifespanLevelLocal = m_LifeSpanState;
5463 UpdateHairSelectionVisibility();
5464 }
5465 }
5466
5467 CheckSoundEvent();
5468 if ( GetBleedingManagerRemote() && IsPlayerLoaded() )
5469 {
5470 GetBleedingManagerRemote().OnVariablesSynchronized(GetBleedingBits());
5471 }
5472
5473 if( m_CorpseStateLocal != m_CorpseState && (IsPlayerLoaded() || IsControlledPlayer()) )
5474 {
5475 UpdateCorpseState();
5476 }
5477
5478 if(m_RefreshAnimStateIdx != m_LocalRefreshAnimStateIdx)
5479 {
5480 RefreshHandAnimationState(396); //mean animation blend time
5481 m_LocalRefreshAnimStateIdx = m_RefreshAnimStateIdx;
5482 }
5483 //-------MODIFIERS START--------
5484 if (m_SyncedModifiers != m_SyncedModifiersPrev)
5485 {
5486 int diff = (m_SyncedModifiers & ~m_SyncedModifiersPrev) | (~m_SyncedModifiers & m_SyncedModifiersPrev);//XOR gets us a mask for modifiers that changed by either deactivating, or activating
5487
5488 if (eModifierSyncIDs.MODIFIER_SYNC_DROWNING & diff)//has this modifier's status as active/inactive changed ?
5489 {
5490 if (eModifierSyncIDs.MODIFIER_SYNC_DROWNING & m_SyncedModifiers)//is this modifier currently active ? if so, it means it's been just activated
5491 {
5492 SetDrowning(true);
5493 }
5494 else
5495 {
5496 SetDrowning(false);
5497 }
5498
5499 }
5500
5501 m_SyncedModifiersPrev = m_SyncedModifiers;
5502 }
5503 //-------MODIFIERS END--------
5504
5505 HandleBrokenLegsSync();
5506
5508 ItemBase itemHands = GetItemInHands();
5509 if (itemHands)
5510 {
5511 RemotelyActivatedItemBehaviour raib = itemHands.GetRemotelyActivatedItemBehaviour();
5512 if (raib)
5513 {
5514 raib.OnVariableSynchronized();
5515 }
5516 }
5517 }
5518
5519 void HandleBrokenLegsSync()
5520 {
5521 if (m_BrokenLegState != m_LocalBrokenState)
5522 {
5523 m_LocalBrokenState = m_BrokenLegState;
5524 bool initial = (m_BrokenLegState < 0);
5525 int state = GetBrokenLegs();
5526 if ( state == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS )
5527 {
5528 //Print(m_BrokenLegState);
5529 if (initial)// <0 values indicate initial activation
5530 {
5531 //Print("synced variables - inital activation of broken legs");
5532 BreakLegSound();
5533 }
5534 else
5535 {
5536 //Print("synced variables - secondary activation of broken legs");
5537 }
5538 }
5539 }
5540 }
5541
5542
5543 void FixAllInventoryItems()
5544 {
5545 array<EntityAI> items = new array<EntityAI>;
5546 GetInventory().EnumerateInventory(InventoryTraversalType.INORDER, items);
5547 foreach (EntityAI item : items)
5548 {
5549 item.SetHealthMax("","");
5550 }
5551 }
5552
5553
5554 void OnInventoryMenuOpen()
5555 {
5556
5557 }
5558
5559 void OnInventoryMenuClose()
5560 {
5561
5562 }
5563
5564 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5565 void OnSelectPlayer()
5566 {
5567 //Print("PlayerBase | OnSelectPlayer()");
5568 m_QuickBarBase.updateSlotsCount();
5569
5570 m_PlayerSelected = true;
5571
5572 m_WeaponManager.SortMagazineAfterLoad();
5573
5574 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
5575 {
5577 SetAITargetCallbacks(new AITargetCallbacksPlayer(this));
5578
5579 array<ref Param> params = new array<ref Param>;
5580 if ( m_aQuickBarLoad )
5581 {
5582 int count = m_aQuickBarLoad.Count();
5583 Param1<int> paramCount = new Param1<int>(count);
5584 params.Insert(paramCount);
5585 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
5586 {
5587 m_QuickBarBase.OnSetEntityNoSync(m_aQuickBarLoad.Get(i).param1,m_aQuickBarLoad.Get(i).param2);
5588 params.Insert(m_aQuickBarLoad.Get(i));
5589 }
5590
5591 if (count > 0 && GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
5592 {
5593 GetGame().RPC(this, ERPCs.RPC_INIT_SET_QUICKBAR, params, true, GetIdentity());
5594 }
5595 m_aQuickBarLoad = NULL;
5596 }
5597
5598 GetSoftSkillsManager().InitSpecialty( GetStatSpecialty().Get() );
5599 GetModifiersManager().SetModifiers(true);
5600
5601 SetSynchDirty();
5602
5603 if ( GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
5604 {
5605 //Drop item warning
5606 if ( m_ProcessUIWarning )
5607 {
5608 GetGame().RPCSingleParam(this, ERPCs.RPC_WARNING_ITEMDROP, null, true, GetIdentity());
5609 m_ProcessUIWarning = false;
5610 }
5611
5612 GetGame().GetMission().SyncRespawnModeInfo(GetIdentity());
5613 }
5614 }
5615
5616 CheckForGag();
5617
5618 if (GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER)
5619 {
5620 m_ActionManager = new ActionManagerServer(this);
5621 m_ConstructionActionData = new ConstructionActionData();
5622
5623 }
5624 else if (GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT)
5625 {
5626 m_ActionManager = new ActionManagerClient(this);
5627 m_CraftingManager = new CraftingManager(this,m_ModuleRecipesManager);
5628 m_ConstructionActionData = new ConstructionActionData();
5629
5630 }
5631
5632 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
5633 {
5634 //m_PlayerLightManager = new PlayerLightManager(this);
5635 if (GetGame().GetMission())
5636 {
5637 GetGame().GetMission().ResetGUI();
5638 // force update player
5639 GetDayZGame().GetBacklit().UpdatePlayer(true);
5640 }
5641
5642 m_DeathCheckTimer = new Timer();
5643 m_DeathCheckTimer.Run(0.1, this, "CheckDeath", null, true);
5644 PPEManagerStatic.GetPPEManager().StopAllEffects(PPERequesterCategory.ALL);
5645 CheckForBurlap();
5646
5647 int characterCount = GetGame().GetMenuData().GetCharactersCount() - 1;
5648 int idx = GetGame().GetMenuData().GetLastPlayedCharacter();
5649 if ( idx == GameConstants.DEFAULT_CHARACTER_MENU_ID || idx > characterCount )
5650 {
5651 GetGame().GetCallQueue(CALL_CATEGORY_GUI).Call(SetNewCharName);
5652 }
5653
5654 GetGame().GetMission().EnableAllInputs(true);
5655
5656 m_PresenceNotifier = PluginPresenceNotifier.Cast( GetPlugin( PluginPresenceNotifier ) );
5657 m_PresenceNotifier.Init(this);
5658 OnGameplayDataHandlerSync();//only here for legacy reasons
5659 }
5660
5661#ifdef BOT
5662 m_Bot = new Bot(this);
5663 m_Bot.Start(true, new MyBotTrigger(this));
5664#endif
5665 }
5666
5667 override void SimulateDeath(bool state)
5668 {
5669 super.SimulateDeath(state);
5670
5671 m_UndergroundHandler = null;
5672 if (m_EffectWidgets)
5673 {
5674 m_EffectWidgets.StopAllEffects();
5675 m_EffectWidgets.ClearSuspendRequests();
5676 }
5677 }
5678
5679 void SetNewCharName()
5680 {
5681 //Print("SetNewCharName");
5682 g_Game.GetMenuData().SaveCharacter(false,true);
5683 g_Game.GetMenuData().SetCharacterName(g_Game.GetMenuData().GetLastPlayedCharacter(), g_Game.GetMenuDefaultCharacterData(false).GetCharacterName() );
5684 //g_Game.GetMenuData().SaveCharacter(false,true);
5685 g_Game.GetMenuData().SaveCharactersLocal();
5686 }
5687
5688 void CheckForBurlap()
5689 {
5690 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
5691 {
5692 BurlapSackCover attachment;
5693 Class.CastTo(attachment, GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.HEADGEAR));
5694
5695 PPERequester_BurlapSackEffects req;
5696 if (Class.CastTo(req,PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequesterBank.REQ_BURLAPSACK)))
5697 {
5698 if ( attachment )
5699 {
5700 req.Start();
5701 }
5702 else if (req.IsRequesterRunning())
5703 {
5704 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_BurlapSackEffects).Stop();
5705 }
5706 }
5707 }
5708 }
5709
5710 void CheckForGag()
5711 {
5712 Clothing item;
5713 Class.CastTo(item, GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.MASK));
5714 if ( !item )
5715 {
5716 Class.CastTo(item, GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.HEADGEAR));
5717 }
5718
5719 if ( item && item.IsObstructingVoice() )
5720 {
5721 item.MutePlayer(this,true);
5722 }
5723 else
5724 {
5725 if (( GetGame().IsServer() && GetGame().IsMultiplayer() ) || ( GetGame().GetPlayer() == this ))
5726 {
5727 GetGame().SetVoiceEffect(this, VoiceEffectMumbling, false);
5728 GetGame().SetVoiceEffect(this, VoiceEffectObstruction, false);
5729 }
5730 }
5731 }
5732
5733 void UpdateMaskBreathWidget(notnull MaskBase mask, bool is_start = false)
5734 {
5735 if(is_start)
5736 m_EffectWidgets.ResetMaskUpdateCount();
5737 float resistance = 0;
5738 if ( mask.HasIntegratedFilter() || mask.IsExternalFilterAttached() )
5739 resistance = 1 - mask.GetFilterQuantity01();
5740
5741
5742 m_EffectWidgets.OnVoiceEvent(resistance);
5743 m_EffectWidgets.IncreaseMaskUpdateCount();
5744
5745 }
5746
5747
5748 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5749 void OnVoiceEvent(PlayerSoundEventBase voice_event)
5750 {
5751 if (m_EffectWidgets)
5752 {
5753 MaskBase mask = MaskBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.MASK));
5754 if (mask)
5755 {
5756 UpdateMaskBreathWidget(mask, true);
5757 //m_EffectWidgets.SetBreathIntensityStamina(GetStaminaHandler().GetStaminaCap(),GetStaminaHandler().GetStamina());
5758 }
5759 }
5760 }
5761
5762 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5764 void OnVoiceEventPlayback(PlayerSoundEventBase voice_event, AbstractWave callback, float playback_time)
5765 {
5766 if (m_EffectWidgets)
5767 {
5768 MaskBase mask = MaskBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.MASK));
5769 if (mask)
5770 {
5771 if ( m_EffectWidgets.m_MaskWidgetUpdateCount < 2 && callback.GetLength() > 2 && playback_time > 0.5 )
5772 UpdateMaskBreathWidget(mask);
5773 }
5774 }
5775 }
5776
5777
5778 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5779 override bool OnInputUserDataProcess(int userDataType, ParamsReadContext ctx)
5780 {
5781 if( super.OnInputUserDataProcess(userDataType, ctx) )
5782 return true;
5783
5784 if( m_QuickBarBase.OnInputUserDataProcess(userDataType, ctx) )
5785 return true;
5786
5787 if( m_WeaponManager.OnInputUserDataProcess(userDataType, ctx) )
5788 return true;
5789
5790 if( HandleRemoteItemManipulation(userDataType, ctx) )
5791 return true;
5792
5793 if ( userDataType == INPUT_UDT_INVENTORY && GetHumanInventory().OnInputUserDataProcess(ctx) )
5794 return true;
5795
5796 if ( TogglePlacingServer( userDataType, ctx ) )
5797 return true;
5798
5799 if ( ResetADSPlayerSync( userDataType, ctx ) )
5800 return true;
5801
5802 string uid;
5803 bool mute;
5804 if( userDataType == INPUT_UDT_USER_MUTE_XBOX )
5805 {
5806 if( ctx.Read( uid ) && ctx.Read( mute ) )
5807 {
5808 GetGame().MutePlayer( uid, GetIdentity().GetPlainId(), mute );
5809 // commented because plainID should not be present in logs
5810 //Print( "Player: " + GetIdentity().GetId() + " set mute for " + uid + " to " + mute );
5811 }
5812 }
5813
5814 if( m_EmoteManager && userDataType == INPUT_UDT_GESTURE )
5815 return m_EmoteManager.OnInputUserDataProcess(userDataType, ctx);
5816
5817 if( userDataType == INPUT_UDT_WEAPON_LIFT_EVENT )
5818 return ReadLiftWeaponRequest(userDataType, ctx);
5819
5820 if( m_ActionManager )
5821 return m_ActionManager.OnInputUserDataProcess(userDataType, ctx);
5822 return false;
5823 }
5824
5825 float GetHealthRegenSpeed()
5826 {
5827 float blood = GetHealth("GlobalHealth", "Blood");
5828 float blood_scale_normalized = Math.InverseLerp(PlayerConstants.BLOOD_THRESHOLD_FATAL, GetMaxHealth("", "Blood"), blood);
5829 blood_scale_normalized = Math.Clamp(blood_scale_normalized,0,1);
5830 return Math.Lerp(PlayerConstants.HEALTH_REGEN_MIN, PlayerConstants.HEALTH_REGEN_MAX, blood_scale_normalized);
5831 }
5832
5833 bool HandleRemoteItemManipulation(int userDataType, ParamsReadContext ctx)
5834 {
5835 if( userDataType == INPUT_UDT_ITEM_MANIPULATION )
5836 {
5837 int type = -1;
5838 ItemBase item1 = null;
5839 ItemBase item2 = null;
5840 bool use_stack_max = false;
5841 int slot_id = -1;
5842
5843 if (!ctx.Read(type))
5844 return false;
5845
5846 if (type == 4)
5847 {
5848 if (!ctx.Read(item1))
5849 return false;
5850 InventoryLocation dst = new InventoryLocation;
5851 if (dst.ReadFromContext(ctx))
5852 {
5853 //Print(InventoryLocation.DumpToStringNullSafe(dst));
5854 bool dummy;
5855 if (ctx.Read(dummy))
5856 item1.SplitItemToInventoryLocation(dst);
5857 else
5858 item1.SplitIntoStackMaxToInventoryLocation(dst);
5859 return true;
5860 }
5861 return false;
5862 }
5863
5864 if (!ctx.Read(item1))
5865 return false;
5866 if (!ctx.Read(item2))
5867 return false;
5868 if (!ctx.Read(use_stack_max))
5869 return false;
5870 if (!ctx.Read(slot_id))
5871 return false;
5872
5873 if ( type == -1 && item1 && item2 )//combine
5874 {
5875 item1.CombineItems( item2, use_stack_max );
5876 }
5877 else if ( type == 1 && item1 )
5878 {
5879 if ( use_stack_max )
5880 item1.SplitIntoStackMax(item2, slot_id, this);
5881 else
5882 item1.SplitItem(this);
5883 }
5884 else if ( type == 2 && item1 )
5885 {
5886 int row, col;
5887 if ( !ctx.Read( row ) )
5888 return false;
5889 if ( !ctx.Read( col ) )
5890 return false;
5891 item1.SplitIntoStackMaxCargo( item2, slot_id, row, col );
5892 }
5893 else if ( type == 3 && item1 )
5894 {
5895 item1.SplitIntoStackMaxHands( this );
5896 }
5897 return true;
5898 }
5899 return false;
5900 }
5901
5902 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5903 ItemBase GetItemInHands()
5904 {
5905 if (GetHumanInventory())
5906 {
5907 return ItemBase.Cast( GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands() );
5908 }
5909 return null;
5910
5911 }
5912
5913 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5914
5915
5916 override EntityAI SpawnEntityOnGroundPos(string object_name, vector pos)
5917 {
5918 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
5919 {
5920 bool is_AI = GetGame().IsKindOf( object_name, "DZ_LightAI");
5921 if (is_AI)
5922 {
5923 return SpawnAI(object_name, pos);
5924 }
5925 else
5926 {
5927 InventoryLocation inv_loc = new InventoryLocation;
5928 vector mtx[4];
5929 Math3D.MatrixIdentity4(mtx);
5930 mtx[3] = pos;
5931 inv_loc.SetGround(NULL, mtx);
5932 //return GetGame().SpawnEntity(object_name, inv_loc, ECE_PLACE_ON_SURFACE, RF_DEFAULT);
5933 return EntityAI.Cast(GetGame().CreateObjectEx(object_name, inv_loc.GetPos(), ECE_PLACE_ON_SURFACE));
5934 }
5935 }
5936 return null;
5937 }
5938
5939 EntityAI SpawnEntityOnGroundOnCursorDir(string object_name, float distance)
5940 {
5941 vector position = GetPosition() + ( GetDirection() * distance );
5942 return SpawnEntityOnGroundPos(object_name, position);
5943 }
5944
5945 EntityAI SpawnAI(string object_name, vector pos)
5946 {
5947 bool is_ai = GetGame().IsKindOf( object_name, "DZ_LightAI");
5948 if (is_ai)
5949 {
5950 return EntityAI.Cast( GetGame().CreateObjectEx(object_name, pos, ECE_PLACE_ON_SURFACE|ECE_INITAI|ECE_EQUIP_ATTACHMENTS) );
5951 }
5952 return NULL;
5953 }
5954
5955
5956 /*EntityAI SpawnAttachmentOnPointerPos (string object_name, bool full_quantity, EntityAI attachmentObject = NULL)
5957 {
5958 Object cursor_obj = GetCursorObject();
5959 if ( cursor_obj != NULL && cursor_obj.IsInherited(EntityAI) )
5960 {
5961 EntityAI eai = (EntityAI)cursor_obj;
5962 eai.TakeEntityAsAttachment(item);
5963 }
5964 else if ( attachmentObject != NULL)
5965 {

5967 }
5968 }*/
5969
5983 /*EntityAI SpawnItem (string object_name, bool full_quantity, float distance = 0, bool usePosition = false, vector pos = "0 0 0", EntityAI attachmentObject = NULL)
5984 {
5985 EntityAI entity = NULL;
5986
5987 // Creat Object
5988 bool is_ai = GetGame().IsKindOf( object_name, "DZ_LightAI");
5989 vector item_position;
5990 if( usePosition )
5991 {
5992 item_position = pos;
5993 }
5994 else
5995 {
5996 item_position = GetPosition() + ( GetDirection() * distance );
5997 }
5998 entity = GetGame().CreateObject(object_name, item_position, false, is_ai);
5999
6000 if ( !entity )
6001 {
6002 string s = "Cannot spawn entity: "+object_name;
6003 Print(s);
6004 //g_Game.GetUIManager().ShowDialog("Spawn error", "Cannot spawn item: "+object_name, 0, DBT_OK, DBB_YES, DMT_EXCLAMATION, this);
6005 return NULL;
6006 }
6007
6008 if ( entity.IsInherited( ItemBase ) )
6009 {
6010 ItemBase item = entity;
6011
6012 // Set full quantity
6013 if ( full_quantity )
6014 {
6015 item.SetQuantity(item.GetQuantityMax());
6016 }
6017
6018 // Spawn In Inventory
6019 if ( spawn_type == SPAWNTYPE_INVENTORY )
6020 {
6021 TakeItemToInventory(item);
6022 }
6023 // Spawn In Hands
6024 if ( spawn_type == SPAWNTYPE_HANDS )
6025 {
6026 TakeItemToHands(item);
6027 }
6028 // Spawn As Attachment
6029 if ( spawn_type == SPAWNTYPE_ATTACHMENT )
6030 {
6031 Object cursor_obj = GetCursorObject();
6032 if ( cursor_obj != NULL && cursor_obj.IsInherited(EntityAI) )
6033 {
6034 EntityAI eai = (EntityAI)cursor_obj;
6035 eai.TakeEntityAsAttachment(item);
6036 }
6037 else if ( attachmentObject != NULL)
6038 {
6039 attachmentObject.TakeEntityAsAttachment(item);
6040 }
6041 }
6042 }
6043
6044 return entity;
6045 }*/
6046
6047 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
6048 bool DropItem(ItemBase item)
6049 {
6050 bool can_be_dropped = CanDropEntity( item );
6051 if( can_be_dropped )
6052 {
6053 can_be_dropped = PredictiveDropEntity( item );
6054 }
6055
6056 vector pos_spawn = GetPosition() + GetDirection();
6057 pos_spawn[0] = pos_spawn[0] + Math.RandomFloat(-0.2, 0.2);
6058 pos_spawn[2] = pos_spawn[2] + Math.RandomFloat(-0.2, 0.2);
6059
6060 item.SetPosition(pos_spawn);
6061 item.PlaceOnSurface();
6062 return can_be_dropped;
6063 }
6064
6065 /*bool TakeItemToInventory (bool synchronize, ItemBase item)
6066 {
6067 ItemBase itemInHands;
6068 itemInHands = GetItemInHands();
6069
6070 if ( itemInHands == item )
6071 {
6072 SynchronizedMoveItemFromHandsToInventory(synchronize);
6073 return true;
6074 }
6075
6076 // in case the player have a cargo item in hands we put item from vicinity into it
6077 if ( itemInHands && itemInHands.GetInventory().GetCargo() )
6078 {
6079 if( itemInHands.GetInventory().CanAddEntityIntoInventory(item) )
6080 {
6081 EntityAI entity;
6082 Class.CastTo(entity, item);
6083 itemInHands.SynchronizedTakeEntityToCargo(do_synchronize, entity);
6084 return true;
6085 }
6086 }
6087
6088 if ( GetInventory().CanAddEntityToInventory(item) )
6089 {
6090 SynchronizedTakeEntityToInventory(synchronize, item);
6091 return true;
6092 }
6093
6094 //g_Game.GetUIManager().ShowDialog("Spawn error", "Cannot take item into inventory! ("+object_name+")", 0, DBT_OK, DBB_YES, DMT_EXCLAMATION, this);
6095 return false;
6096 }
6097
6098 void TakeItemToHands(ItemBase item)
6099 {
6100 TakeEntityToHands(item);
6101 }*/
6102
6103 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
6114 EntityAI CreateInInventory( string item_name, string cargo_type = "", bool full_quantity = false ) // TODO: Create item in cargo
6115 {
6116 InventoryLocation inv_loc = new InventoryLocation;
6117 if (GetInventory().FindFirstFreeLocationForNewEntity(item_name, FindInventoryLocationType.ANY, inv_loc))
6118 {
6119 return SpawnItemOnLocation(item_name, inv_loc, full_quantity);
6120 }
6121 return NULL;
6122 }
6123
6124
6125 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
6134 /*ItemBase CopyInventoryItem( ItemBase orig_item )
6135 {
6136 ItemBase item = ItemBase.Cast( GetInventory().CreateInInventory( orig_item.GetType() ) );
6137 if ( item == NULL )
6138 {
6139 return NULL;
6140 }
6141
6142 // Copy of quantity
6143 item.SetQuantity( orig_item.GetQuantity() );
6144
6145 // Copy of damage
6146 item.SetHealth( "", "", orig_item.GetHealth("", "") );
6147
6148 return item;
6149 }*/
6150
6151 ItemBase CreateCopyOfItemInInventory ( ItemBase src )
6152 {
6153 InventoryLocation loc = new InventoryLocation;
6154 string t = src.GetType();
6155 if (GetInventory().FindFirstFreeLocationForNewEntity(t, FindInventoryLocationType.CARGO, loc))
6156 {
6157 bool locked = GetGame().HasInventoryJunctureDestination(this, loc);
6158 if (locked)
6159 {
6160 Print("Warning: Split: CreateCopyOfItemInInventory - Cannot create entity at locked inventory at loc=" + InventoryLocation.DumpToStringNullSafe(loc));
6161 return null;
6162 }
6163 ItemBase dst = ItemBase.Cast( GetInventory().LocationCreateLocalEntity(loc, t, ECE_IN_INVENTORY, RF_DEFAULT) );
6164 if (dst)
6165 {
6166 MiscGameplayFunctions.TransferItemProperties(src, dst);
6167
6168 GetGame().RemoteObjectTreeCreate(dst);
6169
6170 Print("CreateCopyOfItemInInventory - created " + dst.GetName() + " at loc=" + InventoryLocation.DumpToStringNullSafe(loc));
6171 }
6172 return dst;
6173 }
6174 return NULL;
6175 }
6176
6177 ItemBase CreateCopyOfItemInInventoryOrGround(ItemBase src)
6178 {
6179 return CreateCopyOfItemInInventoryOrGroundEx(src, false);
6180 }
6181
6182 ItemBase CreateCopyOfItemInInventoryOrGroundEx(ItemBase src, bool markItemAsSplitResult = false)
6183 {
6184 ItemBase dst = CreateCopyOfItemInInventory(src);
6185 if (!dst)
6186 {
6187 dst = ItemBase.Cast(SpawnEntityOnGroundPos(src.GetType(), this.GetPosition()));
6188 dst.PlaceOnSurface();
6189 dst.SetResultOfSplit(markItemAsSplitResult);
6190 MiscGameplayFunctions.TransferItemProperties(src, dst);
6191 }
6192
6193 return dst;
6194 }
6195

6205 void Message( string text, string style )
6206 {
6207 if (GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER)
6208 {
6209 GetGame().ChatMP(this, text, style );
6210 }
6211 else
6212 {
6213 GetGame().Chat( text, style );
6214 }
6215 }

6219 {

6221 }

6225 {
6226 Message( text, "colorAction" );
6227 }

6231 {
6232 Message( text, "colorFriendly" );
6233 }
6234

6237 {
6238 Message( text, "colorImportant" );
6239 }
6240
6241 void CloseInventoryMenu()
6242 {
6243 if( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
6244 {
6245#ifndef NO_GUI
6246 UIScriptedMenu menu = GetGame().GetUIManager().GetMenu();
6247 if( menu && ( menu.GetID() == MENU_INVENTORY || menu.GetID() == MENU_INSPECT ) )
6248 {
6249 GetGame().GetUIManager().CloseAll();
6250 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputExcludes({"inventory"},false);
6251 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputRestriction(EInputRestrictors.INVENTORY);
6252 }
6253#endif
6254 }
6255 }
6256
6257 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
6266 void ClearInventory( )
6267 {
6268 if ( (GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer()) && GetInventory() )
6269 {
6270 GameInventory inv = PlayerBase.Cast(this).GetInventory();
6271 array<EntityAI> items = new array<EntityAI>;
6272 inv.EnumerateInventory(InventoryTraversalType.INORDER, items);
6273 for(int i = 0; i < items.Count(); i++)
6274 {
6275 ItemBase item = ItemBase.Cast(items.Get(i));
6276 if(item && !item.IsPlayer())
6277 {
6278 GetGame().ObjectDelete(item);
6279 }
6280 }
6281
6282 ItemBase item_in_hands = ItemBase.Cast( GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands() );
6283
6284 if ( item_in_hands )
6285 {
6286 LocalDestroyEntityInHands();
6287 }
6288 }
6289 }
6290
6292 void DropAllItems()
6293 {
6294 array<EntityAI> itemsArray = new array<EntityAI>;
6295 ItemBase item;
6296 GetInventory().EnumerateInventory(InventoryTraversalType.LEVELORDER, itemsArray);
6297 int count = itemsArray.Count();
6298
6299 for (int i = 0; i < itemsArray.Count(); i++)
6300 {
6301 Class.CastTo(item, itemsArray.Get(i));
6302
6303 if (item && !item.IsInherited(SurvivorBase))
6304 {
6305 ServerDropEntity(item);
6306 }
6307 }
6308 }
6309
6310 string GetPlayerClass()
6311 {
6312 string type;
6313 GetGame().ObjectGetType( this, type );
6314 return type;
6315 }

6318 // Lifespan
6319 //---------------------------------------------------
6320
6321 void ShavePlayer()
6322 {
6323 SetLastShavedSeconds( StatGet("playtime") );
6324
6325 m_ModuleLifespan.UpdateLifespan( this, true );
6326 }
6327
6328 bool CanShave()
6329 {
6330 if (!HasCoveredFaceForShave() && GetLifeSpanState())
6331 {
6332 return true;
6333 }
6334 else
6335 {
6336 return false;
6337 }
6338 }
6339
6340
6341 override void OnParticleEvent(string pEventType, string pUserString, int pUserInt)
6342 {
6343 super.OnParticleEvent(pEventType ,pUserString, pUserInt);
6344
6345 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
6346 {
6347 if ( pUserInt == 123456 ) // 123456 is ID for vomiting effect. The current implementation is WIP.
6348 {
6349 PlayerBase player = PlayerBase.Cast(this);
6350 int boneIdx = player.GetBoneIndexByName("Head");
6351
6352 if ( boneIdx != -1 )
6353 {
6354 EffectParticle eff;
6355
6356 if (m_SyncedModifiers & eModifierSyncIDs.MODIFIER_SYNC_CONTAMINATION2)
6357 {
6358 eff = new EffVomitBlood();
6359 }
6360 else
6361 {
6362 eff = new EffVomit();
6363 }
6364
6365 eff.SetDecalOwner( player );
6366 eff.SetAutodestroy( true );
6367 SEffectManager.PlayInWorld( eff, vector.Zero );
6368 Particle p = eff.GetParticle();
6369 player.AddChild(p, boneIdx);
6370 }
6371 }
6372 }
6373 }
6374
6375
6376 bool CanSpawnBreathVaporEffect()
6377 {
6378 if( !ToDelete() && IsAlive() && !IsSwimming() && !m_IsDrowning )
6379 {
6380 return true;
6381 }
6382 return false;
6383 }
6384
6385
6386 void ProcessADDModifier()
6387 {
6388 if( m_AddModifier != -1 )
6389 {
6390 HumanCommandAdditives ad = GetCommandModifier_Additives();
6391 if(ad)
6392 ad.StartModifier(m_AddModifier);
6393
6394 m_AddModifier = -1;
6395 }
6396 }
6397
6398 void SpawnBreathVaporEffect()
6399 {
6400 //Print("SpawnBreathVaporEffect:"+GetGame().GetTime());
6401 int boneIdx = GetBoneIndexByName("Head");
6402 if ( boneIdx != -1 )
6403 {
6404 Particle p;
6405 switch (m_BreathVapour)
6406 {
6407 case 1:
6408 p = ParticleManager.GetInstance().PlayInWorld(ParticleList.BREATH_VAPOUR_LIGHT, "-0.03 0.15 0");
6409 break;
6410 case 2:
6411 p = ParticleManager.GetInstance().PlayInWorld(ParticleList.BREATH_VAPOUR_MEDIUM, "-0.03 0.15 0");
6412 break;
6413 case 3:
6414 p = ParticleManager.GetInstance().PlayInWorld(ParticleList.BREATH_VAPOUR_HEAVY, "-0.03 0.15 0");
6415 break;
6416 default:
6417 break;
6418 }
6419
6420 if ( p )
6421 AddChild(p, boneIdx);
6422 }
6423 }
6424
6425 void SetLifeSpanStateVisible( int show_state )
6426 {
6427 bool state_changed;
6428 if (show_state != m_LifeSpanState)
6429 state_changed = true;
6430 m_LifeSpanState = show_state;
6431 SetSynchDirty();
6432
6433 if (state_changed) //server only, client solution in OnVariablesSynchronized()
6434 {
6435 //SendLifespanSyncEvent(m_LifeSpanState);
6436
6437 UpdateHairSelectionVisibility();
6438 }
6439 }
6440
6441 int GetLifeSpanState()
6442 {
6443 return m_LifeSpanState;
6444 }
6445

6447 {
6448 return m_LastShavedSeconds;
6449 }

6452 {
6453 m_LastShavedSeconds = last_shaved_seconds;
6454 }

6456 bool HasCoveredFaceForShave()
6457 {
6458 return m_FaceCoveredForShaveLayers > 0;
6459 }

6462 {

6464 }

6467 {
6468 return m_HasBloodyHandsVisible;
6469 }

6472 {
6473 SetBloodyHandsBase(show);
6474 }

6476 void SetBloodyHandsEx( eBloodyHandsTypes type )
6477 {
6478 SetBloodyHandsBase(type);
6479 }
6480
6481 private void SetBloodyHandsBase(int type)
6482 {
6483 m_HasBloodyHandsVisible = type;
6484 SetSynchDirty();
6485
6486 #ifdef DIAG_DEVELOPER
6487 #ifndef SERVER
6488 if (IsControlledPlayer())
6489 {
6490 bool enable = type;
6491 DiagMenu.SetValue(DiagMenuIDs.LIFESPAN_BLOODY_HANDS, enable);
6492 }
6493 #endif
6494 #endif
6495 }
6496

6498 {
6499 InsertAgent( eAgents.SALMONELLA, 1 );
6500 }

6532
6533 void CheckDeath()
6534 {
6535 if (IsPlayerSelected() && !IsAlive())
6536 {
6537 SimulateDeath(true);
6538 m_DeathCheckTimer.Stop();
6539 }
6540 }

6542 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------

6544 // --------------------------------------------------
6545 // AI Presence
6546 //---------------------------------------------------
6547
6549 int GetNoisePresenceInAI()
6550 {
6551 if (m_PresenceNotifier)
6552 {
6553 return m_PresenceNotifier.GetNoisePresence();
6554 }
6555
6556 return 0;
6557 }
6558
6559 // is a bit on in the persistent flags
6560 bool IsPersistentFlag(PersistentFlag bit)
6561 {
6562 return (m_PersistentFlags & bit);
6563 }
6564 // turn on/off a bit in the persistent flag
6565 void SetPersistentFlag(PersistentFlag bit, bool enable)
6566 {
6567 if(enable)//turn on bit
6568 m_PersistentFlags = (m_PersistentFlags | bit);
6569 else//turn off bit
6570 m_PersistentFlags = ((~bit) & m_PersistentFlags);
6571
6572 }
6573
6574
6575 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
6576
6577 int GetStoreLoadVersion()
6578 {
6579 return m_StoreLoadVersion;
6580 }
6581
6582 override void OnStoreSave( ParamsWriteContext ctx )
6583 {
6584 //Print("OnStoreSave");
6585 if( GetGame().SaveVersion() < 102 )
6586 {
6587 ctx.Write( ACT_STORE_SAVE_VERSION );//to be removed after we push 102+
6588 }
6589
6590 super.OnStoreSave( ctx );
6591
6592 GetHumanInventory().OnStoreSave(ctx); // FSM of hands
6593 OnStoreSaveLifespan( ctx );
6594
6595 if ( GetDayZGame().IsServer() && GetDayZGame().IsMultiplayer() )
6596 {
6597 GetPlayerStats().SaveStats(ctx);// save stats
6598 m_ModifiersManager.OnStoreSave(ctx);// save modifiers
6599 m_AgentPool.OnStoreSave(ctx);//save agents
6600 GetSymptomManager().OnStoreSave(ctx);//save states
6601 if (GetBleedingManagerServer())
6602 {
6603 GetBleedingManagerServer().OnStoreSave(ctx);//save bleeding sources
6604 }
6605 m_PlayerStomach.OnStoreSave(ctx);
6606 ctx.Write( GetBrokenLegs() );
6607 //ctx.Write( m_LocalBrokenState );
6608 SaveAreaPersistenceFlag(ctx);
6609
6610 }
6611 }
6612
6613
6614 void SaveAreaPersistenceFlag( ParamsWriteContext ctx )
6615 {
6616 if(GetModifiersManager())
6617 SetPersistentFlag(PersistentFlag.AREA_PRESENCE, GetModifiersManager().IsModifierActive(eModifiers.MDF_AREAEXPOSURE));//set the flag for player's presence in contaminated area
6618 ctx.Write( m_PersistentFlags );
6619 }
6620
6621
6622 override bool OnStoreLoad( ParamsReadContext ctx, int version )
6623 {
6624 //Print("---- PlayerBase OnStoreLoad START ----, version: "+version);
6625 m_aQuickBarLoad = new array<ref Param2<EntityAI,int>>;
6626
6627 // todo :: this should be after base call !!!!
6628 if( version < 102 )//write removed in v. 102
6629 {
6630 if(!ctx.Read( m_StoreLoadVersion ))
6631 return false;
6632 }
6633
6634 if ( !super.OnStoreLoad( ctx, version ) )
6635 return false;
6636
6637 // FSM of hands
6638 if ( !GetHumanInventory().OnStoreLoad(ctx, version) )
6639 return false;
6640
6641 if ( !OnStoreLoadLifespan( ctx, version ) )
6642 return false;
6643
6644 if ( GetDayZGame().IsServer() && GetDayZGame().IsMultiplayer() )
6645 {
6646 if(!GetPlayerStats().LoadStats(ctx, version)) // load stats
6647 {
6648 Print("---- failed to load PlayerStats ----");
6649 return false;
6650 }
6651
6652 if( version < m_ModifiersManager.GetStorageVersion() )//load modifiers !! WILL CANCEL REST OF STREAM IF UNSUPPORTED VERSION !!
6653 {
6654 Print("---- failed to load ModifiersManager, unsupported version ----");
6655 return false;
6656 }
6657 else
6658 {
6659 if(!m_ModifiersManager.OnStoreLoad(ctx, version))
6660 {
6661 Print("---- failed to load ModifiersManager, read fail ----");
6662 return false;
6663 }
6664 }
6665
6666 if( version < m_AgentPool.GetStorageVersion() )//load agents !! WILL CANCEL REST OF STREAM IF UNSUPPORTED VERSION !!
6667 {
6668 Print("---- failed to load AgentPool, unsupported version ----");
6669 return false;
6670 }
6671 else
6672 {
6673 if(!m_AgentPool.OnStoreLoad(ctx, version))
6674 {
6675 Print("---- failed to load AgentPool, read fail ----");
6676 return false;
6677 }
6678 }
6679
6680
6681 if( version < GetSymptomManager().GetStorageVersion() )//load symptoms !! WILL CANCEL REST OF STREAM IF UNSUPPORTED VERSION !!
6682 {
6683 Print("---- failed to load SymptomManager, unsupported version ----");
6684 return false;
6685 }
6686 else
6687 {
6688 if(!GetSymptomManager().OnStoreLoad(ctx, version))
6689 {
6690 Print("---- failed to load SymptomManager, read fail ----");
6691 return false;
6692 }
6693 }
6694
6695 if( version < GetBleedingManagerServer().GetStorageVersion() )//load bleeding manager !! WILL CANCEL REST OF STREAM IF UNSUPPORTED VERSION !!
6696 {
6697 Print("---- failed to load BleedingManagerServer, unsupported version ----");
6698 return false;
6699 }
6700 else
6701 {
6702 if(!GetBleedingManagerServer().OnStoreLoad(ctx, version))
6703 {
6704 Print("---- failed to load BleedingManagerServer, read fail ----");
6705 return false;
6706 }
6707 }
6708
6709 if( version < m_PlayerStomach.GetStorageVersion() )//load PlayerStomach !! WILL CANCEL REST OF STREAM IF UNSUPPORTED VERSION !!
6710 {
6711 Print("---- failed to load PlayerStomach, unsupported version ----");
6712 return false;
6713 }
6714 else
6715 {
6716 if(!m_PlayerStomach.OnStoreLoad(ctx, version))
6717 {
6718 Print("---- failed to load PlayerStomach, read fail ----");
6719 return false;
6720 }
6721 }
6722
6723 //Check for broken leg value
6724 if ( version >= 116 )
6725 {
6726 if (!ctx.Read( m_BrokenLegState ))
6727 {
6728 return false;
6729 }
6730 if ( version <= 126 )// WHILE >= 116
6731 {
6732 if (!ctx.Read( m_LocalBrokenState ))
6733 {
6734 return false;
6735 }
6736 }
6737 }
6738 //Check for broken leg value
6739 if ( version >= 125 && (!ctx.Read( m_PersistentFlags )))
6740 {
6741 Print("---- failed to load Persistent Flags, read fail ----");
6742 return false;
6743 }
6744 }
6745
6746 Print("---- PlayerBase OnStoreLoad SUCCESS ----");
6747 return true;
6748 }
6749
6750 override void AfterStoreLoad()
6751 {
6752 GetHumanInventory().OnAfterStoreLoad();
6753 if (m_EmoteManager)
6754 {
6755 m_EmoteManager.AfterStoreLoad();
6756 }
6757 }
6758
6759 void OnStoreSaveLifespan( ParamsWriteContext ctx )
6760 {
6761 ctx.Write( m_LifeSpanState );
6762 ctx.Write( m_LastShavedSeconds );
6763 ctx.Write( m_HasBloodyHandsVisible );
6764 ctx.Write( m_HasBloodTypeVisible );
6765 ctx.Write( m_BloodType );
6766 }
6767
6768 bool OnStoreLoadLifespan( ParamsReadContext ctx, int version )
6769 {
6770 int lifespan_state = 0;
6771 if(!ctx.Read( lifespan_state ))
6772 return false;
6773 m_LifeSpanState = lifespan_state;
6774
6775 int last_shaved = 0;
6776 if(!ctx.Read( last_shaved ))
6777 return false;
6778 m_LastShavedSeconds = last_shaved;
6779
6780 if (version < 122)
6781 {
6782 bool bloody_hands_old;
6783 if(!ctx.Read(bloody_hands_old))
6784 return false;
6785 m_HasBloodyHandsVisible = bloody_hands_old;
6786 }
6787 else
6788 {
6789 int bloody_hands = 0;
6790 if(!ctx.Read( bloody_hands ))
6791 return false;
6792 m_HasBloodyHandsVisible = bloody_hands;
6793 }
6794
6795
6796 bool blood_visible = false;
6797 if(!ctx.Read( blood_visible ))
6798 return false;
6799 m_HasBloodTypeVisible = blood_visible;
6800
6801 int blood_type = 0;
6802 if(!ctx.Read( blood_type ))
6803 return false;
6804 m_BloodType = blood_type;
6805
6806 return true;
6807 }
6808
6809 vector m_PlayerOldPos;
6810 void UpdatePlayerMeasures()
6811 {
6812 int hour, minute, second;
6813 GetHourMinuteSecond( hour, minute, second );
6814 float distance;
6815 distance = StatGet("playtime");
6816 if ( m_AnalyticsTimer )
6817 {
6818 StatsEventMeasuresData data = new StatsEventMeasuresData();
6819 data.m_CharacterId = g_Game.GetDatabaseID();
6820 data.m_TimeInterval = m_AnalyticsTimer.GetRemaining();
6821 data.m_DaytimeHour = hour;
6822 data.m_PositionStart = m_PlayerOldPos;
6823 data.m_PositionEnd = GetPosition();
6824 data.m_DistanceOnFoot = distance;
6825 Analytics.PlayerMeasures(data);
6826 }
6827
6828 m_PlayerOldPos = GetPosition();
6829 }
6830
6831 void OnConnect()
6832 {
6833 Debug.Log("Player connected:"+this.ToString(),"Connect");
6834
6835 // analytics
6836 GetGame().GetAnalyticsServer().OnPlayerConnect( this );
6837
6838 m_PlayerOldPos = GetPosition();
6839 if ( m_AnalyticsTimer )
6840 m_AnalyticsTimer.Run( 60, this, "UpdatePlayerMeasures", null, true );
6841
6842 //construction action data
6843 ResetConstructionActionData();
6844 }
6845
6846 void OnReconnect()
6847 {
6848 Debug.Log("Player reconnected:"+this.ToString(),"Reconnect");
6849
6850 //construction action data
6851
6852 ResetConstructionActionData();
6853 }
6854
6855 void OnDisconnect()
6856 {
6857 Debug.Log("Player disconnected:"+this.ToString(),"Connect");
6858
6859 // analytics
6860 // force update of the stats
6861 // if player disconnect too soon, UpdatePlayersStats() is not called
6862 GetGame().GetAnalyticsServer().OnPlayerDisconnect( this );
6863
6864 StatsEventDisconnectedData data = new StatsEventDisconnectedData();
6865 data.m_CharacterId = g_Game.GetDatabaseID();
6866 data.m_Reason = "Disconnected";
6867 Analytics.PlayerDisconnected(data);
6868
6869 if ( m_AnalyticsTimer )
6870 m_AnalyticsTimer.Stop();
6871 UpdatePlayerMeasures();
6872
6873 SetPlayerDisconnected(true);
6874 }
6875
6876 void SetModifiers(bool enable)
6877 {
6878 GetModifiersManager().SetModifiers(enable);
6879 }
6880
6881 bool Consume(ItemBase source, float amount, EConsumeType consume_type )
6882 {
6883 PluginTransmissionAgents plugin = PluginTransmissionAgents.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginTransmissionAgents) );
6884 int agents;
6885 if( consume_type == EConsumeType.ENVIRO_POND || consume_type == EConsumeType.ENVIRO_WELL )
6886 {
6887 if ( consume_type == EConsumeType.ENVIRO_POND )
6888 {
6889 agents = agents | eAgents.CHOLERA;
6890 //plugin.TransmitAgents(NULL, this, AGT_WATER_POND, amount);
6891 }
6892 m_PlayerStomach.AddToStomach(Liquid.GetLiquidClassname(LIQUID_WATER), amount, 0 , agents );
6893
6894
6895 return true;
6896 }
6897
6898 Edible_Base edible_item = Edible_Base.Cast(source);
6899 if(!edible_item)
6900 {
6901 return false;
6902 }
6903 agents = edible_item.GetAgents();
6904 if( consume_type == EConsumeType.ITEM_SINGLE_TIME || consume_type == EConsumeType.ITEM_CONTINUOUS )
6905 {
6906 if(consume_type == EConsumeType.ITEM_SINGLE_TIME)
6907 {
6908 plugin.TransmitAgents(edible_item, this, AGT_UACTION_CONSUME, amount);
6909 }
6910 /*
6911 else
6912 {
6913 plugin.TransmitAgents(edible_item, this, AGT_UACTION_TO_PLAYER, amount);
6914 }
6915 */
6916 if(edible_item.IsLiquidContainer())
6917 {
6918 int liquid_type = edible_item.GetLiquidType();
6919 string liquidClassName = Liquid.GetLiquidClassname(liquid_type);
6920 if (liquidClassName.Length() == 0)
6921 Error("Error! Trying to add unknown liquid to stomach with item=" + Object.GetDebugName(edible_item) + " consume_type=" + consume_type + " liquid_type=" + liquid_type);
6922 m_PlayerStomach.AddToStomach(liquidClassName, amount, 0, agents);
6923 }
6924 else
6925 {
6926 int food_stage_type;
6927 if( edible_item.GetFoodStage() )
6928 {
6929 food_stage_type = edible_item.GetFoodStage().GetFoodStageType();
6930 }
6931 m_PlayerStomach.AddToStomach(source.GetType(), amount, food_stage_type, agents);
6932 }
6933 edible_item.Consume(amount, this);
6934 return true;
6935
6936 }
6937 /*
6938 if( consume_type == EConsumeType.ITEM_CONTINUOUS )
6939 {
6940 if(edible_item)
6941 {
6942 plugin.TransmitAgents(edible_item, this, AGT_UACTION_TO_PLAYER, amount);
6943 edible_item.Consume(amount, this);
6944 //ProcessNutritions(edible_item.GetNutritionalProfile(),amount);
6945 m_PlayerStomach.AddToStomach(source.GetType(), amount, edible_item.GetNutritionalProfile());
6946 return true;
6947 }
6948 }
6949 */
6950 return false;
6951 }
6952
6953 /*
6954 void ProcessNutritions( NutritionalProfile profile, float consumedquantity )
6955 {
6956 float energy_per_unit = profile.GetEnergy() / 100;
6957 float water_per_unit = profile.GetWaterContent() / 100;
6958 float nutritions = profile.GetNutritionalIndex();
6959 float fullness_index = profile.GetFullnessIndex();
6960 float toxicity = profile.GetToxicity();
6961 bool is_liquid = profile.IsLiquid();
6962
6963 if ( consumedquantity > 0 )
6964 {
6965 float water_consumed = consumedquantity * water_per_unit;
6966 GetStatStomachVolume().Add(consumedquantity * fullness_index );
6967 GetStatStomachEnergy().Add( consumedquantity * energy_per_unit );
6968 GetStatStomachWater().Add( water_consumed );
6969 GetStatToxicity().Add( consumedquantity * toxicity );
6970 }
6971 else
6972 {
6973 Print("ProcessNutritions - ZERO VOLUME! Fix config");
6974 }
6975 }
6976 */
6977
6978 void ShowUnconsciousScreen(bool show)
6979 {
6980 #ifndef NO_GUI
6981 if (show)
6982 {
6983 GetGame().GetUIManager().ScreenFadeIn(0, "You are Unconscious", FadeColors.BLACK, FadeColors.WHITE);
6984 PrintString("Fade in");
6985 }
6986 else
6987 {
6988 GetGame().GetUIManager().ScreenFadeOut(0);
6989 PrintString("Fade out");
6990 }
6991 #endif
6992 }
6993
6994 override void RequestSoundEventEx(EPlayerSoundEventID id, bool from_server_and_client = false, int param = 0)
6995 {
6996 if(from_server_and_client && GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT)
6997 {
6998 PlaySoundEventEx(id, false, false, param );
6999 return;
7000 }
7001 SendSoundEventEx(id, param);
7002 }
7003
7004 override void RequestSoundEvent(EPlayerSoundEventID id, bool from_server_and_client = false)
7005 {
7006 RequestSoundEventEx(id, from_server_and_client);
7007 }
7008
7009 override protected void SendSoundEvent(EPlayerSoundEventID id)
7010 {
7011 SendSoundEventEx(id);
7012 }
7013
7014 override protected void SendSoundEventEx(EPlayerSoundEventID id, int param = 0)
7015 {
7016 if( !GetGame().IsServer() )
7017 {
7018 return;
7019 }
7020 m_SoundEvent = id;
7021 m_SoundEventParam = param;
7022 SetSynchDirty();
7023
7024 if( !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
7025 {
7026 CheckSoundEvent();
7027 }
7028
7029 //PrintString(GetGame().GetTime().ToString() + " Set SoundEvent, id:" + id.ToString());
7030 }
7031
7032 void CheckZeroSoundEvent()
7033 {
7034 if( m_SoundEvent != 0 && m_SoundEventSent )
7035 {
7036 m_SoundEvent = 0;
7037 m_SoundEventParam = 0;
7038 m_SoundEventSent = false;
7039 SetSynchDirty();
7040 }
7041 }
7042
7043 void CheckSendSoundEvent()
7044 {
7045 if( m_SoundEvent!= 0 && !m_SoundEventSent )
7046 {
7047 m_SoundEventSent = true;
7048 }
7049 }
7050
7051 override bool PlaySoundEvent(EPlayerSoundEventID id, bool from_anim_system = false, bool is_from_server = false)
7052 {
7053 return PlaySoundEventEx(id, from_anim_system, is_from_server);
7054 }
7055
7056 override bool PlaySoundEventEx(EPlayerSoundEventID id, bool from_anim_system = false, bool is_from_server = false, int param = 0)
7057 {
7058 if (!m_PlayerSoundEventHandler)
7059 {
7060 return false;
7061 }
7062 return m_PlayerSoundEventHandler.PlayRequestEx(id, is_from_server, param);
7063 }
7064
7065 PlayerSoundEventHandler GetPlayerSoundEventHandler()
7066 {
7067 return m_PlayerSoundEventHandler;
7068 }

7071 void OnBleedingBegin()
7072 {
7073
7074 }
7075
7076 void OnBleedingEnd()
7077 {
7078
7079 }
7080
7081 void OnBleedingSourceAdded()
7082 {
7083 m_BleedingSourceCount++;
7084 if (IsControlledPlayer())
7085 {
7086 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
7087 {
7088 DisplayElementBadge dis_elm = DisplayElementBadge.Cast(GetVirtualHud().GetElement(eDisplayElements.DELM_BADGE_BLEEDING));
7089 if ( dis_elm )
7090 {
7091 dis_elm.SetValue(GetBleedingSourceCount());
7092 }
7093
7094
7095 //Print("----------bleeding_SoundSet----------");
7096 SEffectManager.PlaySoundOnObject("bleeding_SoundSet", this);
7097 }
7098 }
7099 }
7100
7101 void OnBleedingSourceRemoved()
7102 {
7103 m_BleedingSourceCount--;
7104 if(IsControlledPlayer())
7105 {
7106 if( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
7107 {
7108 //Print("GetBleedingSourceCount() "+GetBleedingSourceCount());
7109 DisplayElementBadge dis_elm = DisplayElementBadge.Cast(GetVirtualHud().GetElement(eDisplayElements.DELM_BADGE_BLEEDING));
7110 if( dis_elm )
7111 {
7112 dis_elm.SetValue(GetBleedingSourceCount());
7113 }
7114 }
7115 }
7116 }
7117
7118
7119 void OnBleedingSourceRemovedEx(ItemBase item)
7120 {
7121 OnBleedingSourceRemoved();
7122
7123 }
7124
7125 int GetBleedingSourceCount()
7126 {
7127 if ( !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
7128 return m_BleedingSourceCount / 2;
7129 return m_BleedingSourceCount;
7130 }
7131
7132 // for debug purposes, should reset some systems like Modifiers, Stats, Damage etc.....
7133 void ResetPlayer(bool set_max)
7134 {
7135 #ifdef DIAG_DEVELOPER
7136 if (GetGame().IsServer() || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer())
7137 {
7138 //server + single
7139
7140 //clear stomach content
7141 GetStomach().ClearContents();
7142
7143 // bleeding sources
7144 if ( m_BleedingManagerServer )
7145 m_BleedingManagerServer.RemoveAllSources();
7146
7147 // Modifiers
7148 bool hasAreaExposureModifier, hasMaksModifier;
7149 if (GetModifiersManager())
7150 {
7151 hasAreaExposureModifier = GetModifiersManager().IsModifierActive(eModifiers.MDF_AREAEXPOSURE);
7152 hasMaksModifier = GetModifiersManager().IsModifierActive(eModifiers.MDF_MASK);
7153 GetModifiersManager().DeactivateAllModifiers();
7154
7155 if (hasAreaExposureModifier)
7156 GetModifiersManager().ActivateModifier(eModifiers.MDF_AREAEXPOSURE);
7157
7158 if (hasMaksModifier)
7159 GetModifiersManager().ActivateModifier(eModifiers.MDF_MASK);
7160 }
7161
7162 // Stats
7163 if (GetPlayerStats())
7164 {
7165 int bloodType = GetStatBloodType().Get();
7166 GetPlayerStats().ResetAllStats();
7167 GetStatBloodType().Set(bloodType);
7168 }
7169
7170 if (m_StaminaHandler)
7171 m_StaminaHandler.SetStamina(GameConstants.STAMINA_MAX);
7172
7173 // Agents
7174 if (m_AgentPool)
7175 m_AgentPool.RemoveAllAgents();
7176
7177 // Damage System
7178 DamageZoneMap zones = new DamageZoneMap();
7179 DamageSystem.GetDamageZoneMap(this, zones);
7180 SetHealth("", "Health", GetMaxHealth("","Health"));
7181 SetHealth("", "Shock", GetMaxHealth("","Shock"));
7182 SetHealth("", "Blood", GetMaxHealth("","Blood"));
7183
7184 for (int i = 0; i < zones.Count(); i++)
7185 {
7186 string zone = zones.GetKey(i);
7187 SetHealth(zone, "Health", GetMaxHealth(zone,"Health"));
7188 SetHealth(zone, "Shock", GetMaxHealth(zone,"Shock"));
7189 SetHealth(zone, "Blood", GetMaxHealth(zone,"Blood"));
7190 }
7191
7192 // uncon
7193 if (IsUnconscious())
7194 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SendPlayerUnconsciousness(this, false);
7195
7196 // set max
7197 if (set_max)
7198 {
7199 GetStatWater().Set(GetStatWater().GetMax());
7200 GetStatEnergy().Set(GetStatEnergy().GetMax());
7201 }
7202
7203
7204 // fix up inventory
7205 FixAllInventoryItems();
7206
7207 //remove bloody hands
7208 PluginLifespan moduleLifespan = PluginLifespan.Cast(GetPlugin(PluginLifespan));
7209 moduleLifespan.UpdateBloodyHandsVisibilityEx(this, eBloodyHandsTypes.CLEAN);
7210
7211 }
7212 else
7213 {
7214 // multiplayer client only
7215 }
7216 // client + single + server
7217 HumanCommandVehicle vehCmd = GetCommand_Vehicle();
7218 if ( vehCmd )
7219 {
7220 CarScript car = CarScript.Cast( vehCmd.GetTransport() );
7221 if ( car )
7222 {
7223 car.Repair();
7224 }
7225 }
7226 #endif
7227 }
7228
7229 void CheckSoundEvent()
7230 {
7231 if (m_SoundEvent != 0)
7232 {
7233 PlaySoundEventEx(m_SoundEvent, false, true,m_SoundEventParam);
7234 m_SoundEvent = 0;
7235 m_SoundEventParam = 0;
7236 }
7237 }
7238
7239 void TestSend()
7240 {
7241 if( GetGame().IsClient() ) return;
7242 RequestSoundEvent(1234);
7243 //Math.RandomInt(1,4096)
7244 }
7245
7246 void SetStaminaState(eStaminaState state)
7247 {
7248 if( state != m_StaminaState )
7249 {
7250 m_StaminaState = state;
7251 //PrintString("m_StaminaState:"+m_StaminaState.ToString());
7252 SetSynchDirty();
7253 }
7254 }
7255
7256 int GetStaminaState()
7257 {
7258 return m_StaminaState;
7259 }
7260
7261 void UpdateQuickBarExtraSlots()
7262 {
7263 m_QuickBarBase.updateSlotsCount();
7264 }
7265
7266 bool Save()
7267 {
7268 // saved player must be alive and not captive
7269 if (GetPlayerState() == EPlayerStates.ALIVE && !IsRestrained())
7270 {
7271 GetHive().CharacterSave(this);
7272 Debug.Log("Player "+this.ToString()+ " saved as alive");
7273
7274 return true;
7275 }
7276 return false;
7277 }
7278
7279 // agent transfer
7280
7281 static ref array<Object> SPREAD_AGENTS_OBJECTS = new array<Object>;
7282 static ref array<CargoBase> SPREAD_AGENTS_PROXY_CARGOS = new array<CargoBase>;
7283
7284
7286 void SpreadAgentsEx(float distance = 3,float chance = 0.25)
7287 {
7288 if(Math.RandomFloat01() > chance)
7289 return;
7290
7291 GetGame().GetPlayers(m_ServerPlayers);
7292 float dist_check = distance * distance;//make it sq
7293 PluginTransmissionAgents plugin = PluginTransmissionAgents.Cast(GetPlugin(PluginTransmissionAgents));
7294
7295 foreach(Man target: m_ServerPlayers)
7296 {
7297 if (vector.DistanceSq(GetWorldPosition(), target.GetWorldPosition()) < dist_check && target != this)
7298 {
7299 plugin.TransmitAgents(this, target, AGT_AIRBOURNE_BIOLOGICAL, 1);
7300 }
7301 }
7302 }
7303
7304 void SpreadAgents()//legacy method
7305 {
7306 SpreadAgentsEx(3,1);
7307 }
7308
7309 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7310 override int GetAgents()
7311 {
7312 return m_AgentPool.GetAgents();
7313 }
7314
7315 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7316 override void RemoveAgent(int agent_id) //removes a single agent type from the player agent pool
7317 {
7318 m_AgentPool.RemoveAgent(agent_id);
7319 }
7320
7321 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7322 override void RemoveAllAgents()
7323 {
7324 m_AgentPool.RemoveAllAgents();
7325 }
7326
7327
7328 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7329 override void InsertAgent(int agent, float count = 1) //adds a single agent type to the player agent pool
7330 {
7331 m_AgentPool.AddAgent(agent,count);
7332 }
7333
7334 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7335 int GetSingleAgentCount(int agent_id)
7336 {
7337 return m_AgentPool.GetSingleAgentCount(agent_id);
7338 }
7339
7340 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7341 float GetSingleAgentCountNormalized(int agent_id)
7342 {
7343 int max_count = PluginTransmissionAgents.GetAgentMaxCount(agent_id);
7344 return m_AgentPool.GetSingleAgentCount(agent_id) / max_count;
7345 }
7346
7347 float GetTotalAgentCount()
7348 {
7349 return m_AgentPool.GetTotalAgentCount();
7350 }
7351
7352 void PrintAgents()
7353 {
7354 m_AgentPool.PrintAgents();
7355 }

7358 {
7359 m_AgentPool.ImmuneSystemTick(value, deltaT);
7360 }
7361
7362 void AntibioticsAttack(float value)
7363 {
7364 m_AgentPool.AntibioticsAttack(value);
7365 }
7366
7367 //Get aim (player crosshair) position
7368 vector GetAimPosition()
7369 {
7370 float min_distance = 0.5; //min distance, default = 5m
7371
7372 vector from = GetGame().GetCurrentCameraPosition();
7373 vector to = from + (GetGame().GetCurrentCameraDirection() * min_distance);
7374 vector contactPos;
7375 vector contactDir;
7376 int contactComponent;
7377
7378 DayZPhysics.RaycastRV( from, to, contactPos, contactDir, contactComponent, NULL, NULL, NULL, false, true );
7379
7380 return contactPos;
7381 }
7382
7383
7384 bool CanEatAndDrink()
7385 {
7386 ItemBase mask = ItemBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.MASK));
7387 return (!mask || (mask && mask.AllowFoodConsumption()));
7388 }
7389
7390 //get modifier manager
7391 ModifiersManager GetModifiersManager()
7392 {
7393 return m_ModifiersManager;
7394 }
7395
7396 PlayerStat<float> GetStatWater()
7397 {
7398 if ( !m_StatWater && GetPlayerStats())
7399 {
7400 m_StatWater = PlayerStat<float>.Cast(GetPlayerStats().GetStatObject(EPlayerStats_current.WATER));
7401 }
7402 return m_StatWater;
7403 }
7404
7405 PlayerStat<float> GetStatToxicity()
7406 {
7407 if ( !m_StatToxicity && GetPlayerStats() )
7408 {
7409 m_StatToxicity = PlayerStat<float>.Cast(GetPlayerStats().GetStatObject(EPlayerStats_current.TOXICITY));
7410 }
7411 return m_StatToxicity;
7412 }
7413
7414 PlayerStat<float> GetStatEnergy()
7415 {
7416 if ( !m_StatEnergy && GetPlayerStats() )
7417 {
7418 m_StatEnergy = PlayerStat<float>.Cast(GetPlayerStats().GetStatObject(EPlayerStats_current.ENERGY));
7419 }
7420 return m_StatEnergy;
7421 }
7422
7423 PlayerStat<float> GetStatHeatComfort()
7424 {
7425 if ( !m_StatHeatComfort && GetPlayerStats() )
7426 {
7427 m_StatHeatComfort = PlayerStat<float>.Cast(GetPlayerStats().GetStatObject(EPlayerStats_current.HEATCOMFORT));
7428 }
7429 return m_StatHeatComfort;
7430 }
7431
7432 PlayerStat<float> GetStatTremor()
7433 {
7434 if ( !m_StatTremor && GetPlayerStats() )
7435 {
7436 m_StatTremor = PlayerStat<float>.Cast(GetPlayerStats().GetStatObject(EPlayerStats_current.TREMOR));
7437 }
7438 return m_StatTremor;
7439 }
7440
7441 PlayerStat<int> GetStatWet()
7442 {
7443 if ( !m_StatWet && GetPlayerStats() )
7444 {
7445 m_StatWet = PlayerStat<int>.Cast(GetPlayerStats().GetStatObject(EPlayerStats_current.WET));
7446 }
7447 return m_StatWet;
7448 }
7449
7450 PlayerStat<float> GetStatDiet()
7451 {
7452 if ( !m_StatDiet && GetPlayerStats() )
7453 {
7454 m_StatDiet = PlayerStat<float>.Cast(GetPlayerStats().GetStatObject(EPlayerStats_current.DIET));
7455 }
7456 return m_StatDiet;
7457 }
7458
7459 PlayerStat<float> GetStatStamina()
7460 {
7461 if ( !m_StatStamina && GetPlayerStats() )
7462 {
7463 m_StatStamina = PlayerStat<float>.Cast(GetPlayerStats().GetStatObject(EPlayerStats_current.STAMINA));
7464 }
7465 return m_StatStamina;
7466 }
7467

7469 {
7470 if ( !m_StatSpecialty && GetPlayerStats() )
7471 {
7472 m_StatSpecialty = PlayerStat<float>.Cast(GetPlayerStats().GetStatObject(EPlayerStats_current.SPECIALTY));
7473 }
7474 return m_StatSpecialty;

7478 {

7480 {
7481 m_StatBloodType = PlayerStat<int>.Cast(GetPlayerStats().GetStatObject(EPlayerStats_current.BLOODTYPE));
7482 }
7483 return m_StatBloodType;

7493 }
