7498 SetSynchDirty();
7499 }
7500
7502 string GetLastUAMessage()
7503 {
7504 return m_UALastMessage;
7505 }
7506
7507 void SetLastUAMessage(string pMsg)
7508 {
7509 m_UALastMessage = pMsg;
7510
7511 if( m_UALastMessageTimer.IsRunning() )
7512 {
7513 m_UALastMessageTimer.Stop();
7514 }
7515
7516 m_UALastMessageTimer.Run(PlayerConstants.LAST_UA_MSG_LIFETIME, this, "ClearLastUAMessage", null);
7517 }
7518
7519 protected void ClearLastUAMessage()
7520 {
7521 if( m_UALastMessageTimer.IsRunning() )
7522 {
7523 m_UALastMessageTimer.Stop();
7524 }
7525
7526 m_UALastMessage = "";
7527 }
7528
7531
7533 void ForceUpdateInjuredState()
7534 {
7535 m_InjuryHandler.CheckValue(true);
7536 }
7537
7538 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
7539 void GetDebugActions(out TSelectableActionInfoArrayEx outputList)
7540 {
7541 PluginTransmissionAgents pluginTransmissionAgents = PluginTransmissionAgents.Cast(GetPlugin(PluginTransmissionAgents));
7542
7543 string name;
7544 int id;
7545 map<int,string> agentList = pluginTransmissionAgents.GetSimpleAgentList();
7546
7547 for (int i = 0; i < agentList.Count(); i++)
7548 {
7549 name = agentList.GetElement(i);
7550 id = agentList.GetKey(i);
7551
7552 outputList.Insert(new TSelectableActionInfoWithColor(SAT_DEBUG_ACTION, EActions.DEBUG_AGENTS_RANGE_INJECT_START + id, "Inject " + name, Colors.WHITE));
7553 outputList.Insert(new TSelectableActionInfoWithColor(SAT_DEBUG_ACTION, EActions.DEBUG_AGENTS_RANGE_REMOVE_START + id, "Remove " + name, Colors.WHITE));
7554 }
7555 }
7556
7557 //-------------------------------------------------------------
7561
7562 override void OnSyncJuncture(int pJunctureID, ParamsReadContext pCtx)
7563 {
7564 super.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7565
7566 switch( pJunctureID )
7567 {
7568 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_INJURY:
7569 eInjuryHandlerLevels level;
7570 bool enable;
7571 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadInjuryParams(pCtx, enable, level);
7572 m_InjuryHandler.SetInjuryCommandParams(enable, level);
7573 break;
7574 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_PLAYER_STATES:
7575 GetSymptomManager().SetAnimation(pCtx);
7576 break;
7577 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_QUICKBAR_SET_SHORTCUT:
7578 OnQuickbarSetEntityRequest(pCtx);
7579 break;
7580 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_INVENTORY:
7581 GetInventory().OnInventoryJunctureFromServer(pCtx);
7582 break;
7583 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_INVENTORY_REPAIR:
7584 GetInventory().OnInventoryJunctureRepairFromServer(pCtx);
7585 break;
7586 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_ACTION_INTERRUPT:
7587 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_ACTION_ACK_ACCEPT:
7588 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_ACTION_ACK_REJECT:
7589 m_ActionManager.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID,pCtx);
7590 break;
7591 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_WEAPON_ACTION_ACK_ACCEPT:
7592 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_WEAPON_ACTION_ACK_REJECT:
7593 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_WEAPON_SET_JAMMING_CHANCE:
7594 m_WeaponManager.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID,pCtx);
7595 break;
7596 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_UNCONSCIOUSNESS:
7597 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadPlayerUnconsciousnessParams(pCtx, m_ShouldBeUnconscious);
7598 break;
7599 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_PLAYER_ADD_MODIFIER:
7600 GetSymptomManager().SetAnimation(pCtx);
7601 break;
7602 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_KURU_REQUEST:
7603 float amount;
7604 if(DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadKuruRequest(pCtx, amount))
7605 {
7606 if(GetAimingModel() && IsFireWeaponRaised())
7607 {
7608 GetAimingModel().RequestKuruShake(amount);
7609 }
7610 }
7611 break;
7612 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_GESTURE_REQUEST :
7613 m_EmoteManager.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7614 break;
7615 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_WEAPON_LIFT:
7616 SetLiftWeapon(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7617 break;
7618 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_ADS_RESET:
7619 m_ResetADS = true;
7620 break;
7621 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_DELETE_ITEM:
7622 SetToDelete(pCtx);
7623 break;
7624 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_BROKEN_LEGS:
7625 m_BrokenLegsJunctureReceived = true;
7626 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadBrokenLegsParamsEx(pCtx, m_BrokenLegState);
7627 break;
7628 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_SHOCK :
7629 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadShockParams(pCtx, m_CurrentShock);
7630 break;
7631 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_STAMINA:
7632 m_StaminaHandler.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7633 break;
7634 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_STAMINA_MISC:
7635 m_StaminaHandler.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7636 break;
7637 #ifdef DEVELOPER
7638 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_DEBUG_GET_IN_CAR:
7639 EntityAI car;
7640 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadGetInCarParams(pCtx, car);
7641 SetGetInVehicleDebug(car);
7642 break;
7643 #endif
7644 }
7645 }
7646
7647 bool IsItemsToDelete()
7648 {
7649 return m_ItemsToDelete.Count() > 0;
7650 }
7651
7652 void SetToDelete(ParamsReadContext pCtx)
7653 {
7654 EntityAI item;
7655 pCtx.Read(item);
7656 AddItemToDelete(item);
7657 }
7658
7659 override void AddItemToDelete(EntityAI item)
7660 {
7661 if (item)
7662 {
7663 item.SetPrepareToDelete();
7664 m_ItemsToDelete.Insert(item);
7665 }
7666 }
7667
7668 bool CanDeleteItems()
7669 {
7670 return !(IsEmotePlaying() || GetThrowing().IsThrowingAnimationPlaying() || GetDayZPlayerInventory().IsProcessing() || (GetActionManager() && GetActionManager().GetRunningAction()));
7671 }
7672
7673 override void JunctureDeleteItem(EntityAI item)
7674 {
7675 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SendDeleteItem(this, item);
7676 }
7677
7678 void UpdateDelete()
7679 {
7680 int count = m_ItemsToDelete.Count();
7681 if (count > 0)
7682 {
7683 if (CanDeleteItems())
7684 {
7685 EntityAI itemToDelete;
7686
7687 if (GetGame().IsClient() && GetGame().IsMultiplayer())
7688 {
7689 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation();
7690 for (int i = count - 1; i >= 0 ; i--)
7691 {
7692 itemToDelete = m_ItemsToDelete.Get(i);
7693 if (itemToDelete != null)
7694 {
7695 itemToDelete.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il);
7696 }
7697
7698 if (itemToDelete == null || (GetItemInHands() == null && il.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.UNKNOWN))
7699 {
7700 m_ItemsToDelete.Remove(i);
7701 }
7702 }
7703 }
7704 else
7705 {
7706 for (int j = count - 1; j >= 0 ; j--)
7707 {
7708 itemToDelete = m_ItemsToDelete.Get(j);
7709 if (itemToDelete == null)
7710 {
7711 m_ItemsToDelete.Remove(j);
7712 }
7713 else
7714 {
7715 itemToDelete.Delete();
7716 m_ItemsToDelete.Remove(j);
7717 }
7718 }
7719 }
7720 }
7721 }
7722 }
7723
7724 override bool HeadingModel(float pDt, SDayZPlayerHeadingModel pModel)
7725 {
7727 if ( GetEmoteManager().IsControllsLocked() || (GetActionManager() && GetActionManager().GetRunningAction() && GetActionManager().GetRunningAction().IsFullBody(this)) )
7728 {
7729 HumanItemAccessor hia = GetItemAccessor();
7730 HumanItemBehaviorCfg hibcfg = hia.GetItemInHandsBehaviourCfg();
7731 if (hibcfg && hibcfg.m_StanceRotation[m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx] == DayZPlayerConstants.ROTATION_DISABLE)
7732 {
7733 return DayZPlayerImplementHeading.NoHeading(pDt, pModel, m_fLastHeadingDiff);
7734 }
7735 else
7736 {
7737 m_fLastHeadingDiff = 0;
7738 return DayZPlayerImplementHeading.ClampHeading(pDt, pModel, m_fLastHeadingDiff);
7739 }
7740 }
7741
7742 return super.HeadingModel(pDt, pModel);
7743 }
7744
7745 override bool IsInventorySoftLocked()
7746 {
7747 return m_InventorySoftLocked;
7748 }
7749
7750 override void SetInventorySoftLock(bool status)
7751 {
7752 m_InventorySoftLocked = status;
7753 }
7754
7755 void SetLoadedQuickBarItemBind(EntityAI entity, int index)
7756 {
7757 if( m_aQuickBarLoad )
7758 m_aQuickBarLoad.Insert(new Param2<EntityAI, int>(entity,index));
7759 }
7760
7761 override bool IsLiftWeapon()
7762 {
7763 return m_LiftWeapon_player;
7764 }
7765
7766 //Server
7767 bool ReadLiftWeaponRequest(int userDataType, ParamsReadContext ctx)
7768 {
7769 bool state;
7770 ctx.Read(state);
7771
7772 ScriptJunctureData pCtx = new ScriptJunctureData;
7773 pCtx.Write(state);
7774
7775 SendSyncJuncture(DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_WEAPON_LIFT, pCtx);
7776
7777 return true;
7778 }
7779
7780 void SetLiftWeapon(int pJunctureID, ParamsReadContext ctx)
7781 {
7782 bool state;
7783 ctx.Read(state);
7784
7785 m_ProcessLiftWeaponState = state;
7786 m_ProcessLiftWeapon = true;
7787
7788 //Print("SetLiftWeapon | STS: " + GetSimulationTimeStamp());
7789 }
7790
7792 void SendLiftWeaponSync(bool state)
7793 {
7794 HumanCommandWeapons hcw;
7795 //SP version
7796 if (!GetGame().IsMultiplayer())
7797 {
7798 m_LiftWeapon_player = state;
7799
7800 hcw = GetCommandModifier_Weapons();
7801 if( hcw )
7802 hcw.LiftWeapon(state);
7803
7804 GetWeaponManager().OnLiftWeapon();
7805
7806 return;
7807 }
7808
7809 ScriptInputUserData ctx = new ScriptInputUserData;
7810
7811 if (GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsClient() && !ctx.CanStoreInputUserData())
7812 {
7813 //Print("ctx unavailable");
7814 return;
7815 }
7816 else if (GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsClient() && ctx.CanStoreInputUserData())
7817 {
7818 //Print("sending ECB cancel request");
7819 ctx.Write(INPUT_UDT_WEAPON_LIFT_EVENT);
7820 ctx.Write(state);
7821 ctx.Send();
7822 }
7823 }
7824
7825 override void CheckLiftWeapon()
7826 {
7827 // lift weapon check
7828 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT /*GetGame().IsClient()*/)
7829 {
7830 Weapon_Base weap;
7831 if ( Weapon_Base.CastTo(weap, GetItemInHands()) )
7832 {
7833 bool limited = weap.LiftWeaponCheck(this);
7834
7835 if (limited && !m_LiftWeapon_player)
7836 SendLiftWeaponSync(true);
7837 else if (!limited && m_LiftWeapon_player)
7838 SendLiftWeaponSync(false);
7839 }
7840 else if (m_LiftWeapon_player)
7841 {
7842 SendLiftWeaponSync(false);
7843 }
7844 }
7845 }
7846
7847 override void ProcessLiftWeapon()
7848 {
7849 if (m_ProcessLiftWeapon)
7850 {
7851 HumanCommandWeapons hcw = GetCommandModifier_Weapons();
7852 if( hcw )
7853 hcw.LiftWeapon(m_ProcessLiftWeaponState);
7854
7855 GetWeaponManager().OnLiftWeapon();
7856 m_LiftWeapon_player = m_ProcessLiftWeaponState;
7857 m_ProcessLiftWeapon = false;
7858
7859 //Debug.Log("SimulationStamp_server: " + this.GetSimulationTimeStamp());
7860 }
7861 }
7862
7863 override void HideClothing(ItemOptics optic, bool state)
7864 {
7865 super.HideClothing(optic, state);
7866 array<int> clothingArray = new array<int>;
7867 Clothing clothes;
7868
7869 if (state && DayZPlayerCameraOptics.Cast(m_CurrentCamera))
7870 {
7871 if (GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT)
7872 {
7873 clothingArray.Insert(InventorySlots.BACK);
7874 clothingArray.Insert(InventorySlots.SHOULDER);
7875 clothingArray.Insert(InventorySlots.MELEE);
7876 if(optic.GetCurrentStepFOV() < GameConstants.DZPLAYER_CAMERA_FOV_IRONSIGHTS/*0.5*/ )
7877 {
7878 clothingArray.Insert(InventorySlots.BODY);
7879 clothingArray.Insert(InventorySlots.VEST);
7880 }
7881
7882 SetInvisibleRecursive(true,this,clothingArray);
7883 }
7884 }
7885 //showing should be instant (called directly, not via CallLater)
7886 else
7887 {
7888 if (GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT)
7889 {
7890 /*for(int i = 0; i < GetInventory().AttachmentCount(); i++)
7891 {
7892 Print("attachment slot ID: " + GetInventory().GetAttachmentSlotId(i));
7893 clothingArray.Insert(GetInventory().GetAttachmentSlotId(i));
7894 }*/
7895 clothingArray = {InventorySlots.BACK,InventorySlots.BODY,InventorySlots.VEST,InventorySlots.SHOULDER,InventorySlots.MELEE};
7896
7897 SetInvisibleRecursive(false,this,clothingArray);
7898 }
7899 }
7900 }
7901
7902 void RequestUnconsciousness(bool enable)
7903 {
7904 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SendPlayerUnconsciousness(this, enable);
7905 }
7906
7907 override void SetDeathDarknessLevel(float duration, float tick_time)
7908 {
7909 super.SetDeathDarknessLevel(duration, tick_time);
7910
7911 if (IsControlledPlayer())
7912 {
7913 float actual_tick = tick_time;
7914 if (GetDamageDealtEffect())
7915 m_DamageDealtEffect = null;
7916
7917 if (GetFlashbangEffect())
7918 m_FlashbangEffect = null;
7919
7920 float progress;
7921 if ( duration > 0 )
7922 progress = 1 - ( (duration - m_DeathDarkeningCurrentTime) / duration );
7923
7924 m_DeathDarkeningCurrentTime += actual_tick;
7925
7926 if (!IsAlive() && IsPlayerSelected())
7927 {
7928 m_DeathDarkeningParam.param1 = progress;
7929 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_DeathDarkening).Start(m_DeathDarkeningParam);
7930 }
7931
7932 if ( m_DeathDarkeningCurrentTime >= duration )
7933 {
7934 StopDeathDarkeningEffect();
7935 }
7936 }
7937 else
7938 {
7939 StopDeathDarkeningEffect();
7940 }
7941 }
7942
7943 override bool IsInFBEmoteState()
7944 {
7945 if (!IsEmotePlaying())
7946 return false;
7947 if ( (m_EmoteManager.m_Callback && m_EmoteManager.m_Callback.m_IsFullbody) || m_EmoteManager.m_IsSurrendered )
7948 {
7949 return true;
7950 }
7951 return false;
7952 }
7953
7955 void EndSurrenderRequest(SurrenderData data = null)
7956 {
7957 if (m_EmoteManager)
7958 m_EmoteManager.EndSurrenderRequest(data);
7959 }
7960
7961 bool IsSurrendered()
7962 {
7963 if (m_EmoteManager)
7964 return m_EmoteManager.m_IsSurrendered;
7965
7966 return false;
7967 }
7968
7969 bool IsPlayerLoaded()
7970 {
7971 return m_PlayerLoaded;
7972 }
7973
7974 //disconnected, caused problems. Awaiting refactor
7975 override void CheckAnimationOverrides()
7976 {
7977 //FB gesture slideposeangle override
7978 if (IsInFBEmoteState() && IsControlledPlayer() && IsPlayerSelected())
7979 {
7980 OverrideSlidePoseAngle(Math.PI2);
7981 }
7982 else if (!IsInFBEmoteState() && IsControlledPlayer() && IsPlayerSelected())
7983 {
7984 OverrideSlidePoseAngle(m_OriginalSlidePoseAngle);
7985 }
7986
7987 //+add more, if needed
7988 }
7989
7990 /*void OnSurrenderEnd()
7991 {
7992 }*/
7993
7994 bool CanRedirectToWeaponManager (notnull EntityAI item, out bool isActionPossible)
7995 {
7996 isActionPossible = false;
7997 Magazine mag = Magazine.Cast(item);
7998 Weapon_Base wpn = Weapon_Base.Cast(item.GetHierarchyParent());
7999 if (mag && wpn)
8000 {
8001 if (GetWeaponManager().CanDetachMagazine(wpn, mag))
8002 {
8003 //Print("[inv] PlayerBase.CanRedirectToWeaponManager OK, can detach mag=" + mag + " from wpn=" + wpn);
8004 isActionPossible = true;
8005 }
8006 else
8007 {
8008 //Print("[inv] PlayerBase.CanRedirectToWeaponManager cannot detach mag=" + mag + " from wpn=" + wpn);
8009 }
8010 return true;
8011 }
8012 return false;
8013 }
8014
8015 // Inventory actions with redirection to weapon manager
8016 override bool PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetInventory (notnull EntityAI target, FindInventoryLocationType flags, notnull EntityAI item)
8017 {
8018 bool can_detach;
8019 if (CanRedirectToWeaponManager(item,can_detach))
8020 {
8021 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation();
8022 if (can_detach && target.GetInventory().FindFreeLocationFor(item, flags, il))
8023 {
8024 return GetWeaponManager().DetachMagazine(il);
8025 }
8026 return false;
8027 }
8028 return super.PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetInventory(target, flags, item);
8029 }
8030
8031 override bool PredictiveTakeEntityToInventory (FindInventoryLocationType flags, notnull EntityAI item)
8032 {
8033 bool can_detach;
8034 if (CanRedirectToWeaponManager(item,can_detach))
8035 {
8036 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation();
8037 if (can_detach && GetInventory().FindFreeLocationFor(item, flags, il))
8038 {
8039 return GetWeaponManager().DetachMagazine(il);
8040 }
8041 return false;
8042 }
8043 return super.PredictiveTakeEntityToInventory(flags, item);
8044 }
8045
8046 override bool PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetAttachment (notnull EntityAI target, notnull EntityAI item)
8047 {
8048 Weapon_Base parentWpn = Weapon_Base.Cast(target);
8049 Magazine mag = Magazine.Cast(item);
8050 if (parentWpn && mag)
8051 {
8052 if( GetWeaponManager().CanAttachMagazine(parentWpn, mag) )
8053 return GetWeaponManager().AttachMagazine(mag);
8054
8055 return false;
8056 }
8057 return super.PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetAttachment(target, item);
8058 }
8059
8060 override bool PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetAttachmentEx (notnull EntityAI target, notnull EntityAI item, int slot)
8061 {
8062 Weapon_Base parentWpn = Weapon_Base.Cast(target);
8063 Magazine mag = Magazine.Cast(item);
8064 if (parentWpn && mag)
8065 {
8066 if( target.CanReceiveAttachment(item,slot) && GetWeaponManager().CanAttachMagazine(parentWpn, mag) )
8067 return GetWeaponManager().AttachMagazine(mag);
8068
8069 return false;
8070 }
8071 return super.PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetAttachmentEx(target, item,slot);
8072 }
8073
8074 override bool PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetCargo (notnull EntityAI target, notnull EntityAI item)
8075 {
8076 bool can_detach;
8077 if (CanRedirectToWeaponManager(item,can_detach))
8078 {
8079 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation();
8080 if (can_detach && target.GetInventory().FindFreeLocationFor(item, FindInventoryLocationType.CARGO, il))
8081 {
8082 return GetWeaponManager().DetachMagazine(il);
8083 }
8084 return false;
8085 }
8086 return super.PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetCargo(target,item);
8087 }
8088
8089 override bool PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetCargoEx (notnull CargoBase cargo, notnull EntityAI item, int row, int col)
8090 {
8091 bool can_detach;
8092 if (CanRedirectToWeaponManager(item, can_detach))
8093 {
8094 if (can_detach)
8095 {
8096 InventoryLocation dst = new InventoryLocation;
8097 dst.SetCargoAuto(cargo, item, row, col, item.GetInventory().GetFlipCargo());
8098
8099 return GetWeaponManager().DetachMagazine(dst);
8100 }
8101 return false;
8102 }
8103 return super.PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetCargoEx (cargo, item, row, col);
8104 }
8105
8106 override bool PredictiveDropEntity (notnull EntityAI item)
8107 {
8108 bool can_detach;
8109 if (CanRedirectToWeaponManager(item,can_detach))
8110 {
8111 if (can_detach)
8112 {
8113 vector m4[4];
8114 Math3D.MatrixIdentity4(m4);
8115 GameInventory.PrepareDropEntityPos(this, item, m4);
8116 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation;
8117 il.SetGround(item, m4);
8118 return GetWeaponManager().DetachMagazine(il);
8119 }
8120 return false;
8121 }
8122 return super.PredictiveDropEntity(item);
8123 }
8124
8125 override bool PredictiveSwapEntities (notnull EntityAI item1, notnull EntityAI item2)
8126 {
8127 ForceStandUpForHeavyItemsSwap(item1, item2);
8128 //Print("PlayerBase | PredictiveSwapEntities");
8129 Magazine swapmag1 = Magazine.Cast(item1);
8130 Magazine swapmag2 = Magazine.Cast(item2);
8131
8132 if (swapmag1 && swapmag2)
8133 {
8134 Weapon_Base parentWpn;
8135
8136 if (Class.CastTo(parentWpn, swapmag1.GetHierarchyParent()))
8137 {
8138 if (GetWeaponManager().CanSwapMagazine(parentWpn, swapmag2) )
8139 {
8140 Print("[inv] PlayerBase.PredictiveSwapEntities: swapping mag1=" + swapmag1 + " to parent wpn=" + parentWpn + " of mag1=" + swapmag1);
8141 return GetWeaponManager().SwapMagazine(swapmag2);
8142 }
8143 else
8144 {
8145 Print("[inv] PlayerBase.PredictiveSwapEntities: can not swap magazines");
8146 return false;
8147 }
8148 }
8149
8150 if (Class.CastTo(parentWpn, swapmag2.GetHierarchyParent()))
8151 {
8152 if (GetWeaponManager().CanSwapMagazine(parentWpn, swapmag1) )
8153 {
8154 Print("[inv] PlayerBase.PredictiveSwapEntities: swapping mag1=" + swapmag1 + " to parent wpn=" + parentWpn + " of mag2=" + swapmag2);
8155 return GetWeaponManager().SwapMagazine(swapmag1);
8156 }
8157 else
8158 {
8159 Print("[inv] PlayerBase.PredictiveSwapEntities: can not swap magazines");
8160 return false;
8161 }
8162 }
8163 }
8164
8165 EntityAI item_hands;
8166 EntityAI item_ground;
8167 if ( IsSwapBetweenHandsAndGroundLargeItem(item1,item2,item_hands,item_ground) && !m_ActionManager.GetRunningAction() )
8168 {
8169 ActionManagerClient mngr_client;
8170 CastTo(mngr_client,m_ActionManager);
8171
8172 ActionTarget atrg = new ActionTarget(item_ground,null,-1,vector.Zero,-1.0);
8173 if ( mngr_client.GetAction(ActionSwapItemToHands).Can(this,atrg,ItemBase.Cast(item_hands)) )
8174 {
8175 mngr_client.PerformActionStart(mngr_client.GetAction(ActionSwapItemToHands),atrg,ItemBase.Cast(item_hands));
8176 return true;
8177 }
8178 return super.PredictiveSwapEntities( item1, item2);
8179 }
8180 else
8181 return super.PredictiveSwapEntities( item1, item2);
8182 }
8183
8184 override bool PredictiveForceSwapEntities (notnull EntityAI item1, notnull EntityAI item2, notnull InventoryLocation item2_dst)
8185 {
8186 ForceStandUpForHeavyItemsSwap(item1, item2);
8187
8188 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation;
8189 if ( item1.IsHeavyBehaviour() && item1.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il) && il.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.GROUND && !m_ActionManager.GetRunningAction() )
8190 {
8191 //Print("override bool PredictiveForceSwapEntities (notnull EntityAI item1, notnull EntityAI item2, notnull InventoryLocation item2_dst)");
8192 ActionManagerClient mngr_client;
8193 CastTo(mngr_client,m_ActionManager);
8194
8195 ActionTarget atrg = new ActionTarget(item1,null,-1,vector.Zero,-1.0);
8196 if ( mngr_client.GetAction(ActionSwapItemToHands).Can(this,atrg,ItemBase.Cast(item2)) )
8197 {
8198 mngr_client.PerformActionStart(mngr_client.GetAction(ActionSwapItemToHands),atrg,ItemBase.Cast(item2));
8199 }
8200 return true;
8201 }
8202 else
8203 return super.PredictiveForceSwapEntities( item1, item2, item2_dst );
8204 }
8205
8206 override void PredictiveTakeEntityToHands(EntityAI item)
8207 {
8208 if ( item.IsHeavyBehaviour() && !m_ActionManager.GetRunningAction() && !item.GetHierarchyParent() )
8209 {
8210 ActionManagerClient mngr_client;
8211 if (CastTo(mngr_client,m_ActionManager))
8212 {
8213 ActionTarget atrg = new ActionTarget(item,null,-1,vector.Zero,-1.0);
8214
8215 if ( mngr_client.GetAction(ActionTakeItemToHands).Can(this,atrg,null) )
8216 {
8217 mngr_client.PerformActionStart(mngr_client.GetAction(ActionTakeItemToHands),atrg,null);
8218 }
8219 /*).Can(this,
8220 mngr_client.ActionStart(mngr_client.GetAction(ActionTakeItemToHands),mngr_client.FindActionTarget(),null);
8221 return;*/
8222 }
8223 }
8224 else
8225 super.PredictiveTakeEntityToHands(item);
8226 }
8227
8228 override bool PredictiveTakeToDst (notnull InventoryLocation src, notnull InventoryLocation dst)
8229 {
8230 EntityAI item = src.GetItem();
8231 if(item)
8232 {
8233 bool can_detach;
8234
8235 if (CanRedirectToWeaponManager(item,can_detach))
8236 {
8237 if (can_detach)
8238 {
8239 return GetWeaponManager().DetachMagazine(dst);
8240 }
8241 return false;
8242 }
8243 return super.PredictiveTakeToDst(src,dst);
8244 }
8245 return false;
8246 }
8247
8248 bool IsSwapBetweenHandsAndGroundLargeItem(notnull EntityAI item1, notnull EntityAI item2, out EntityAI item_hands, out EntityAI item_ground)
8249 {
8250 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation;
8251 if (item1.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il) && il.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.HANDS)
8252 item_hands = item1;
8253 if (item2.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il) && il.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.HANDS)
8254 item_hands = item2;
8255 if (item1.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il) && il.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.GROUND)
8256 item_ground = item1;
8257 if (item2.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il) && il.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.GROUND)
8258 item_ground = item2;
8259
8260 return item_hands && item_ground && item_ground.IsHeavyBehaviour();
8261 }
8262
8264 void SetHairLevelToHide(int level, bool state, bool was_debug = false)
8265 {
8266 if (was_debug && GetInstanceType() != DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT)
8267 return;
8268
8269 if (!m_CharactersHead)
8270 {
8271 ErrorEx("No valid head detected on character!");
8272 return;
8273 }
8274
8275 if (level == -1) //hide/show ALL
8276 {
8277 m_HideHairAnimated = !m_HideHairAnimated;
8278 for (int i = 0; i < m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairSelectionArray.Count(); ++i)
8279 {
8280 //m_CharactersHead.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(i,m_HideHairAnimated);
8281 SelectionTranslation stt = SelectionTranslation.Cast(m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairHidingStateMap.Get(i));
8282 stt.SetSelectionState(m_HideHairAnimated);
8283 m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairHidingStateMap.Set(i, stt);
8284#ifdef DIAG_DEVELOPER
8285#ifndef SERVER
8286 PluginDiagMenuClient diagmenu = PluginDiagMenuClient.Cast(GetPlugin(PluginDiagMenuClient));
8287 diagmenu.m_HairHidingStateMap.Set(i, m_HideHairAnimated);
8288#endif
8289#endif
8290 }
8291 }
8292 else //hide/show selected level only
8293 {
8294 bool switchState;
8295 if (was_debug)
8296 {
8297#ifdef DIAG_DEVELOPER
8298#ifndef SERVER
8299 PluginDiagMenuClient diagmenuu = PluginDiagMenuClient.Cast(GetPlugin(PluginDiagMenuClient));
8300 switchState = !diagmenuu.m_HairHidingStateMap.Get(level);
8301 diagmenuu.m_HairHidingStateMap.Set(level, switchState);
8302#endif
8303#endif
8304 }
8305 else
8306 {
8307 switchState = !state;
8308 }
8309 //m_CharactersHead.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(level,switchState);
8310 stt = SelectionTranslation.Cast(m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairHidingStateMap.Get(level));
8311 stt.SetSelectionState(switchState);
8312 m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairHidingStateMap.Set(level, stt); //nescessary?
8313 }
8314 }
8315
8316 void HideHairSelections(ItemBase item, bool state)
8317 {
8318 if ( !item || !item.GetHeadHidingSelection() || !m_CharactersHead)
8319 return;
8320
8321 int slot_id; //item currently attached (or detaching from) here
8322 string slot_name; //item currently attached (or detaching from) here
8323 string str
8324 int idx;
8325 int i;
8326 item.GetInventory().GetCurrentAttachmentSlotInfo(slot_id,slot_name);
8327
8328 if (item.HidesSelectionBySlot())
8329 {
8330 for (i = 0; i < item.GetInventory().GetSlotIdCount(); i++)
8331 {
8332 if (item.GetInventory().GetSlotId(i) == slot_id)
8333 {
8334 str = item.GetHeadHidingSelection().Get(i);
8335 idx = m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairSelectionArray.Find(str);
8336 SetHairLevelToHide(idx,state);
8337 }
8338 }
8339 }
8340 else
8341 {
8342 for (i = 0; i < item.GetHeadHidingSelection().Count(); i++)
8343 {
8344 str = item.GetHeadHidingSelection().Get(i);
8345 idx = m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairSelectionArray.Find(str);
8346 SetHairLevelToHide(idx,state);
8347 }
8348 }
8349 UpdateHairSelectionVisibility();
8350 }
8351
8352 void UpdateHairSelectionVisibility(bool was_debug = false)
8353 {
8354 if (!m_CharactersHead)
8355 return;
8356 bool shown;
8357 bool exception_hidden = false;
8358 int i;
8359 SelectionTranslation stt;
8360
8361 //hide/show beard
8362 if ( IsMale() && m_CharactersHead.GetBeardIndex() > -1 && !was_debug )
8363 {
8364 SetHairLevelToHide(m_CharactersHead.GetBeardIndex(),GetLifeSpanState() != LifeSpanState.BEARD_EXTRA);
8365 }
8366
8367 //show all first
8368 for (i = 0; i < m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairHidingStateMap.Count(); i++)
8369 {
8370 m_CharactersHead.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(i,true);
8371 }
8372 //then carve it up
8373 for (i = 0; i < m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairHidingStateMap.Count(); i++)
8374 {
8375 stt = m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairHidingStateMap.Get(i);
8376 shown = stt.GetSelectionState();
8377 if (!shown)
8378 {
8379 if ( /*IsMale() && */!m_CharactersHead.IsHandlingException() )
8380 {
8381 m_CharactersHead.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(i,shown);
8382 UpdateTranslatedSelections(stt);
8383 //Print("hidden idx: " + i);
8384 }
8385 else
8386 {
8387 exception_hidden = true;
8388 }
8389 }
8390 }
8391
8392 //exceptions handled differently; hides hair
8393 if ( exception_hidden )
8394 {
8395 m_CharactersHead.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(m_CharactersHead.GetHairIndex(),false);
8396 if ( IsMale() )
8397 m_CharactersHead.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(m_CharactersHead.GetBeardIndex(),false);
8398 }
8399 }
8400
8401 void UpdateTranslatedSelections(SelectionTranslation stt)
8402 {
8403 int index;
8404 array<int> translatedSelectinosArray = stt.GetTranslatedSelections();
8405 for (int i = 0; i < translatedSelectinosArray.Count(); i++)
8406 {
8407 index = translatedSelectinosArray.Get(i);
8408 //if (index > -1)
8409 m_CharactersHead.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(index,false); //safe this way, only hiding/carving from shown parts
8410 }
8411 }
8412
8414 void CheckHairClippingOnCharacterLoad()
8415 {
8416 ItemBase headgear = ItemBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.HEADGEAR));
8417 ItemBase mask = ItemBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.MASK));
8418
8419 HideHairSelections(headgear,true);
8420 HideHairSelections(mask,true);
8421 }
8422
8423 bool IsNVGWorking()
8424 {
8425 return m_ActiveNVTypes && m_ActiveNVTypes.Count() > 0;
8426 }
8427
8428 bool IsNVGLowered()
8429 {
8430 return m_LoweredNVGHeadset;
8431 }
8432
8433 int GetNVType()
8434 {
8435 if (!m_ActiveNVTypes || m_ActiveNVTypes.Count() == 0)
8436 {
8437 return NVTypes.NONE;
8438 }
8439 else
8440 {
8441 return m_ActiveNVTypes[m_ActiveNVTypes.Count() - 1];
8442 }
8443 }
8444
8445 array<int> GetNVTypesArray()
8446 {
8447 return m_ActiveNVTypes;
8448 }
8449
8451 void SetNVGWorking(bool state)
8452 {
8453 //Deprecated, below is for legacy's sake
8454 AddActiveNV(NVTypes.NV_GOGGLES);
8455 }
8456
8457 void SetNVGLowered(bool state)
8458 {
8459 m_LoweredNVGHeadset = state;
8460 }
8461
8462 void AddActiveNV(int type)
8463 {
8464 if ( !m_ActiveNVTypes || (GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsServer()) )
8465 {
8466 #ifdef DEVELOPER
8467 Error("AddActiveNV | illegal server-side call!");
8468 #endif
8469
8470 return;
8471 }
8472
8473 if ( m_ActiveNVTypes.Find(type) == -1 ) //TODO - set instead?
8474 m_ActiveNVTypes.Insert(type);
8475 }
8476
8477 void RemoveActiveNV(int type)
8478 {
8479 if ( !m_ActiveNVTypes || (GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsServer()) )
8480 {
8481 #ifdef DEVELOPER
8482 Error("RemoveActiveNV | illegal server-side call!");
8483 #endif
8484
8485 return;
8486 }
8487
8488 if ( m_ActiveNVTypes.Find(type) != -1 ) //TODO - set instead?
8489 m_ActiveNVTypes.RemoveItem(type);
8490 }
8491
8492 void ResetActiveNV()
8493 {
8494 m_ActiveNVTypes.Clear();
8495 }
8496
8497#ifdef DEVELOPER
8498 override string GetDebugText()
8499 {
8500 string text = super.GetDebugText();
8501 text += "GetMovementTimeToStrafeJog:" + CfgGameplayHandler.GetMovementTimeToStrafeJog() + "\n";
8502 text += "GetMovementTimeToStrafeSprint:" + CfgGameplayHandler.GetMovementTimeToStrafeSprint()+ "\n";
8503
8504 SHumanCommandMoveSettings moveSettings = GetDayZPlayerType().CommandMoveSettingsW();
8505 if (moveSettings)
8506 {
8507 text += "hmcs.m_fDirFilterTimeout:" + moveSettings.m_fDirFilterTimeout + "\n";
8508 text += "hmcs.m_fDirFilterSprintTimeout:" + moveSettings.m_fDirFilterSprintTimeout+ "\n";
8509 }
8510
8511 return text;
8512 }

8515
8516 void DEBUGRotateNVG()
8517 {
8518 NVGoggles nvg;
8519
8520 if ( FindAttachmentBySlotName("Eyewear") )
8521 {
8522 nvg = NVGoggles.Cast(FindAttachmentBySlotName("Eyewear").FindAttachmentBySlotName("NVG"));
8523 }
8524 else if ( FindAttachmentBySlotName("Headgear") )
8525 {
8526 nvg = NVGoggles.Cast(FindAttachmentBySlotName("Headgear").FindAttachmentBySlotName("NVG"));
8527 }
8528
8529 if ( nvg )
8530 {
8531 nvg.RotateGoggles(nvg.m_IsLowered);
8532 }
8533 }
8534#endif
8535
8536 void AdjustBandana(EntityAI item, string slot_name)
8537 {
8538 if (Bandana_ColorBase.Cast(item))
8539 {
8540 if (slot_name == "Headgear")
8541 {
8542 item.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(0,1);
8543 item.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(1,0);
8544 }
8545 else if (slot_name == "Mask")
8546 {
8547 item.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(0,0);
8548 item.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(1,1);
8549 }
8550 }
8551 }
8552
8553 //client-side
8554 void UpdateCorpseStateVisual()
8555 {
8556 //Print("---Prettying up corpses... | " + GetGame().GetTime() + " | " + this + " | " + GetType() + "---");
8557 //Print("m_DecayedTexture = " + m_DecayedTexture);
8558 int state = Math.AbsInt(m_CorpseState);//negative sign denotes a special meaning(state was forced to a live player), but we are only intetested in the positive value here
8559 if( state == PlayerConstants.CORPSE_STATE_DECAYED )
8560 {
8561 EntityAI bodypart;
8562 ItemBase item;
8563
8564 string path;
8565 int idx;
8566 int slot_id;
8567 array<string> bodyparts = {"Gloves","Body","Legs","Feet"};
8568
8569 for (int i = 0; i < bodyparts.Count(); i++)
8570 {
8571 slot_id = InventorySlots.GetSlotIdFromString(bodyparts.Get(i));
8572 bodypart = GetInventory().FindPlaceholderForSlot( slot_id );
8573 item = ItemBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment( slot_id ));
8574
8575 if( bodypart )
8576 {
8577 path = "cfgVehicles " + bodypart.GetType();
8578 idx = bodypart.GetHiddenSelectionIndex("personality");
8579 if( idx > -1 )
8580 {
8581 bodypart.SetObjectTexture(idx,m_DecayedTexture);
8582 }
8583 }
8584 if( item )
8585 {
8586 path = "cfgVehicles " + item.GetType();
8587 idx = item.GetHiddenSelectionIndex("personality");
8588 if( idx > -1 )
8589 {
8590 item.SetObjectTexture(idx,m_DecayedTexture);
8591 }
8592 }
8593 }
8594
8595 SetFaceTexture(m_DecayedTexture);
8596 }
8597 }
8598
8599 void SetDecayEffects(int effect = -1)
8600 {
8601 int boneIdx = GetBoneIndexByName("Spine2");
8602 Particle p;
8603
8604 switch (effect)
8605 {
8606 case PlayerConstants.CORPSE_STATE_MEDIUM :
8607 //play medium sound/flies particle
8608 if (!m_FliesEff)
8609 m_FliesEff = new EffSwarmingFlies();
8610
8611 if ( m_FliesEff && !SEffectManager.IsEffectExist(m_FliesIndex) )
8612 {
8613 m_FliesEff.SetDecalOwner( this );
8614 m_FliesIndex = SEffectManager.PlayOnObject(m_FliesEff, this, "0 0.25 0");
8615 p = m_FliesEff.GetParticle();
8616 AddChild(p, boneIdx);
8617 if ( !m_SoundFliesEffect )
8618 {
8619 PlaySoundSetLoop(m_SoundFliesEffect, "Flies_SoundSet", 1.0, 1.0);
8620// ErrorEx("DbgFlies | CORPSE_STATE_MEDIUM | m_SoundFliesEffect created! " + m_SoundFliesEffect,ErrorExSeverity.INFO );
8621 }
8622 }
8623 break;
8624 case PlayerConstants.CORPSE_STATE_DECAYED :
8625 //play serious sound/flies particle
8626 if ( !m_FliesEff )
8627 m_FliesEff = new EffSwarmingFlies();
8628
8629 if ( m_FliesEff && !SEffectManager.IsEffectExist(m_FliesIndex) )
8630 {
8631 m_FliesEff.SetDecalOwner( this );
8632 m_FliesIndex = SEffectManager.PlayOnObject(m_FliesEff, this, "0 0.25 0");
8633 p = m_FliesEff.GetParticle();
8634 AddChild(p, boneIdx);
8635 if ( !m_SoundFliesEffect )
8636 {
8637 PlaySoundSetLoop(m_SoundFliesEffect, "Flies_SoundSet", 1.0, 1.0);
8638// ErrorEx("DbgFlies | CORPSE_STATE_DECAYED | m_SoundFliesEffect created! " + m_SoundFliesEffect,ErrorExSeverity.INFO );
8639 }
8640 }
8641 break;
8642 //remove
8643 default:
8644 SEffectManager.DestroyEffect( m_FliesEff );
8645// ErrorEx("DbgFlies | StopSoundSet | exit 3 ",ErrorExSeverity.INFO );
8646 StopSoundSet(m_SoundFliesEffect);
8647 break;
8648 }
8649 }
8650
8651 void PreloadDecayTexture()
8652 {
8653 int idx;
8654 int slot_id;
8655
8656 idx = GetHiddenSelectionIndex("decay_preload");
8657 if (idx > -1)
8658 {
8659 SetObjectTexture(idx,m_DecayedTexture);
8660 //Print("'decay_preload'" + m_DecayedTexture +" loaded on " + GetModelName());
8661 }
8662 else
8663 {
8664 //Print("No 'decay_preload' selection found on " + this);
8665 }
8666 }
8667
8668 void SetLastMapInfo(float scale, vector pos)
8669 {
8670 m_LastMapScale = scale;
8671 m_LastMapPos = pos;
8672 }
8673
8674 bool GetLastMapInfo(out float scale, out vector pos)
8675 {
8676 scale = m_LastMapScale;
8677 pos = m_LastMapPos;
8678
8679 return m_LastMapScale != -1.0;
8680 }
8681
8682 override bool PhysicalPredictiveDropItem(EntityAI entity, bool heavy_item_only = true)
8683 {
8684 vector dir;
8685 ItemBase item = ItemBase.Cast(entity);
8686
8687 if (GetItemInHands() == item) //from hands
8688 {
8689 //HOTFIX
8690 return PredictiveDropEntity(item);
8691
8692 if (entity.ConfigGetString("physLayer") != "item_large" && heavy_item_only)
8693 {
8694 return PredictiveDropEntity(item);
8695 }
8696 else
8697 {
8698 dir = GetOrientation();
8699 //item.m_ItemBeingDropped = true;
8700 return GetHumanInventory().ThrowEntity(item,dir,0);
8701 }
8702 }
8703 else //from anywhere else
8704 {
8705 ActionManagerClient mngr_client;
8706 if (CastTo(mngr_client,m_ActionManager))
8707 {
8708 ActionTarget atrg = new ActionTarget(null, null, -1, vector.Zero, -1);
8709 if ( mngr_client.GetAction(ActionDropItemSimple).Can(this,atrg,item) )
8710 {
8711 //Param1<bool> p1 = new Param1<bool>(false);
8712 //p1.param1 = heavy_item_only;
8713 mngr_client.PerformActionStart(mngr_client.GetAction(ActionDropItemSimple),atrg,item/*,p1*/);
8714 return true;
8715 }
8716 return false;
8717 }
8718 else
8719 return true;
8720 }
8721 }
8722
8723 override void SetProcessUIWarning(bool state)
8724 {
8725 m_ProcessUIWarning = state;
8726 }
8727
8728 void dmgDebugPrint(TotalDamageResult damageResult, int damageType, EntityAI source, int component, string dmgZone, string ammo, vector modelPos, float speedCoef)
8729 {
8730 /*Print("ProjectileDebugging | Damage Health: " + damageResult.GetDamage(dmgZone,"Health") + " | Component: " + component + " | Zone: " + dmgZone + "| Timestamp: " + GetSimulationTimeStamp());
8731 Print("ProjectileDebugging | speedCoef: " + speedCoef);
8732 Print("ProjectileDebugging | GetWorldTime(): " + GetWorldTime());
8733 Print("-----------------------------------------------");*/
8734 }
8735
8736 //Use this method to process additionnal dmg to legs specifically (must use the dmg system to fire relevant events)
8737 //Legzone is a dummy to inflict damage once and NOT transfer damage to other zones. All leg zones will drop to 0 anyway
8738 void DamageAllLegs(float inputDmg)
8739 {
8740 array<string> legZones = new array<string>;
8741 legZones.Insert("LeftLeg");
8742 legZones.Insert("RightLeg");
8743 legZones.Insert("RightFoot");
8744 legZones.Insert("LeftFoot");
8745
8746 for (int i = 0; i < legZones.Count(); i++)
8747 {
8748 DecreaseHealth(legZones[i],"",inputDmg);
8749 }
8750 }
8751
8753 void TryHideItemInHands(bool hide, bool force = false)
8754 {
8755 if ( !hide && ((!IsSwimming() && !IsClimbingLadder() && !IsInVehicle() && !AnimCommandCheck(HumanMoveCommandID.CommandSwim | HumanMoveCommandID.CommandLadder | HumanMoveCommandID.CommandVehicle)) || force) )
8756 {
8757 GetItemAccessor().HideItemInHands(false);
8758 }
8759 else
8760 {
8761 GetItemAccessor().HideItemInHands(true);
8762 }
8763 }
8764
8766 bool CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(FindInventoryLocationType flags, notnull EntityAI item, notnull EntityAI target)
8767 {
8768 float stackable = item.GetTargetQuantityMax();
8769 if ( !(stackable == 0 || stackable >= item.GetQuantity()) )
8770 {
8771 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation;
8772 if ( target && target.GetInventory().FindFreeLocationFor( item, flags, il ) )
8773 {
8774 ItemBase itemB;
8775 if ( CastTo(itemB, item) )
8776 {
8777 itemB.SplitIntoStackMaxToInventoryLocationClient( il );
8778 return true;
8779 }
8780 }
8781 }
8782 return false;
8783 }
8784
8785 bool CheckAndExecuteStackSplitToInventoryLocation(InventoryLocation il, notnull EntityAI item)
8786 {
8787 float stackable = item.GetTargetQuantityMax();
8788 if ( !(stackable == 0 || stackable >= item.GetQuantity()) )
8789 {
8790 ItemBase itemB;
8791 if ( CastTo(itemB, item) )
8792 {
8793 itemB.SplitIntoStackMaxToInventoryLocationClient( il );
8794 return true;
8795 }
8796 }
8797 return false;
8798 }
8799
8800 override protected bool TakeEntityToInventoryImpl(InventoryMode mode, FindInventoryLocationType flags, notnull EntityAI item)
8801 {
8802 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(flags, item, this) )
8803 {
8804 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2Inv(SPLIT) item=" + GetDebugName(item));
8805 return true;
8806 }
8807
8808 return super.TakeEntityToInventoryImpl(mode, flags, item);
8809 }
8810
8811 override protected bool TakeEntityToCargoImpl(InventoryMode mode, notnull EntityAI item)
8812 {
8813 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(FindInventoryLocationType.CARGO, item, this) )
8814 {
8815 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2Cgo(SPLIT) item=" +GetDebugName(item));
8816 return true;
8817 }
8818
8819 return super.TakeEntityToCargoImpl(mode, item);
8820 }
8821
8822 override protected bool TakeEntityAsAttachmentImpl(InventoryMode mode, notnull EntityAI item)
8823 {
8824 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(FindInventoryLocationType.ATTACHMENT, item, this) )
8825 {
8826 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2Att(SPLIT) item=" + GetDebugName(item));
8827 return true;
8828 }
8829
8830 return super.TakeEntityAsAttachmentImpl(mode, item);
8831 }
8832
8833 override void TakeEntityToHandsImpl(InventoryMode mode, EntityAI item)
8834 {
8835 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(FindInventoryLocationType.HANDS, item, this) )
8836 {
8837 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2Hands(SPLIT) item=" + GetDebugName(item));
8838 return;
8839 }
8840
8841 super.TakeEntityToHandsImpl(mode, item);
8842 }
8843
8844 override protected bool TakeEntityToTargetInventoryImpl(InventoryMode mode, notnull EntityAI target, FindInventoryLocationType flags, notnull EntityAI item)
8845 {
8846 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(flags, item, target) )
8847 {
8848 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2TargetInv(SPLIT) item=" + GetDebugName(item));
8849 return true;
8850 }
8851
8852 return super.TakeEntityToTargetInventoryImpl(mode, target, flags, item);
8853 }
8854
8855 override protected bool TakeEntityToTargetCargoImpl(InventoryMode mode, notnull EntityAI target, notnull EntityAI item)
8856 {

8858 {
8859 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2TargetCgo(SPLIT) item=" + GetDebugName(item));
8860 return true;
8861 }
8862
8863 return super.TakeEntityToTargetCargoImpl(mode, target, item);
8864 }
8865
8866 override protected bool TakeEntityToTargetAttachmentImpl(InventoryMode mode, notnull EntityAI target, notnull EntityAI item)
8867 {
8868 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(FindInventoryLocationType.ATTACHMENT, item, target) )
8869 {
8870 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2TargetAtt(SPLIT) item=" + GetDebugName(item));
8871 return true;
8872 }
8873
8874 return super.TakeEntityToTargetAttachmentImpl(mode, target, item);
8875 }
8876
8877 override protected bool TakeToDstImpl(InventoryMode mode, notnull InventoryLocation src, notnull InventoryLocation dst)
8878 {
8879 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplitToInventoryLocation(dst, dst.GetItem()) )
8880 {
8881 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2Dst(SPLIT) item=" + GetDebugName(dst.GetItem()));
8882 return true;
8883 }
8884
8885 return super.TakeToDstImpl(mode, src, dst);
8886 }
8887
8888 override vector GetCenter()
8889 {
8890 return GetBonePositionWS( GetBoneIndexByName( "spine3" ) );
8891 }
8892
8893
8894 // contaminated areas - temp stuff
8895 void ContaminatedParticleAdjustment()
8896 {
8897 if ( GetCommand_Move() && m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer && m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny)
8898 {
8899 float playerSpeed = GetCommand_Move().GetCurrentMovementSpeed();
8900 //Print( playerSpeed );
8901
8902 // 1 - prone, crouch
8903 // 2 - jog
8904 // 3 - sprint
8905 float particleLifetime = 5.25;
8906 float particleSpeed = 0.25;
8907 if ( playerSpeed >= 1 )
8908 {
8909 particleLifetime = 3.5;
8910 particleSpeed = 3.25;
8911 }
8912 if ( playerSpeed >= 2 )
8913 {
8914 particleLifetime = 2.5;
8915 particleSpeed = 5.25;
8916 }
8917 if ( playerSpeed >= 3 )
8918 {
8919 particleLifetime = 1.5;
8920 particleSpeed = 8.25;
8921 }
8922 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.SetParameter( 0, EmitorParam.LIFETIME, particleLifetime );
8923 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.SetParameter( 1, EmitorParam.LIFETIME, particleLifetime );
8924 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.SetParameter( 2, EmitorParam.LIFETIME, particleLifetime );
8925 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.SetParameter( 3, EmitorParam.LIFETIME, particleLifetime );
8926
8927 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny.SetParameter( 0, EmitorParam.VELOCITY, particleSpeed );
8928 vector transform[4];
8929 GetTransform(transform);
8930 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.SetTransform(transform);
8931 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny.SetTransform(transform);
8932 }
8933 }
8934
8935 void HandleGlassesEffect()
8936 {
8937 if (!IsControlledPlayer())
8938 return;
8939 int i;
8940
8941 if (m_ProcessRemoveGlassesEffects)
8942 {
8943 for (i = 0; i < m_ProcessRemoveGlassesEffects.Count(); i++)
8944 {
8945 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(m_ProcessRemoveGlassesEffects[i]).Stop();
8946 }
8947 m_ProcessRemoveGlassesEffects.Clear();
8948 }
8949
8950 if (m_ProcessAddGlassesEffects)
8951 {
8952 for (i = 0; i < m_ProcessAddGlassesEffects.Count(); i++)
8953 {
8954 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(m_ProcessAddGlassesEffects[i]).Start();
8955 }
8956 m_ProcessAddGlassesEffects.Clear();
8957 }
8958 }
8959
8960
8961}
8962
